translation.en: The government argued that these regulations were intended to monitor and regulate citizens use of social media, in particular, and tackle issues like hate speech and disinformation.
translation.sw: Serikali ilidai kwamba kanuni hizi zililenga kufuatilia kwa karibu matumizi ya mitandao ya kijamii, hususani, kupambana na tatizo la habari zinazoeneza chuki na uzushi mitandaoni.

translation.en: However, the regulations applied not only to mainstream media but to individual bloggers and content providers, who were shocked by the new requirement to pay $900 United States dollars for a license.
translation.sw: Hata hivyo, kanuni hizo si tu zilitumika dhidi ya vyombo vikuu vya habari lakini pia kwa wanablogu mmoja mmoja na watoa huduma za maudhui, ambao walishangazwa na takwa jipya la kisheria la kulipa kiasi cha dola za Marekani 900  ili kupata leseni.

translation.en: This includes anyone who produces live-streaming TV or radio.
translation.sw: Takwa hili pia lilimhusu yeyote anayetayarisha na kurusha mubashara matangazo ya televisheni au radio mtandaoni.

translation.en: The sudden imposition of fees turned Tanzanian social media dark as many bloggers and content providers gave up due to the exorbitant costs.
translation.sw: Giza kubwa lilitanda kwenye mitandao ya kijamii kufuatia takwa hili la ghafla la ada ambapo wanablogu wengi na wazalishaji wa maudhui waliamua kuachana na shughuli zao kwa sababu ya gharama hizo kubwa.

translation.en: Opposition politicians and social media practitioners critiqued the regulations for undermining online media freedoms as well as civil society.
translation.sw: Wanasiasa wa upinzani na watumiaji wa mitandao ya kijamii walikosoa vikali kanuni hizi kwa kupoka uhuru wa mitandao ya kijamii pamoja na asasi za kiraia.

translation.en: In 2020, Tanzania released revised EPOCA regulations, issued under Section 103 of the Electronic and Postal Communication Act, 2010, adopted in July 2020, and announced through Government Gazette on Government Notice No. 538.
translation.sw: Mwaka 2020, Tanzania ilitoa marekebisho mapya ya kanuni za maudhui ya mtandaoni, chini ya kifungu cha 103 cha Sheria ya Mawasiliano ya Kieletroniki na Posta, 2020, na kuanza kutumika Julai 2020, na kuzitangaza kupitia Tangazo Na 538 katika Gazeti la Serikali.

translation.en: There are several main differences between the 2018 and 2020 versions of EPOCA.
translation.sw: Baadhi ya tofauti kubwa kati ya toleo la 2018 na 2020  la Kanuni za Maudhui ya Mtandaoni o (EPOCA) ni kama ifuatavyo:

translation.en: Firstly, the Tanzania Communications Regulatory Authority (TCRA) recategorized fees with three additional sub-categories under online content: news & current affairs, entertainment and education or religious, furthering imposing restrictions on individual content providers.
translation.sw: Kwanza, Mamlaka ya Mawasiliano Tanzania (TCRA) ilitengeneza upya makundi ya ada na kuongeza makundi madogo chini ya maudhui ya mtandaoni yaani: taarifa & habari, burudani na elimu au dini, na kuendelea kuzuia watu binafsi kutoa maudhui.

translation.en: EPOCA 2020, Part VI, Section 116:
translation.sw: Kanuni ya Maudhui Mtandaoni ya 2020, Sehemu VI, Kifungu cha 116:

translation.en: Any person who provides network services without obtaining any relevant individual license, commits an offense and shall be liable upon conviction to a fine of not less than 6 million Tanzanian shillings [ $2,587 United States dollars] or imprisonment for a term not less than 12 months or to both.
translation.sw: Mtu yeyote anayetoa huduma za mtandao bila kupata leseni muafaka, anafanya kosa na adhabu yake ni hukumu ya kulipa faini isiyopungua Shilingi za Kitanzania milioni 6 [dola za marekani 2,587] au kifungo cha jela kisichopungua miezi 12 au vyote kwa pamoja.

translation.en: Secondly, the TCRA expanded a more detailed list of prohibited content including, among other things, content that motivates or promotes phone tapping, espionage, data theft, tracking, recording or intercepting communications or conversation without right.
translation.sw: Pili, TCRA iliongeza orodha ya maudhui yasiyoruhusiwa na kujumuisha, pamoja na mambo mengine, maudhui yanayohamasisha kurekodi simu za watu, kupeleleza mawasiliano, kuiba data, kufuatilia mawasiliano, kurekodi na kuingilia mawasiliano au mazungumzo bila ruhusa.

translation.en: Thirdly, EPOCA 2020 also reduced the amount of time that a license-holder has to respond to prohibited content violations by suspending or terminating an account.
translation.sw: Tatu, Kanuni za Maudhui ya Mtandaoni (EPOCA 2020) pia zimepunguza kipindi ambacho mwenye leseni anaweza kufanyia kazi ukiukwaji wa kanuni za maudhui kwa kusimamishwa au kufutiwa akaunti.

translation.en: Under 2018 guidelines, a license-holder had 12 hours.
translation.sw: Chini ya kanuni za 2018, mwenye leseni alikuwa na saa 12 za kufanya hivyo.

translation.en: In 2020, under Part III, Section 11, the response time is reduced to two hours.
translation.sw: Lakini kwenye kanuni za 2020, chini ya Sehemu ya III, kifungu cha 11, muda wa kushughulikia ukiukwaji wowote wa maudhui ulipunguzwa na kuwa saa 2.

translation.en: Failure to comply within this time frame gives authorities permission to intervene, either by suspending or removing an account.
translation.sw: Kushindwa kuheshimu muda huu kunaipa mamlaka ruhusa ya kuingilia, ama kwa kuifungia au kuiondoa akaunti husika.

translation.en: Global Voices spoke with several legal and human rights experts who have condemned EPOCA 2020 revisions, saying it undermines both digital rights and civil society protections.
translation.sw: Global Voices ilizungumza na baadhi ya wataalam wa sheria na haki za binadamu ambao walikosoa marekebisho ya Kanuni za Maudhui ya 2020, wakisema yanabana haki za kidijitali na haki za asasi za kiraia.

translation.en: They argue that these regulations further repress digital rights and deter bloggers and writers from owning their online content.
translation.sw: Walisema kuwa kanuni hizi zinabana haki za kidijitali na kuwazuia wanablogu na waandishi kumiliki maudhui ya mtandaoni.

translation.en: The biggest problem here is that these powers contain no safeguards against abuse, and with the current situation, they certainly have the effect of stifling legitimate freedom of expression in Tanzania, said one human rights professional who asked to remain anonymous.
translation.sw: Tatizo kubwa hapa ni kwamba hakuna tahadhari zimeweka kuzuia mamlaka haya yasitumike vibaya, na kwa hali ilivyo hivi sasa, mamlaka haya yana madhara kwenye uhuru wa kujieleza kwa haki nchini Tanzania, alisema mmoja wa wataalam wa haki za binadamu aliyeomba asifahamike.

translation.en: Post-Magufuli: The future of digital rights in Tanzania
translation.sw: Baada ya Magufuli: Mustakabali wa haki za kidijitali Tanzania

translation.en: Under the Magufuli administration, civil, media and digital rights steadily declined with systematic restrictions on free speech online.
translation.sw: Chini ya utawala wa Magufuli, asasi za kiraia, vyombo vya habari na haki za kidijitali zimekuwa zikizorota kwa kasi kufuatia kubanwa, hatua kwa hatua, kwa uhuru wa maoni mtandaoni.

translation.en: In the aftermath of Magufulis unexpected death, many now wonder about the future of digital rights in the country  after six years of increasingly authoritarian-style leadership.
translation.sw: Baada ya kifo cha ghafla cha Magufuli, wengi sasa wanajiuliza kuhusu mustakabali wa haki za kidijitali nchini humo   baada ya miaka sita ya uongozi ulioendelea kuonesha dalili za mabavu.

translation.en: Global Voices spoke to several government officials on the condition of anonymity about the current regulations and whats at stake in terms of human rights in digital spaces.
translation.sw: Global Voices iliongea na baadhi ya maafisa wa serikali kwa sharti la kutokutajwa majina kuhusu kanuni mpya na  hali ya haki za binadamu na uhuru wa maoni mtandaoni.

translation.en: One human rights professional in Tanzania told Global Voices, on the condition of anonymity:
translation.sw: Mtaalam mmoja wa haki za biandamu nchini Tanzania aliiambia Global Voices, kwa sharti ya kutokutajwa:

translation.en: The regulations are not fair as anyone can be criminalized, because not many citizens understand the implications of these regulations.
translation.sw: Kanuni hizi si za haki kwa sababu yeyote anaweza kutiwa hatiani, kwa kuwa si wananchi wengi wanaelewa tafsiri ya kanuni hizi.

translation.en: Another suggested that the government finds social media to be an annoyance.
translation.sw: Mwingine alifikiri kwamba serikali inachukulia mitandao ya kijamii kama kero.

translation.en: He warned citizens to take precautions when speaking out on public platforms because the government can legally access all their details through the platform host.
translation.sw: Aliwatahadharisha wananchi kuchukua tahadhari wanapozungumza kwenye majukwaa ya wazi kwa sababu serikali ina nguvu za kisheria kupata taarifa zao zote kupitia wamiliki wa majukwaa hayo.

translation.en: EPOCA 2020 makes it virtually impossible to remain anonymous online, under Regulation 9(e), coupled with the requirement imposed on the internet café providers to register users via recognized IDs, assign static IP addresses to their computers and put camera surveillance to record the activities in their premises, according to this analysis by the Media Council of Tanzania.
translation.sw: Kanuni za Maudhui ya Mtandaoni za mwaka 2020 zinafanya isiwezekane kabisa mtu kutokufahamika unapokuwa mtandaoni, chini ya Kanuni ya 9(e), watoaji wa huduma ya vyumba vya kuuza mtandao wa inteneti (internet café) wanalazimika kujisajili kwa kutumia vitambulisho vinavyotambulika, kuweka utambulisho pekee wa mtandaoni kwa kila kompyuta (IP address) na kufunga kamera za usalama kurekodi shughuli zote zinazoendelea kwenye maeneo yao ya kazi, kwa mujibu wa uchambuzi huu uliofanywa na Baraza la Habari la Tanzania.

translation.en: These regulations reinforce criminal defamation, restrict anonymity, provide hefty punishments for violations and grant sweeping powers of content removal to the TCRA and intermediaries.
translation.sw: Kanuni hizi zinachangia vitendo vya jinai vya kuchafua heshima za watu, kuzuia haki ya kutokufahamika, kutoa adhabu kali kwa kukiukwa kwa kanuni hizi na kukabidhi mamlaka makubwa mno ya kuondoa maudhui kwa TCRA na vyombo vingine vilivyo chini yake.

translation.en: EPOCA is incompatible with internationally acceptable digital rights standards.
translation.sw: Kanuni za Maudhui ya Mtandaoni (EPOCA) zinapingana na viwango vya kimataifa vilivyokubalika vya haki za kidijitali.

translation.en: Overall, these regulations stifle legitimate freedom of expression and press freedom in Tanzania.
translation.sw: Jumla ya yote, kanuni hizi zinabana uhuru wa maoni na uhuru vya vyombo vya habari nchini Tanzania.

translation.en: Yet, the Tanzanian government is obligated to respect and uphold rights to freedom of expression and association of all persons  including members of the media, civil society, and the political opposition, according to Tanzanias constitution as well as international and regional treaties.
translation.sw: Hata hivyo, serikali ya Tanzania inawajibika kuheshimu na kutunza haki za watu kujieleza na kukusanyika   ikiwa ni pamoja na wanahabari, wanachama wa asasi za kiraia, na wanasiasa wa upinzani, kwa mujibu wa katiba ya Tanzania pamoja na mikataba ya kimataifa na ile ya jumuiya za kimaeneo.

translation.en: These rights are also essential to the exercise voting rights.
translation.sw: Haki hizi ni muhimu kwa minajili ya kuwezesha haki ya kupiga kura.

translation.en: Tanzania is at a crossroads with digital rights.
translation.sw: Tanzania iko kwenye mtanziko wa haki za kidijitali.

translation.en: Under newly sworn-in President Hassan, will the ruling Revolutionary Party continue to silence and repress digital rights in the country?
translation.sw: Chini ya Rais Hassan aliyeapishwa hivi karibuni, swali la kujiuliza ni ikiwa Chama Cha Mapinduzi kitaendelea kunyamazisha na kubana haki za kidijitali nchini humo?

translation.en: Editor's note: The author of this post wishes to remain anonymous due to security concerns.
translation.sw: Dokezo la Mhariri: Mwandishi wa makala haya ameomba jina lake lisifahamike kwa sababu za kiusalama.

translation.en: Moving Tanzania forward could not happen fast enough, when President John Magufuli took power in 2015.
translation.sw: Kuipeleka Tanzania mbele halikuwa jambo lililowezekana kirahisi sana, Rais John Magufuli alipoingia madarakani mwaka 2015.

translation.en: Hapa Kazi Tu, or Only Work Here the slogan of the late Magufuli, seen on a green and yellow cap, featuring the colors of Magufuli's ruling CCM party.
translation.sw: Kauli mbiu yake ilikuwa Hapa Kazi Tu, ikionekana kwenye kofia ya kijani na njano, rangi za chama kinachotawala nchini Tanzania, Chama cha Mapinduzi, kilichoongozwa na Magufuli.

translation.en: Photo by Pernille Baerendtsen, used with permission.
translation.sw: Picha na Pernille Baerendtsen, imetumiwa kwa ruhusa.

translation.en: Across Tanzania, thousands of people are crowding into stadiums, airports, and curbsides to catch a glimpse of the late President John P. Magufuli, as his body is flown for week-long ceremonial processions in Dodoma, the capital, the islands of Zanzibar, Mwanza, and Chato, his home at Lake Victoria, where he will be laid to rest.
translation.sw: Maelfu ya watu wanakusanyika kwenye viwanja vya michezo, viwanja vya ndege na pembezoni mwa barabara, katika maeneo mbalimbali nchini Tanzania, maeneo ambayo mwili wa hayati Rais John Pombe Magufuli ulisafirishwa  kutoka Dar es salaam kuwawezesha wananchi kumuagwa kwa heshima kwa juma zima  jijini Dodoma, yalipo makao makuu ya serikali, visiwa vya Zanzibar, Mwanza na Chato, nyumbani kwake, pembezoni mwa Ziwa Victoria, ambako atazikwa.

translation.en: Magufuli was announced dead at the age of 61, on March 17, in a speech on national TV by then-Vice President Samia Suluhu Hassan, ending weeks of speculation about his health status and whereabouts.
translation.sw: Magufuli alitangazwa kufariki dunia akiwa na umri wa miaka 61, mnamo Machi 17, katika hotuba ya aliyekuwa Makamu wa Rais, Samia Suluhu Hassan, iliyorushwa kwenye kituo cha televisheni ya taifa, tangazo lililomaliza majuma kadhaa ya uvumi kuhusu hali ya afya ya rais na mahali alipo.

translation.en: He allegedly died of a chronic heart condition:
translation.sw: Inadaiwa alifariki kwa maradhi ya moyo:

translation.en: Death announcement for the president of the United Republic of Tanzania.
translation.sw: Taarifa ya Kifo Cha Rais Wa Jamhuri Ya Muungano Wa Tanzania.

translation.en: Magufulis sudden death has, however, left Tanzanians, and others, speculating about the future of politics and power in the East African nation.
translation.sw: Kifo cha ghafla cha Magufuli, hata hivyo, kimewaacha wa-Tanzania, na watu wengine, wakidadisi hatma ya siasa na utawala katika nchi hiyo ya Afrika Mashariki.

translation.en: On Friday, Hassan was sworn in as the sixth president of Tanzania, making history as Tanzanias first female president, the first president born on the semi-autonomous islands of Zanzibar, and Tanzanias first Muslim woman serving in the top role.
translation.sw: Siku ya Ijumaa, Hassan aliapishwa kuwa rais wa sita wa Tanzania, akiandika historia ya kuwa mwanamke wa kwanza kuwa Rais wa Tanzania, Rais wa pili kuzaliwa kwenye visiwa vya Zanzibar ambavyo ni sehemu ya Tanzania, na mwanamke wa kwanza mwislamu kuchukua nafasi ya juu kabisa ya utumishi nchini humo.

translation.en: Under Tanzanias constitution, Hassan will serve the remainder of Magufulis five-year term through 2025.
translation.sw: Chini ya katiba ya Tanzania, Hassan atatumikia kipindi chote kilichobaki cha muhula wa miaka mitano wa urais wa Magufuli uliokuwa uende mpaka 2025.

translation.en: In a short video clip, widely circulated on social media, Hassan dismisses any doubt about her ability to lead as a woman:
translation.sw: Katika video hii fupi, inayosambaa sana kwenye mitandao ya kijamii, Hassan anapuuza mashaka yoyote kuhusu uwezo wake wa kuongoza kama mwanamke:

translation.en: For those who have doubts that this woman will be able to be the president of the United Republic of Tanzania I would like to say to you that this person standing here is the president.
translation.sw: Kwa wale wote wenye mashaka kwamba mwanamke huyu ataweza kuwa rais wa Jamhuri ya Muungano wa Tanzania ningependa kuwaambia kuwa huyu aliyesimama hapa ni rais.

translation.en: [applause]   I would like to repeat that this person standing here is the president of the United Republic of Tanzania, [and] happens to be a woman.
translation.sw: [makofi]  ningependa kurudia kwamba aliyesimama hapa ni rais wa Jamhuri ya Muungano wa Tanzania, mwenye maumbile ya kike.

translation.en: As Tanzanians mourn Magufuli and process this sudden shift, many have welcomed Hassan.
translation.sw: Wakati wa-Tanzania wangali wakimwombolezea Magufuli na kuendelea kutafakari mabadiliko haya ya ghafla, wengi wanaonekana kuwa na matumaini makubwa na Hassan.

translation.en: Opposition politician Zitto Kabwe, party leader for ACT Wazalendo, finds hope in Hassans history of activism and work as a member of civil society.
translation.sw: Mwanasiasa wa upinzani Zitto Kabwe, kiongozi wa chama cha ACT Wazalendo, ana matumaini na historia ya Hassani katika harakati na kazi kama mwanachama wa asasi za kiraia.

translation.en: A very nice history of President @SuluhuSamia in 20 minutes, shared by herself [in her own words.]
translation.sw: Historia nzuri sana ya Rais @SuluhuSamia katika dakika 20 ikisimuliwa na yeye Mwenyewe.

translation.en: She says she was an activist.
translation.sw: Anasema alikuwa activist.

translation.en: She was a public servant.
translation.sw: Alikuwa mtu wa Asasi za Kiraia.

translation.en: Thanks Chambi for making sure I see this.
translation.sw: Asante Chambi kwa kufanya nione hii.

translation.en: Don't fail to listen.
translation.sw: Haichoshi kusikiliza.

translation.en: Whereas Hassan is commonly known as a consensus-builder, calling for unity and calm during the transition, Magufuli was known as the bulldozer, a nickname he initially earned as Minister of Works for his efficiency in getting roads built.
translation.sw: Wakati Hassan akifahamika zaidi kama mtu mpenda maridhiano, akitoa wito wa umoja na utulivu katika kipindi hiki cha mpito, Magufuli anafahamika kama bulidoza, jina la utani alilolipata kama Waziri wa Ujenzi kutambua ufanisi wake wa kuhakikisha barabara zinajengwa.

translation.en: Remembering Magufuli
translation.sw: Kumkumbuka Magufuli

translation.en: Kanga honoring the late John Magufuli, Tanzania's fifth president, who died on March 17, 2021.
translation.sw: Kanga ikimkumbuka marehemu John Magufuli, rais wa tano wa Tanzania, aliyefariki mnamo Machi 17, 2021.

translation.en: Goodbye our father, may God bless you / We will always remember our hero.
translation.sw: Buriani baba yetu mungu akulaze pema / Tutakukumbuka daima shujaa wetu

translation.en: Many Tanzanians   and Africans  are remembering Magufuli on social media for both the bad and the good.
translation.sw: Wa-Tanzania wengi   na Waafrika  kwa ujumla wanamkumbuka Magufuli kwenye mitandao ya kijamii kwa mabaya na mazuri.

translation.en: The Bad and the Good of Magufuli are equally undeniable, and it means the legacy he leaves behind is complicated but also valuable.
translation.sw: Mabaya na mazuri ya Magufuli hayawezi kupingika kwa uzito unaofanana, na hiyo ina maana kuwa kumbukumbu anayoiacha nyuma ina utata wake lakini yenye maana kubwa.

translation.en: The pro-Magufuli and anti-Magufuli camps will never agree and the debate will go on for years.
translation.sw: Kambi za wanaomwuunga mkono Magufuli na wanaompinga Magufuli hazitakaa zikubaliane na mjadala utaendelea kwa miaka mingi.

translation.en: Magufuli gained popularity early on in his presidency for his strong anti-corruption promise.
translation.sw: Magufuli alijipatia umaarufu katika siku za mwanzo za urais wake kwa ahadi zake za kupambana na ufisadi kwa nguvu.

translation.en: His efforts to boost major infrastructure projects and industrialization fed into many Tanzanians wishes for self-reliance after decades of international aid dependency.
translation.sw: Jitihada zake za kuanzisha miradi mikubwa inayolenga kuimarisha miundombinu na maendeleo ya viwanda ilikuza matumaini ya wa-Tanzania wengi kujitegemea baada ya miongo mingi ya kutegemea misaada ya kimataifa.

translation.en: Last April, for example, Magufuli rejected a $10 billion loan (United States dollars) from China for a proposed mega-port project in Dar es Salaam, saying only a drunkard would accept these terms.
translation.sw: Mwezi Aprili mwaka jana, mathalani, Magufuli alikataa mkopo wa dola bilioni 10 (dola za Marekani) kutoka China kwa ajili ya mradi wa bandari kubwa unaopendezwa kutekelezwa Bagamoyo karibu na jiji la Dar es Salaam, akisema, ni mlevi pekee anayeweza kukubaliana na masharti haya.

translation.en: This kanga promoted President Magufuli ahead of last year's elections.
translation.sw: Kanga hii ikimnadi Rais Magufuli kuelekea kwenye uchaguzi wa mwaka jana.

translation.en: It reads: Uliahidi Umetenda Tunatushukuru, in Swahili, or You promised, you delivered, we thank you, in English.
translation.sw: Inasomeka: Uliahidi Umetenda Tunatushukuru.

translation.en: It illustrates Magufuli's achievements road construction (barabara), plane (ndege), bridges (daraja) and modern train (reli ya kisasa).
translation.sw: Inapambwa na picha za mafanikio ya Magufuli kwenye  ujenzi wa barabara, ununuzi wa ndege, ujenzi wa madaraja na reli ya kisasa.

translation.en: Photo by Pernille Baerendtsen, used with permission.
translation.sw: Picha na Pernille Baerendtsen, imetumiwa kwa ruhusa.

translation.en: His anti-corruption focus also appealed to Western audiences, and the media initially covered his ideas positively.
translation.sw: Msimamo wake dhidi ya ufisadi pia ulizivutia nchi za Magharibi, na vyombo vya habari  mwanzoni viliandika msimamo wake kwa mtazamo chanya.

translation.en: To some, Magufuli is remembered as a true African statesman and pan-African putting Africa first.
translation.sw: Kwa baadhi, Magufuli anakumbukwa kama mwana wa Afrika kweli kweli na mtetezi wa Afrika aliyetanguliza maslahi ya Afrika.

translation.en: Others remember him as a populist president who promoted nationalism above all else:
translation.sw: Wengine wanamkumbuka kama rais aliyependa  umaarufu akitanguliza uzalendo kuliko kitu kingine chochote:

translation.en: Been watching Tanzania mourning John Magufuli.
translation.sw: Nimekuwa nikifuatilia Tanzania inavyomwombolezea John Magufuli.

translation.en: We denounced his autocratic ways, populism & sneered at his unscientific bent, but clearly, with the man and woman on the street, the fellow was quite popular.
translation.sw: Tulipinga njia zake za kidikteta na kumkosoa kwa tabia yake ya kupuuza sayansi, lakini ni wazi, kwa kutazama watu wanaosimama barabarani [kumuaga], huyu jamaa alikuwa maarufu.

translation.en: However, Magufuli applied an authoritarian-style rule during which human rights and free speech increasingly suffered.
translation.sw: Hata hivyo, utawala wa Magufuli alikuwa wa kimabavu na hivyo kuathiri sana haki za binadamu na uhuru wa kujieleza.

translation.en: Over the last six years, Human Rights Watch, Amnesty International, Committee to Protect Journalists, Global Voices and others have steadily tracked the deterioration of the civil and human rights protections.
translation.sw: Kwa zaidi ya miaka sita, mashirika ya Human Rights Watch, Amnesty International, Kamati ya Kulinda Waandishi wa Habari (CPJ), Global Voices na mengineyo  yamekuwa yakifuatilia kuzorota kwa ulinzi wa haki za kiraia na haki za binadamu.

translation.en: Tanzania dropped six places on Freedom Houses scorecard measuring democracy and freedom between 2020 and 2021.
translation.sw: Tanzania ilishuka nafasi sita kwenye kipimo cha Uhuru wa Kujieleza kilichopima demokrasia na uhuru kati ya 2020 na 2021.

translation.en: When parliament in January 2019 debated the Political Parties Act, leading to a restriction of opposition parties, it was interpreted as a bad omen when an owl entered parliament.
translation.sw: Wakati Bunge lilipokuwa likijadili Sheria ya Vyama vya Siasa Januari 2019, sheria iliyokosolewa kwa kuvibana zaidi vyama vya siasa, hiyo ilitafsiriwa kama dalili mbaya hasa bundi alipoonekana ndani ya jengo la bunge.

translation.en: Magufulis administration often used legislation like Electronic and Postal Communication (Online Content) (EPOCA), or the Cybercrimes Act to clamp down on opposition voices and public dissent.
translation.sw: Utawala wa Magufuli mara kadhaa ulitumia sheria mbalimbali kama ile Sheria ya Mawasiliano ya Kielektroniki na Posta (Maudhui ya Mtandaoni) (EPOCA), au  Sheria ya Makosa ya Mtandao kubana sauti pinzani na maoni huru.

translation.en: Amended regulations in 2020 prohibited citizens from sharing public information that may cause public chaos or disorder and content with information about an outbreak of a deadly or contagious disease without the government approval from top officials.
translation.sw: Mabadiliko ya kanuni mbalimbali ya mwaka 2020 yalilenga kuwazuia wananchi kusambaza habari zinazoweza kusababisha uvunjivu wa amani au uchochezi na maudhui yenye habari zinazohusu magonjwa ya mlipuko au magonjwa hatari bila kuithibitishwa na serikali kupitia kwa maafisa wake wa juu.

translation.en: Citizens couldnt speak about an earthquake that shook the coastal region last year, let alone the pandemic that reached Tanzania months later.
translation.sw: Raia hawakuweza kuzungumza chochote kuhusu tetemeko lililoyakumba maeneo ya pwani mwezi uliopita, mbali na habari za mlipuko nchini humo uliotokea miezi kadhaa baadaye.

translation.en: And during the two-week period of wild speculation about Magufulis whereabouts and health status in early March, at least four people were reportedly arrested for tweeting about the ill president.
translation.sw: Na wakati wa majuma mawili ya uvumi kuhusu alipo hasa Magufuli pamoja na afya yake mapema mwezi Machi, watu wasiopungua wanne walidaiwa kukamatwa kwa kosa la kutwiti kuhusu ugonjwa wa rais.

translation.en: Did he die of COVID-19, tho?
translation.sw: Au alifariki kwa Korona?

translation.en: Magufuli reportedly died of heart complications  an issue for which he had been receiving treatment for 10 years.
translation.sw: Magufuli anasemekana alifariki kwa maradhi ya moyo ambayo inasemekena amekuwa akipata matibabu yake kwa miaka 10.

translation.en: But Magufulis sudden death left many wondering if he had perhaps succumbed to COVID-19.
translation.sw: Lakini kifo cha ghafla cha Magufuli kiliwaacha wengi wakihoji kama huenda aliambukizwa virusi vya Korona (UVIKO-19).

translation.en: To many  not the least, Western audiences  Magufuli will be remembered for his COVID-19 denial.
translation.sw: Kwa wengi  hasa nchi za ki-Magharibi  Magufuli atakumbukwa kwa kukana uwepo wa ugonjwa wa Korona nchi mwake.

translation.en: Tanzania did initially impose restrictions and guidelines to curb the spread of the virus, but Magufuli repeatedly denounced lockdowns as a greater threat to the economy than the virus.
translation.sw: Wakati ugonjwa huu unaingia Tanzania, serikali ilichukua tahadhari pamoja na kutoa miongozo ya namna ua kupambana na kusambaa kwa ugonjwa huu, lakini baadae, mara kwa mara, Magufuli amekuwa alilichukulia zuio la  watu kuendelea na shughuli zao kama tishio kubwa la uchumi kuliko virusi vya ugonjwa huu.

translation.en: He actively rebuked international guidance on public health protocols like wearing masks, social distancing and vaccines  urging citizens to use prayer and herbal remedies instead.
translation.sw: Mara nyingi alipinga mwongozo wa kimataifa kuhusu kanuni za afya kama kuvaa barakoa, kuepuka misongamano na chanjo  akiwasihi wananchi kutegemea maombi na tiba za asili kama hatua mbadala.

translation.en: After Magufuli halted the publication of COVID-19 data last year in April, he then insisted COVID-19 had been fended off by prayer.
translation.sw: Baada ya Magufuli kuzuia kutangazwa kwa takwimu za maambukizi ya Korona mwaka jana mwezi Aprili, alisisitiza kwamba Korona imeshindwa kwa nguvu za maombi.

translation.en: Soon after, he declared Tanzania COVID-19 free.
translation.sw: Baadae kidogo, alitangaza kwamba Tanzania  haina ugonjwa wa Korona.

translation.en: Though it is impossible to say exactly how COVID-19 has affected Tanzania, it did not go away.
translation.sw: Ingawa haiwezekani kusema ni kwa kiwango gani Korona iliiathiri Tanzania, tunachofahamu ni kwamba Korona haikuondoka.

translation.en: When a new COVID-19 wave reemerged in January, many Tanzanians shared testimonies on social media of becoming ill with COVID-19-like symptoms.
translation.sw: Mlipuko mpya wa Korona ulipotokea Januari, wa-Tanzania wengi walizungumzia shuhuda zao kwenye mitandao ya kijamii wakisimulia vile walivyougua ugonjwa wenye dalili kama Korona.

translation.en: Knowing that it could be punishable to discuss COVID-19, people wrote nimonia mpya or the new pneumonia and breathing problems.
translation.sw: Kwa kufahamu kuwa wangeweza kukamatwa kwa kosa la kujadili Korona, mijadala hiyo ilikwenda kwa jina la nimonia mpya na changamoto za upumuaji.

translation.en: But Magufuli doubled down with his anti-vaccination stance in a speech from his home in Chato, on January 27:
translation.sw: Lakini Magufuli aliendea na msimamo wake wa kupinga chanjo katika hotuba  aliyoitoa nyumbani kwake Chato, mnamo Januari 27:

translation.en: If the white man was able to come up with vaccinations, he should now have found a vaccination against AIDS; he would now have found a vaccination against tuberculosis; he would now have found a vaccination against malaria; he would now have found a vaccination against cancer.
translation.sw: Kama mzungu anaweza kuja na chanjo, basi angeshagundua chanjo ya UKIMWI; angeshagundua chanzo cha kifua kikuu; na sasa hivi angeshajua chanjo ya malaria; angeshapata chanjo ya kansa.

translation.en: This was a major departure from Magufuli's predecessor, President Jakaya Kikwete, who served as global ambassador for immunization in early 2016.
translation.sw: Kauli hii inaweza kuchukuliwa kama kumrudisha nyuma mtangulizi wa Magufuli, Rais Jakaya Kikwete, aliyewahi kuhudumu kama balozi wa dunia kwa kinga mwanzoni mwa 2016.

translation.en: Last month, Magufuli finally did admit that his country had a coronavirus problem, urging Tanzanians to wear locally made face masks.
translation.sw: Mwezi uliopita, Magufuli hatimaye alikiri kwamba nchi yake ina tatizo la korona, akiwasihi wa-Tanzania kuvaa barakoa walizotengeneza wenyewe.

translation.en: It took the death of Zanzibars Vice President Seif Sharif Hamad, apparently, to break Magufulis intransigence.
translation.sw: Wadadisi wa mambo wanasema hatua hii ya Magufuli kubadili mtazamo kuhusu korona ilichangiwa na kifo cha Makamu wa Zanzibar  Seif Sharif Hamad.

translation.en: Several high-ranking officials from the political elite and close to Magufuli have also died of the disease.
translation.sw: Maafisa kadhaa wa ngazi za juu kutoka kwenye tabaka la wanasiasa maarufu walio karibu na Magufuli wamefariki kwa ugonjwa huo.

translation.en: As throngs of people continue to gather to pay their respects to the late president, his death has also brought some relief.
translation.sw: Wakati makundi ya watu wengi yakiendelea kukusanyika kutoa heshima zao za mwisho kwa hayati rais, kwa upande mwingine kifo chake kimeleta ahueni fulani.

translation.en: Shortly after Magufulis death, writer Elsie Eyakuze came forward on social media to speak openly about what it was like to live through the pandemic in Tanzania, with a president who showed willful disregard for the coronavirus.
translation.sw: Muda mfupi baada ya kifo cha Magufuli, mwandishi Elsie Eyakuze alijitokeza kwenye mitandao ya kijamii kuzungumza wazi wazi kuhusu maisha yalivyokuwa katika kipindi cha mlipuko wa Korona nchini Tanzania, pale rais alivyoonesha kupuuza kwa makusudi virusi vya Korona.

translation.en: In a long Twitter thread, she wrote:
translation.sw: Katika uzi mrefu kwenye mtandao wa Twitter, alisema:

translation.en: Now.
translation.sw: Now.

translation.en: For the real story I have been at a loss to tell for too long.
translation.sw: For the real story I have been at a loss to tell for too long.

translation.en: #thread.
translation.sw: #uzi.

translation.en: In March of 2020, the Covid19 pandemic started to rampage throughout the world.
translation.sw: Mwezi Machi mwaka 2020, mlipuko wa Korona ulianza kushika kasi duniani kote.

translation.en: It did not spare Tanzania.
translation.sw: Tanzania haikuachwa.

translation.en: But in April of 2020 we stopped all public efforts to halt is spread in the country.
translation.sw: Lakini mwezi Aprili ya 2020 tuliachana na juhudi zozote za pamoja kudhibiti kuenea kwa ugonjwa huu nchini.

translation.en: In one of her last tweets, she asks:
translation.sw: Kwenye twiti zake za mwisho, akasema:

translation.en: Did he die of Covid19, tho.
translation.sw: Hivi alifariki kwa Korona?

translation.en: Yes, he did.
translation.sw: Ndio, bila shaka.

translation.en: And him, and her.
translation.sw: Huyu na yule.

translation.en: And them.
translation.sw: Na wao.

translation.en: Tanzanians.
translation.sw: Wa-Tanzania.

translation.en: And beyond.
translation.sw: Na kwingineko.

translation.en: But they are not who you want to talk about is it?
translation.sw: Lakini sio wale unaotaka kuwazungumzia sio?

translation.en: They are not The Story.
translation.sw: Wao sio Simulizi lenyewe.

translation.en: It is.
translation.sw: Ni sehemu ya simulizi.

translation.en: A friend gets in touch.
translation.sw: Rafiki anakutafuta.

translation.en: Can you?
translation.sw: Unaweza?

translation.en: Wellcan I make it personal?
translation.sw: Naamtunaweza kulifanya jambo hili likawa baina yetu?

translation.en: Please do.
translation.sw: Tafadhali fanya hivyo.

translation.en: I will.
translation.sw: Nitafanya hivyo.

translation.en: Tomorrow.
translation.sw: Kesho.

translation.en: In an open letter to Magufuli, Eyakuze points out the inconsistency of Magufuli's ideas, but also applies the empathy Magufuli himself seemed to lack, at times  and forgives him.
translation.sw: Katika barua ya wazi kwa Magufuli,  Eyakuze anaeleza kubadilika badilika kwa misimamo ya Magufuli, lakini anatumia mbinu ya kuelewa hisia za mwingine, mbinu ambayo inaonekana kumshinda Magufuli mwenyewe  mara nyingine  na kumsamehe.

translation.en: Tanzanians are coming to terms with the complexity and gravity of Magufulis death and the legacy he left behind  with a close eye on the future.
translation.sw: Wa-Tanzania wanakubaliana na utata na uzito wa kifo cha Magufuli na kumbukumbu anayoiacha nyuma yake  wakati huo macho yao yakiwa yamefungwa yakitazama mbele.

translation.en: Who has the power to decide what does or doesn't appear on the internet?
translation.sw: Nani ana nguvu ya kuamua kitu gani kionekani na kipi kisionekane kwenye mtandao?

translation.en: That's the fundamental question posed by activist and writer Jillian C. York in her upcoming book Silicon Values,* set for release on March 23, 2021.
translation.sw: Hili ndilo swali muhimu linaloulizwa na mwanaharakati na mwandishi Jillian C. York kwenye kitabu chake kijacho Silicon Values,* kinachotarajiwa kuzinduliwa mnamo Machi 23, 2021.

translation.en: On Wednesday, February 10 at 2:00pm GMT, Jillian will join Global Voices executive director Ivan Sigal for a live video conversation about the book, which, as she notes in the preface, seeks to encapsulate the history of how Silicon Valleys major communications platforms created a system apartspecifically, a system that governs how we can express ourselves online.
translation.sw: Mnamo Jumatano, Februari 10 saa 2:00mchana GMT, Jillian ataungana na mkurugenzi mtendaji wa Global Voices Ivan Sigal kwa mazungumzo mubashara ya video kuhusu kitabu chake, ambacho, kama anavyoeleza kwenye dibaji, tunatafuta kuchimbua historia ya namna majukwaa makubwa ya mawasiliano ya Silicon Valley yalivyotengeneza mfumo wake wa kipekeehususani, mfumo ambao unatawala namna tunavyoweza kujieleza mtandaoni.

translation.en: Jillian, who is the Director of International Freedom of Expression at the Electronic Frontier Foundation, is also a long-standing member of Global Voices, where she cut her teeth writing about digital rights and freedom of expression in the context of the Middle East.
translation.sw: Jillian, ambaye ni Mkurugenzi wa Uhuru wa Kujieleza wa Kimataifa katika shirika la Electronic Frontier Foundation, na ni mwanachama maarufu wa siku nyingi wa Global Voices, ambako anapambana kuandika kuhusu uhuru wa kidijitali na uhuru wa kujieleza katika mukhtadha wa Mashariki ya Kati.

translation.en: The session is free and open to the public and will be live-streamed on Facebook Live, YouTube, and Twitch.
translation.sw: Kipindi hiki ni bure na wazi kwa umma na kitaruka moja kwa moja kwenye mtandao wa  Facebook Live, YouTube, na Twitch.

translation.en: We look forward to having you join us on Wednesday, February 10 at 2:00pm GMT (click here to convert to your local time zone)!
translation.sw: Tunasuburi kwa hamu kukuona ukiungana nasi Jumatani, Februari 10 saa 2:00mchana GMT (bofya hapa kuangalia muda unaoendana na eneo ulipo)!

translation.en: *Buying the book through this link helps support Global Voices.
translation.sw: *Kununua kitabu hiki kupitia kiungo hiki kutasaidia kuichangia Global Voices.

translation.sw: Kijana akitazama simu yake ya kiganjani nchini Tanzania, Desemba 9, 2018.

translation.en: Photo by Riaz Jahanpour, for USAID Tanzania / Digital Development Communications via Flickr, CC BY 2.0.
translation.sw: Picha na Riaz Jahanpour, kwa mradi wa USAID / Mawasiliano ya Maendeleo ya ki-Dijitali kupitia mtandao wa Flickr, CC BY 2.0.

translation.en: The novel coronavirus was first reported in Tanzania in mid-March 2020.
translation.sw: Kirusi cha kwanza cha Korona kiliripotiwa nchini Tanzania katikati ya mwezi Machi, 2020.

translation.en: But, after recording up to 509 cases and 21 deaths in late April, the nation announced its status as coronavirus-free in June.
translation.sw: Hata hivyo, baada ya takwimu kuendelea kupanda na kufikia wagonjwa 509 na vifo 21 mwishoni mwa mwezi Aprili, serikali ya Tanzania ilitangaza kuwa hakuna hata mgonjwa mmoja wa UVIKO-19 mwezi Juni.

translation.en: That same month, Kassim Majaliwa, the countrys prime minister, told parliament there are only 66 active coronavirus cases in the country, but did not provide further details.
translation.sw: Mwezi huo huo, Kassim Majaliwa, Waziri mkuu wa nchi hiyo, aliliambia bunge kwamba kulikuwa na wagonjwa 66 tu  nchini kote, lakini hakutoa ufafanuzi zaidi.

translation.en: Since then, government has been silent on the coronavirus with a strong politic of denial and no data released to the public on infections or deaths.
translation.sw: Tangu wakati huo, serikali imekuwa kimya kuhusiana na virusi vya Korona huku matamko makali ya kisiasa kukanusha uwepo wa virusi hivyo yakiendelea kutolewa bila kuambatana na takwimu zozote za wagonjwa wala vifo.

translation.en: Today, most activities continue business-as-usual, including Tanzania's tourism industry, attracting thousands of visitors to its airports with few public health protocols in place.
translation.sw: Leo, shughuli nyingi zinaendelea kama kawaida, ikiwa ni pamoja na sekta ya utalii nchini Tanzania, inayovutia maelfu ya wageni kuingia nchini humo kupitia viwanja vya ndege visivyo na utaratibu wa kufanya ukaguzi wa kutosha.

translation.en: The airport in Zanzibar received the lowest 2-star rating on COVID-19 health and safety measures by Skytrax COVID-19 Airport Safety Rating, the worlds only assessment and certification of airport health and safety measures during the pandemic.
translation.sw: Uwanja wa ndege Zanzibar ulipata alama ya chini kabisa ya nyota mbili kwenye tathmini ya afya na usalama iliyofanywa na Skytrax Wanaohakiki Hali ya Usalama katika Viwanja vya Ndege dhidi ya UVIKO-19, kipimo pekee cha uhakika kuthibitisha hatua zinazochukuliwa na mamlaka za viwanja vya ndege kuimarisha tahadhari wakati wa mlipuko wa ugonjwa huo.

translation.en: According to their report, new cases of the South African virus variant were confirmed in two travelers flying into Denmark on January 19, from Tanzania.
translation.sw: Kwa mujibu wa repoti hiyo ya Skytrax, wagonjwa wapya wawili walioambukizwa aina mpya ya kirusi cha Afrika Kusini walithibitika kusafiri kuingia Denmaki mnamo Janurari 19, wakitokea Tanzania.

translation.en: The highly anticipated annual African music festival, Sauti za Busara, will take place in mid-February in Zanzibar, with support from the European Union in Tanzania and several European embassies, despite the risk of highly contagious new coronavirus variants circulating in the United Kingdom, South Africa, and Brazil.
translation.sw: Tamasha kubwa la muziki linalosubiriwa kwa hamu ambalo hufanyika mara moja kwa mwaka, Sauti za Busara, litafanyika katikati ya mwezi Februari visiwani Zanzibar, kwa hisani ya Umoja wa Ulaya nchini Tanzania na baadhi ya balozi za nchi za Ulaya zilizoko nchini Tanzania, wakati huu ambapo nchi inakabiliwa na hatari kubwa ya aina hiyo mpya ya kirusi wa Korona inayosambaa katika nchi za Uingereza, Afrika Kusini, na Brazil.

translation.en: On January 24, the Catholic Archdiocese of Arusha issued a letter warning congregants of the existence of COVID-19 in Tanzania, and urged members to follow all necessary public health measures to prevent the spread of the virus in churches.
translation.sw: Mnamo Januari 24, Jimbo Kuu Katoliki la Arusha lilitoa waraka wa maonyo kwa waumini wake dhidi ya uwepo wa UVIKO-19 nchini Tanzania, na kuwaasa waumini wake kufuata tahadhari zote muhimu za afya  ili kujilinda na kusambaa kwa virusi hivyo makanisani.

translation.en: While Tanzanias recorded cases are moderate compared to other countries, the governments silence about COVID-19 data raised grave concerns among public health experts and human rights activists, who are forbidden from speaking or talking about COVID-19 in digital spaces.
translation.sw: Ingawa kumbukumbu zinaonesha kuwa Tanzania ina wangonjwa wachache ukilinganisha na nchi nyingine, ukimya wa serikali kuhusu takwimu za UVIKO-19 umeleta hali ya wasiwasi miongoni mwa wataalam wa afya na wanaharakati wa haki za binadamu, ambao  wamezuiwa kuzungumza na kuongelea UVIKO-19  katika majukwaa ya mitandaoni.

translation.en: The country updated its 2018 Electronic and Postal Communications (Online Content) Regulations in July, prohibiting any content with information with regard to the outbreak of a deadly or contagious disease in the country or elsewhere without the approval of the respective authorities.
translation.sw: Nchi hiyo ilifanya marekebisho ya toleo la 2018 la Kanuni za Mawasiliano ya Kieletroniki na Posta (Maudhui ya Mtandaoni mwezi Julai, ikizuia maudhui yenye taarifa zinazohusiana na mlipuko wa ugonjwa hatari au unaoua nchini au kokote pale bila ruhusa ya mamlaka husika.

translation.en: Despite initial restrictions to contain the spread of the virus, schools, colleges, offices and other social activities are back to normal.
translation.sw: Ingawa hatua za awali za kudhibiti maambukizi ya virusi zilichukuliwa, hivi sasa shule, vyuo, ofisi, na shughuli nyingine za kijamii zimerudi katika hali ya kawaida.

translation.en: Even as the virus continues to spread in the region.
translation.sw: Hata hivyo, virusi hivyo vinaendelea kusambaa nchini humo.

translation.en: President John Magufuli had cast doubt on the credibility of laboratory equipment and technicians after secret tests allegedly performed on papaya and a goat gave positive test results.
translation.sw: Rais John Magufuli ameonesha wasiwasi na ubora wa vifaa vya maabara na uaminifu wa watalaam wake baada ya majaribio ya siri kudaiwa kufanyika kwa kutumia mapapai na mbuzi kuleta majibu kuwa vilikuwa na maambukizi ya virusi hivyo.

translation.en: The president said releasing this data was causing unnecessary panic and soon after, fired Nyambura Moremi, director of the national health laboratory, for allegedly botching the testing results.
translation.sw: Rais alisema alisema kutoa takwimu hizi kulikuwa kunaleta tahayaruki isiyo na sababu na muda mfupi baadae, alimfukuza kazi Nyambura Moremi, mkurugenzi wa maabara ya afya ya taifa, kwa madai ya kuchakachua matokeo ya vipimo.

translation.en: The ministerial COVID-19 information team was dissolved.
translation.sw: Timu ya kushughulikia UVIKO-19 iliyoundwa na waziri nayo iliishia kuvunjwa.

translation.en: In June, Magufuli thanked God for eradicating the virus from Tanzania, following three days of national prayer.
translation.sw: Mwezi June, Magufuli alimshukuru Mungu kwa kumwondoa kirusi huyo  kutoka Tanzania, kufuatia siku tatu za maombi ya kitaifa.

translation.en: He made this announcement publicly during a Sunday service, amidst a praising congregation, making claims that God had answered their prayers.
translation.sw: Alitoa tangazo hilo hadharani akiwa kwenye ibada ya Jumapili, katikati ya waumini waliokuwa wakimsifu, wakidai kuwa Mungu amejibu maombi yao.

translation.en: He also praised congregants for not wearing face masks, despite calls from the World Health Organization to wear masks to prevent the spread of the virus.
translation.sw: Magufuli aliwasifu waumini hao kwa kutokuvaa barakoa, pamoja na wito wa Shirika la Afya Duniani kuwaomba watu wavae barakoa kuzuia kuenea kwa virusi hivyo.

translation.en: Magufuli, nicknamed the bulldozer for his tough anti-corruption stance, was reelected for a second time in October 2020 during an election that was highly criticized for stifling dissent and opposition.
translation.sw: Magufuli, aliyepewa jina la utani la bulldozer kufuatia msimamo wake mkali dhidi ya vitendo vya ufisadi, alichaguliwa kwa mara ya pili mwezi Oktoba 2020 katika uchaguzi uliokosolewa sana kwa kuwabana wapinzani.

translation.en: Just before the elections, Tanzanians experienced an internet shutdown with access denied to all the major social media platforms including Instagram, WhatsApp and Twitter.
translation.sw: Kabla ya uchaguzi huo, Watanzania walishangazwa na kuzimwa kwa mitandao ambapo majukwaa yote makubwa ya mitandao ya kijamii ikiwa ni pamoja na Instagram, WhatsApp na Twitter yalifungwa yasipatikane.

translation.en: To date, many Tanzanians cannot access Twitter without using a Virtual Private Network (VPN).
translation.sw: Mpaka leo, Watanzania wengi hawawezi kuingia kwenye mtandao wa Twita bila kutumia teknolojia ya kutumia mitandao ya siri yaani VPN.

translation.en: Over the last five years, the Magufuli administration has narrowed democratic and civic spaces and has cracked down hard on freedom of expression and access to information in digital spaces.
translation.sw: Kwa zaidi ya miaka mitano, utawala wa Magufuli umebana mno uhuru wa demokrasia na shughuli za kiraia sambamba na kuminya uhuru wa kujieleza na haki ya kupata taarifa kwenye majukwaa ya kidijitali.

translation.en: With the governments strong denial stance, Tanzanians are not allowed to release any COVID-19 data that the government has not verified, which means that ordinary citizens as well as journalists and medical professionals are barred from commenting on COVID-19 in digital spaces, or accessing information.
translation.sw: Kufuatia msimamo mkali wa serikali kukana uwepo wa UVIKO-19, Watanzania hawaruhusiwi kutoa takwimu zozote za UVIKO-19 ambazo serikali haijazihakiki, hii ikiwa na maana kwamba wananchi wa kawaida ikiwa ni pamoja na waandishi wa habari na wataalam wa afya wanazuiwa kutoa maoni kuhusu UVIKO-19 kwenye majukwaa ya kidijitali au kupata taarifa muhimu.

translation.en: Access to COVID-19 information has become an elite privilege, according to one doctor from the national hospital who spoke to Global Voices on the condition of anonymity, fearing reprisal.
translation.sw: Haki ya kupata taarifa za UVIKO-19 imegeuka kuwa upendeleo wa tabaka la watu fulani, kwa mujibu wa daktari mmoja wa hospitali ya taifa aliyeongea na Global Voices kwa masharti ya kutokufahamika, akiogopa kufukuzwa kazi.

translation.en: Unlike other countries with established COVID-19 information response teams who give daily updates on COVID-19, Tanzania simply offers a website with limited and outdated COVID-19 information.
translation.sw: Tofauti na nchi nyingine zenye timu maalum zinazofanyia kazi taarifa za UVIKO-19, Tanzania ina tovuti yenye taarifa chache zilizopitwa na wakati kuhusu UVIKO-19.

translation.en: The denial has been so convincing that its now widely accepted by Tanzanians, including medical experts, who disregard basic safety measures like wearing face masks and social distancing.
translation.sw: Matamshi ya kukataa uwepo wa UVIKO-19 yanaonekana kukubalika na Watanzania wengi, ikiwa ni pamoja na wataalam wa afya, wanaopuuza hatua muhimu za kuchukua tahadharani kama kuvaa barakoa na kuepuka misongamano.

translation.en: Global Voices visited major hospitals such Muhimbili, the government referral hospital in Dar es Salaam, the cultural capital, as well as Benjamin Mkapa Hospital in Dodoma, the political capital, and witnessed very few measures taken to stop the spread of the coronavirus disease.
translation.sw: Global Voices ilitembelea hospitali kadhaa ikiwemo Muhimbili, hospitali ya rufaa ya serikali iliyoko jijini Dar es Salaam, mji mkuu wa kiutamaduni nchini humo, pamoja na Hospitali ya  Benjamin Mkapa jijini Dodoma, mji mkuu wa kisiasa, na kushuhudia tahadhari chache zikichukuliwa kukabiliana na kuenea kwa virusi vya ugonjwa wa korona.

translation.en: People are allowed to enter hospital premises without wearing masks, there are few working hygiene and washing facilities and those that do exist lack water or are broken, which was witnessed, for example, in the pregnant mothers clinic at Muhimbili.
translation.sw: Watu wanaruhusiwa kuingia kwenye maeneo ya hospitali bila kuvaa barakoa, kuna vifaa vichache vya usafi na kunawa mikono na vile vilivyopo havina maji au vimevunjika, hali iliyoshuhudiwa, kwa mfano, kwenye wodi ya wanawake wajawazito Muhimbili.

translation.en: While the Magufuli administration has shown little concern about the impact of the virus on everyday citizens, many government ministries and departments acknowledge that COVID-19 still exists.
translation.sw: Wakati utawala wa Magufuli haujaonesha kujali madhara ya virusi hivi kwa maisha ya kila siku ya wananchi, mawaziri wengi wa serikali yake na idara zake wanakubali kwamba UVIKO-19 upo.

translation.en: Tanzania's minister of finance urges ministry staff to take all precautions against the coronavirus, while also saying COVID-19 is not an issue in Tanzania.
translation.sw: Waziri wa Fedha wa Tanzania awataka wafanyakazi wa Wizara yake kuchukua tahadhari zote kujilinda na virusi vya korona, wakati huo huo akisema Tanzania haisumbuliwi na UVIKO-19.

translation.en: Screenshot from Mwananchi newspaper.
translation.sw: Picha ya gazeti la Mwananchi.

translation.en: For example, when Magufuli was sworn in for the second time last year, authorities did practice COVID-19 prevention measures, requiring all attendees to have their temperatures taken and wash their hands at hygiene stations with hand sanitizer provided.
translation.sw: Kwa mfano, Magufuli alipoapishwa kwa mara ya pili mwaka jana, mamlaka za serikali zilichukua tahadhari nyingi dhidi ya UVIKO-19, wakiwalazimisha wahudhuriaji wote kupima joto la mwili na kuosha mikono yao kwenye sehemu maalumu zenye maji na vipupushi.

translation.en: On January 25, Tanzania's Minister of Finance Dr. Philip Mpango urged his staff to take precautions against COVID-19 while at the same denying its existence in Tanzania, during a meeting in Dodoma, the capital.
translation.sw: Mnamo Januari 25, Waziri wa Fedha wa Tanzania, Dk. Philip Mpango  aliwataka watumishi wa wizara yake  kuchukua tahadhari dhidi ya UVIKO-19 na kwa wakati huo huo akikanusha kuwepo kwa ugonjwa huo nchini Tanzania, wakati wa mkutano wake jijini Dodoma, yalipo makao makuu ya kisiasa.

translation.en: Most in-country experts are afraid to speak up, fearing retaliation.
translation.sw: Wataalam wengi wa ndani wanaogopa kuzungumza,   kwa hofu ya kuchukuliwa hatua.

translation.en: Global Voices spoke with one medical expert who believed Tanzania may be experiencing a second wave of the outbreak but that this information was kept secret from the public.
translation.sw: Global Voices ilizungumza na mtalaam mmoja wa afya aliyeamini kwamba Tanzania inaweza kuwa inakabiliwa na wimbi la pili ya mlipuko lakini akifikiri wananchi walifichwa taarifa hizi.

translation.en: The expert did not want to be named, fearing reprisal.
translation.sw: Mtaalam huyo hakutaka kutajwa jina, akiogopa kuchukuliwa hatua.

translation.en: Another medical expert told Global Voices under the conditions of anonymity that people must know their COVID-19 status so that they can take measures to prevent its spread in their communities.
translation.sw: Mtaalam mwingine wa afya aliiambia Global Voices kwa sharti ya kutokutajwa jina kwamba watu lazima wafahamu mwenendo wa hali ya UVIKO-19 ili waweze kuchukua tahadhari kujilinda na kuzuia kusambaa kwa virusi hivyo kwa jamii zao.

translation.en: He said that leaving people uninformed makes their job very difficult and hopes that all Tanzanians will try to protect themselves by taking all precautions advised by WHO.
translation.sw: Alisema kwamba kuwaacha watu gizani kunafanya kazi yao iwe ngumu lakini aliamini kwamba Watanzania watajaribu kujilinda wenyewe kwa kuchukua tahadhari zote kama inavyoshauriwa na Shirika la Afya Duniani (WHO).

translation.en: He told Global Voices:
translation.sw: Aliiambia Global Voices:

translation.en: Politicians have taken over the whole COVID[-19] issue and they are playing a dangerous game, but when people will start dying they will start sacking medical staff.
translation.sw: Wanasiasa wameteka suala hili zima la UVIKO-19 na wanacheza mchezo hatari, lakini watu watakapoanza kufa wataanza kuwafukuza wafanyakazi wa afya.

translation.en: Another doctor who spoke to Global Voices anonymously said that although there is some hope in getting a vaccine, Tanzanias denial may slow down access to it, as the government has not taken any steps to acquire it on the global market, opting instead to invest in herbal remedies.
translation.sw: Daktari mwingine aliyezungumza na Global Voices kwa sharti la kutokutaja jina lake alisema kwamba ingawa kuna matumaini ya kupata kinga, matamshi ya serikali ya Tanzania kukanusha uwepo wa ugonjwa huo yatakwamisha upatikanaji wake, kwa sababu serikali haijachukua hatua yoyote kuitafuta kwenye masoko ya dunia, na  badala yake kukimbilia tiba za mitishamba.

translation.en: In December 2020, Health Minister spokesman Gerald Chamii cast doubt on global vaccines, telling the East African:
translation.sw: Mwezi Desemba 2020, Msemaji wa Waziri wa Afya Gerald Chamii alionesha mashaka yake kwa chanjo zinazopigiwa chapuo duniani, akiliambia jarida la East African:

translation.en: It takes not less than six months to find a vaccine or cure for a certain disease.
translation.sw: Haichukui hata miezi sita kupata chanjo au tiba ya ugonjwa fulani.

translation.en: We have fared on our own since the pandemic spread, I am not sure if it is wise to have a vaccine imported and distributed to the citizens without undertaking clinical testing to approve if it is safe for our people.
translation.sw: Tumejikwamisha wenyewe tangu mlipuko uanze, sina hakika kama ni busara kuingiza kinga hiyo na kuisambaza kwa wananchi bila kufanya majaribio ya kitabibu kuthibitisha usalama wake kwa watu wetu.

translation.en: Access to information is essential to democracy and development.
translation.sw: Kupata taarifa ni suala muhimu kwa demokrasia na maendeleo.

translation.en: Tanzanias cyber laws have been abused to target dissenting voices and those who have spoken out against Tanzanias handling of COVID-19.
translation.sw: Sheria za matumizi ya mtandao nchini Tanzania zimetumiwa vibaya zikilenga kunyamazisha sauti na wale wanaozungumza kupinga namna Tanzania inavyoshughulikia suala la UVIKO-19.

translation.en: Freedom of expression, including the right to access, receive and impart information, is enshrined in international law.
translation.sw: Uhuru wa kujieleza, ikiwa ni pamoja na haki ya kupata, kupokea, na kusambaza habari, imelindwa na sheria za kimataifa.

translation.en: In Tanzania, the right to be informed, and to access and disseminate information, is recognized in Articles 18(1) and 18(2) of the Constitution of the United Republic of Tanzania.
translation.sw: Nchini Tanzania, haki ya kuhabarishwa, na kupata taarifa na kusambaza taarifa, inatambuliwa na Ibara 18(1) na 18(2) ya Katiba ya Jamhuri ya Muungano wa Tanzania.

translation.en: Nevertheless, these rights are more cosmetic than based in reality.
translation.sw: Hata hivyo, haki hizi zinaonekana kuwa nadharia zaidi kuliko uhalisia.

translation.en: With full-throttled COVID-19 denial and laws in place to prevent the open exchange of information and opinions on the disease on- and offline, Tanzanians are left with severely limited access to information and many are afraid to speak out.
translation.sw: Katika hali ambayo serikali inakanusha uwepo wa UVIKO-19 na kuwepo kwa sheria zinazozuia watu kupeana taarifa na kutoa maoni kuhusu ugonjwa huu, mtandaoni na mtaani, Watanzania wanaachwa bila taarifa za msingi na wengi wanaogopa kuzungumza.

translation.en: This article is part of a series of posts examining interference with digital rights under lockdowns and beyond during the COVID-19 pandemic in nine African countries: Uganda, Zimbabwe, Mozambique, Algeria, Nigeria, Namibia, Tunisia, Tanzania and Ethiopia.
translation.sw: Makala haya ni sehemu ya mfululizo wa makala zinazochunguza kuingiliwa kwa haki za kidijitali wakati wa hatua za kuwafungia watu ndani kudhibiti kusambaa kwa UVIKO-19 katika nchi tisa za Afrika: Uganda, Zimbabwe, Msumbiji, Aljeria, Naijeria, Namibia, Tunisia, Tanzania na Ethiopia.

translation.en: The project is funded by the Africa Digital Rights Fund of The Collaboration on International ICT Policy for East and Southern Africa (CIPESA).
translation.sw: Mradi huu umefadhiliwa na Mfuko wa Haki za Kidijitali Afrika unaendeshwa na Ushirikiano wa Sera za Kimataifa za TEHAMA kwa Afrika Mashariki na Kusiki mwa Bara la Afrika  (CIPESA).

translation.en: Photo showing the completion of the police training course in Mozambique | screen shot, 19 August,  STV  Youtube, taken by the author.
translation.sw: Picha ikionesha uhitimu wa mafunzo ya polisi huko Msumbiji | picha ya skrini ya Agosti 19,  STV  Youtube, ilipigwa na mmiliki

translation.en: A document from the Mozambican Police (PRM) that has leaked in local media in early August revealed that 15 students had become pregnant at a police training school in Matalane, a district of Maputo province.
translation.sw: Nyaraka  za jeshi la polisi  la Msumbiji zilizovujishwa katika vyombo vya habari mapema mwezi Agosti zilidhihirisha kwamba wanafunzi 15 walipata ujauzito wakiwa katika shule ya mafunzo ya polisi huko Matalane, wilaya ya  jimbo la Maputo.

translation.en: The document states that the pregnancies resulted from the students sexual relations with their instructors, without specifying whether these relations were consensual.
translation.sw: Nyaraka hizo zinasema  kuwa mimba hizo ni matokeo ya uhusiano wa kingono uliopo baina ya wanafunzi na wakufunzi bila kufafanua kama mahusiano hayo yalikuwa ya hiari.

translation.en: Moreover, it states that pregnant students will not be able to complete the course at present, and will have their trips back to their home provinces paid for by the police.
translation.sw: Hata hivyo imeelezwa kwamba wanafunzi wajawazito hawataweza kumaliza mafunzo kwa sasa, na watasafiri kurudi makwao wakilipiwa usafiri na polisi.

translation.en: Finally, it says that the instructors involved will be suspended.
translation.sw: Mwisho taarifa hiyo ikasema kuwa wakufunzi waliohusika watasimamishwa kazi.

translation.en: When asked about the case by the newspaper O País on August 8, Police Commander General Bernardino Rafael said that those involved would face disciplinary proceedings.
translation.sw: Alipoulizwa na gazeti la O País hapo Agosti 8, Kamanda wa Jeshi la Polisi Jenerali Bernardino Rafael alisema kuwa wahusika wote watakutana na taratibu za kinidhamu.

translation.en: It did not take long before the case was widely condemned on social media.
translation.sw: Haikuchukua muda mrefu kabla shauri hili kulaaniwa vikali katika mitandao ya kijamii.

translation.en: Several users publicly expressed their disapproval of the school's measures, as well as demanding justice for the women.
translation.sw: Watumiaji kadhaa wa mitandao walieleza wazi kutokufurahishwa na maamuzi ya shule hiyo na hivyo kutaka haki ifanyike kwa wanawake hao.

translation.en: Activist Fátima Mimbire wrote on Facebook:
translation.sw: Mwanaharajati Fátima Mimbire aliandika huko Facebook:

translation.en: Treat the Matalane issue with the appropriate seriousness.
translation.sw: Suala  la Matalane lichukuliwe kwa uzito.

translation.en: I am heartbroken by this news of 15 pregnant students at the Matalane Training Centre.
translation.sw: Nimevunjwa sana moyo na suala hili la ujauzito wa wanafunzi 15 wa kituo cha mafunzo cha  Matalane.

translation.en: This is serious.
translation.sw: Hili jambo kubwa sana.

translation.en: It is serious because, as the document itself states, it involves the instructors.
translation.sw: Ni jambo kubwa kwa sababu kama nyaraka zilivyoonesha wahusika ni wakufunzi.

translation.en: Now, one person who holds authority over another gets them pregnant, and the outcome is a little process?
translation.sw: Sasa mtu mmoja mwenye mamlaka juu ya mwingine anamtia mimba na matokeo yake ni mchakato kidogo?

translation.en: This reminds me of the teacher who demanded sex from students in exchange for grades or not to be humiliated in class because, in the teacher's view, they were dumb, instead of being prosecuted he was transferred to teach somewhere else.
translation.sw: Hili linanikumbusha kuhusu mwalimu aliyedai rushwa ya ngono kwa wanafunzi wake ili awape maksi au ili asiwadhalilishe darasani kwa sababu kwa mtazamo wake wanafunzi hao ni wajinga, na badala ya kushtakiwa mwalimu yule alihamishwa akafundishe mahali pengine.

translation.en: And there, he continues his exploits.
translation.sw: Na huko anaendeleza unyonyaji wake.

translation.en: Txeka, a women's activist collective, also condemned the affair on Twitter:
translation.sw: Txeka, mwanaharakati wa haki za wanawake pia alilaani jambo hili huko Twitter:

translation.en: The Matalane case
translation.sw: Shauri la Matalane

translation.en: Building a society of social justice, in defence of equal rights for citizens, requires a balanced education and development policy, valuing the development of citizens, with scientific knowledge and moral, civic and patriotic education.
translation.sw: Kuunda jamii yenye usawa kijamii katika kulinda haki sawa kwa wananchi inahitaji elimu sawia pamoja na sera za maendeleo zinazojali maendeleo ya wananchi pamoja na maarifa ya kisayansi na maadili pamoja na elimu ya uzalendo.

translation.en: The Matalane case
translation.sw: Shauri la Matalane

translation.en: Blaming violence on women is a common practice in chauvinist/patriarchal societies, known for devaluing women and submission to the wishes of men, resulting in judgements about the victim's conduct and minimizing the aggressor's conduct.
translation.sw: Kulaumu ukatili dhidi ya wanawake ni jambo la kawaida kwa jamii zenye mfumo dume, zinazofahamika kwa kudhalilisha wanawake na kuwafanya kutii matakwa ya wanaume ikiletea kuhukumiwa kwa matendo ya wahanga na kupunguza hatia ya wanyanyasaji.

translation.en: University Professor Carlos Serra said:
translation.sw: Profesa wa chuo kikuu Carlos Serra alisema:

translation.en: Matalane?
translation.sw: Matalane?

translation.en: Just the tip of the Iceberg, we are programmed to reproduce Matalane.
translation.sw: Ni kipande kidogo sana cha barafu kinachochungulia na Matalane ni zao letu.

translation.en: I imagine the day they start telling their stories, starting from the tenderest childhood.
translation.sw: Ninafikiria siku watakapoanza kueleza masahibu yao, wakianzia tangu utoto wao.

translation.en: It was similar for the journalist and activist Selma Inocência:
translation.sw: Vile vile mwanahabari na mwanaharakati  Selma Inocência alisema:

translation.en: Few teachers are brought to court, tried and sentenced.
translation.sw: Waalimu wachache sana wamefikishwa mahakamani, wakashtakiwa na kuhukumiwa.

translation.en: They are responsible for the lost childhood of thousands of girls.
translation.sw: Wanahusika na kuwapotezea utoto wao maelfu ya wasichana.

translation.en: School is not safe.
translation.sw: Shuleni sio sehemu salama.

translation.en: Statistics reveal that hundreds of girls get pregnant at school, some by tutors, teachers, headmasters.
translation.sw: Takwimu zinaonesha kwamba mamia ya wasichana hupata mimba shuleni na wahusika wengine wakiwa ni wakufunzi, walimu na wakuu wa shule.

translation.en: A petition is also running demanding punishment for the police officers involved.
translation.sw: Ombi limepitishwa likitaka adhabu itolewe kwa maofisa wa polisi waliohusika.

translation.en: So far, over 3,800 people have signed it.
translation.sw: Mpaka sasa zaidi ya watu 3,8000 wameshasaini.

translation.en: For the government, this case is serious and is being investigated in detail at ministerial level and by the General Police Command of the Republic of Mozambique.
translation.sw: Kwa serikali suala hili ni la msingi na linafanyiwa uchunguzi wa kina katika ngazi ya wizara na mkuu wa jeshi la polisi la Msumbiji.

translation.en: The state should not and will not tolerate situations like this.
translation.sw: Jamuhuri haiwezi na haitavumilia masuala kama haya.

translation.en: The law must be upheld and it is the same for all of us.
translation.sw: Lazima sheria ichukue mkondo wake na ni kwa kila mtu.

translation.en: Nobody is above the law.
translation.sw: Hakuna mtu aliye juu ya sheria.

translation.en: Investigations are underway to assess the details of each case, seeking to safeguard the psychological and emotional state of the pregnant women, because they deserve humane respect
translation.sw: Upelelezi unaendelea kwa kuchunguza kwa kina taarifa zote katika kesi hii na kuzingatia hali ya kisaikoloji na kihisia ya wanawake hao wajawazito kwasababu wanastahili kuheshimiwa utu wao.

translation.en: Other cases
translation.sw: Kesi Nyingine

translation.en: This adds to the cases of violence faced by Mozambican women, most of which go unreported by media.
translation.sw: Huu ni muendelezo wa kesi za ukatili wanaokumbana nao wanawake wa Msumbiji ambapo haziripotiwi katika vyombo vya habari.

translation.en: Among the cases that have recently captured media attention is that of Alberto Niquice, deputy for the party Liberation Front of Mozambique (Frelimo), who's facing criminal charges for raping a 13-year-old child in 2018.
translation.sw: Moja kati ya kesi ambayo hivi karibuni ilishikilia vichwa vya habari ni ile ya Alberto Niquice, Kaimu wa chama cha Liberation Front of Mozambique (Frelimo), ambaye anakabiliwa na shauri la jinai  kwa kosa la kumbaka mtoto wa miaka 13 mwaka 2018.

translation.en: Early this year, 30 Mozambican civil society organizations demanded the suspension of Niquice's inauguration, who was re-elected in 2019.
translation.sw: Mapema  mwaka huu, Taasisi 30 za kiraia nchini Msumbiji zilimtaka Niquice asiapishwe baada ya kuchaguliwa tena mwaka 2019.

translation.en: However, the deputy took office and is working as normal in the Assembly of the Republic.
translation.sw: Hata hivyo, makamu aliichukua ofisi na anafanya kazi kama kawaida katika bunge.

translation.en: Another case covered in the press was the case of domestic violence suffered by Josina Machel, daughter of Mozambique's first president, Samora Machel.
translation.sw: Kesi  nyingine iliyo katika vyombo vya habari ni kuhusu ukatili aliofanyiwa Josina Machel, binti wa Rais wa kwanza wa Msumbiji, Samora Machel.

translation.en: In October 2015, Josina was assaulted by her partner of three years, Rofino Licuco, leaving her blind in one eye.
translation.sw: Oktoba mwaka 2015, Josina alipigwa na mpenzi wake wa miaka mitatu Rofini Licuco akiachwa na upofu wa jicho moja.

translation.en: Licuco was sentenced to 3 years and 4 months in prison, as well as to pay 300 million meticais (about US$4.2 million) in compensation to Josina.
translation.sw: Licuco alihukumiwa kwenda gerezani miaka 3 na miezi 4 pamoja na kulipa fidia ya metika milioni 300 (sawa na dola za Marekani milioni 4.2) kwa Josina.

translation.en: However, Rofino appealed the sentence and, in June this year, the High Court of Appeals overturned it on the grounds that there was insufficient evidence in the case.
translation.sw: Hata hivyo Rofino alikata rufaa na Juni mwaka huu Mahakama kuu ya Rufaa iliifutilia kesi hiyo mbali kwa madai kuwa hapakuwepo na ushahidi wa kutosha katika kesi hii.

translation.en: What a year 2020 has beenand its not over yet.
translation.sw: Mwaka 2020 umekuwa wa pekeena haujakamilika bado.

translation.en: In the midst of it all, we at Global Voices have continued to publish nuanced stories from the four corners of the globe, bringing our readers unique global perspectives on issues such as the COVID-19 pandemic, the movement for racial justice, protests in countries such as Belarus and Thailand, and much, much more.
translation.sw: Katikati ya yote, sisi wa Global Voices tumeendelea kuchapisha habari kutoka pembe zote nne za dunia, kuwaletea wasomaji wetu mitazamo ya kipekee yenye sura ya dunia kuhusu masuala kama mlipuko wa UVIKO-19, harakati za usawa wa rangi, maandamano katika nchi kama Belarus na Thailand, na zaidi, na zaidi zaidi.

translation.en: The Global Voices community of bloggers, authors, journalists and digital rights activists have been working for the past 16 years to build bridges across countries and languages and to defend the independence of the media, the openness of the Internet, and the right of everyone, everywhere, to free expression.
translation.sw: Jamii ya wanablogu, waandishi, waandishi wa habari na wanaharakati wa haki za kidijitali wa Global Voices imekuwa ikifanya kazi kwa zaidi ya miaka 16 kujenga madaraja baina ya nchi na lugha mbalimbali na kutetea uhuru wa vyombo vya habari, uwazi wa Intaneti, na haki ya kila mmoja, kokote na uhuru wa kujieleza.

translation.en: Our work and our international community of contributors is proof that human connections across lines of difference can change how people understand the world.
translation.sw: Kazi yetu na jumuiya ya waandishi wetu wa kimataifa ni ushahidi kwamba uhusiano wa binadamu bila kujali kiambaza cha tofauti mbalimbali unaweza kubadilisha namna watu wanavyouelewa ulimwengu.

translation.en: December 2004.
translation.sw: Desemba 2004.

translation.en: You had to be a university student to use Facebook, Twitter didnt yet exist, and trolls still lived mostly under bridges in fairy tales.
translation.sw: Ilikuwa lazima uwe mwanafunzi wa chuo kikuu kutumia mtandao wa Facebook, Twitter ilikuwa bado haijaanza kutumika, wachokozi bado walikuwa wanaishi kwenye madaraja ya masimulizi ya kusadikika.

translation.en: Our phones were dumb, a leak was something you called in the plumber to fix, and there were still some things Amazon.com didnt sell.
translation.sw: Simu zetu bado hazikuwa na akili, kuvuja wakati huo ilimaanisha maji na ungemwita fundibomba kurekebisha, na bado Amazon.com hawakuwa na uwezo wa kuuza baadhi ya bidhaa.

translation.en: There was a diversity of independent news sites, blogging was alive and well, and we actually talked to each other online.
translation.sw: Kulikuwa na tovuti nyingi za habari, blogu zilikuwepo na zilifanya vizuri, na tulishaanza kuzungumza mtandaoni.

translation.en: And Global Voices was born.
translation.sw: Hapo ndipo Global Voices ikazaliwa.

translation.en: That makes it 15 years since weve been at it!
translation.sw: Tumekuwepo kwa miaka 15!

translation.en: In dog years, thats 110.
translation.sw: Kwa umri wa mbwa, hiyo ni miaka 110.

translation.en: In internet years, its practically a millennium.
translation.sw: Kwa miaka ya intaneti, hiyo ni sawa miaka 1000.

translation.en: Today we want to take a moment to thank our brilliant global community of contributors and our faithful readers and supporters for giving Global Voices the strength and energy to endure.
translation.sw: Leo tunatamani kutumia fursa hii kuwashukuru waandishi wetu mahiri waliosambaa duniani kote na wasomaji wetu waaminifu na washirika wetu kwa kuipa Global Voices nguvu na uwezo wa kuendelea kusonga mbele.

translation.en: Since 2004, weve helped make some of the biggest stories in the world.
translation.sw: Tangu 2004, tumesaidia kuandika habari kubwa duniani.

translation.en: We've published almost 100,000 posts, created sections devoted to empowering local and underrepresented communities to use digital media and to defending online rights, as well as built a community of translators working in over 51 languages.
translation.sw: Tumechapisha karibu makala 100,000, na kutengeneza makala maalum zilizolenga kuziwezesha jamii za maeneo yasiyopewa kipaumbele kutumia mitandao ya kidijitali na kupigania haki za mtandaoni, ikiwa ni pamoja na kujenga jumuiya ya watafsiri wanaotafsiri zaidi ya lugha 51.

translation.en: Without you, there would be no Global Voices.
translation.sw: Bila wewe, pasingekuwepo Global Voices.

translation.en: Help us make it another 15.
translation.sw: Tusaidie kukamilisha miaka 15 mingine.

translation.en: We really mean thatwe need your help.
translation.sw: Tunamaanisha kabisatunahitaji msaada wako.

translation.en: Donations from individuals help us preserve our independence and allows us to take risks to grow and change.
translation.sw: Michango kutoka kwa watu binafsi inatusaidia kulinda uhuru wetu na kutuwezesha kufanya maamuzi magumu kukua na kubadilika.

translation.en: Please support us today!
translation.sw: Tafadhali tuunge mkono leo!

translation.en: Donate now!
translation.sw: Changia sasa!
