translation.sw: Picha ya Enock4seth kupitia Wikimedia Commons, CC BY-SA 4.0.

translation.en: African leaders have taken decisive, early actions to curb the spread of COVID-19.
translation.sw: Viongozi wa Afrika wamechukua uamuzi wa haraka kukabiliana na UVIKO-19.

translation.en: In fact, the Africa Centers for Disease Control (ACDC) created its COVID-19 task force on February 5, before the continent had a single case.
translation.sw: Kituo cha Afrika cha Kudhibiti Magonjwa (ACDC) kiliunda kikosi kazi ya UVIKO-19 Februari 5 , kabla ya bara hili halijashuhudia hata mgonjwa mmoja.

translation.en: Today, Africa is currently the least impacted region in the world, with 1,293,048 confirmed COVID-19 cases so far and a remarkable 1,031,905 recoveries, according to the Africa CDCP.
translation.sw: Leo hii, Afrika ambalo kwa sasa ndilo eneo lililoathirika kidogo sana duniani likiwa na wangonjwa wapato 1,293,048 waliothibitishwa wenye UVIKO-19 na kinachovutia zaidi ni wagonjwa 1,031,905 wakiripoti kupona, kwa mujibu wa Afrika CDCP.

translation.en: The continent has less than 5 percent of reported cases and less than 1 percent of all deaths.
translation.sw: Bara hili lina chini ya asilimia 5 ya wagonjwa walioripotiwa duniani kote na chini ya asilimia 1 ya vifo vyote vilivyotokea duniani kote.

translation.en: Now, as African countries  led by the African Union   ease COVID-19 restrictions and prepare to reopen their economies and borders, many governments are employing innovative technologies.
translation.sw: Sasa, kama nchi za Kiafrika  ikiongozwa na Umoja wa Afrika   wanalegeza vikwazo za COVID-19 na kujiandaa kufungua tena uchumi na mipaka yao, serikali nyingi wanatumia teknolojia bunifu.

translation.en: A need for a unified, pan-African technology that can track the spread and connect COVID-19 testing centers across the continent has led to the use of PanaBIOS, an African Union-backed biosurveillance technology.
translation.sw: Utaji wa umoja, wa teknolojia ya Kiafrika inayoweza fuatilia usambaa na kukutanisha vituo ya kupima COVID-19 kote bara umepelekea utumizi wa PanaBIOS, teknolojia wa uangalizi wa kibiolojia unaoungwa mkono na Umoja wa Afrika.

translation.en: PanaBIOS provides a mobile and web-based app that uses algorithms to track and trace persons facing potential health threats and track and keep records of test samples from their origin to in-country labs.
translation.sw: PanaBIOS umetoa programu inayotegema rununu na wavuti na kutumia algorithimu kufuata watu walio hatarini kiafya na kuweka rekodi ya vipimo vya sampuli toka asili hadi maabara..

translation.en: The technology was developed by Koldchain, a Kenyan startup, and funded by AfroChampions, a public-private partnership designed to galvanize African resources and institutions to support the emergence and success of the African private sector.
translation.sw: Huu teknolojia umeundwa na Koldchain, taasisi chipukizi ya Kenya, na kufadhiliwa na AfroChampions, ushirikiano wa umma na binafsi uliobuniwa kuleta pamoja rasilimali ya Afrika na taasisi kusaidia ubuzi na mafanikio ya sekta binafsi Afrika.

translation.en: Ghana is currently the only African country using PanaBIOS technology as it reopens its borders.
translation.sw: Ghana ndio nchi pekee kwa saa hii inayotumia teknolojia ya PanaBIOS wakati inafungua mipaka yake.

translation.en: PanaBIOS ensures that travelers are able to use test results from one country to satisfy port clearance requirements in another country through their personal PanaBios app or by adding a system-generated SMS/USSD passcode to another travel document.
translation.sw: PanaBIOS  kuhakikisha wasafiri wanaweza tumia matokeo ya vipimo toka nchi nyingine kuridhisha mahitaji ya idhini ya bandari kwa nchi wanayosafiria kupitia programu-tumizi ya PanaBios au kwa kuongezea nywila unaozalishwa na mfumo kwa hati za usafiri.

translation.en: Port health officials use the enterprise version of the app to validate health declarations in a uniform manner across countries.
translation.sw: Maafisa wa afya bandarini wanatumia programu-tumizi toleo la biashara kudhibitisha hati za afya kwa namna sawa kwa nchi zote.

translation.en: Comprehensive data protection and privacy laws
translation.sw: Sheria kamili za kulinda data na ufaragha

translation.en: The African Union and the Africa CDCP are encouraging member states to integrate the mobile-based PanaBIOS platform that would allow results from facilities across the continent to be centralized.
translation.sw: Muungano wa Afrika na Afrika CDCP wanahimiza mataifa wanachama  kushirikisha jukwaa wenye msingi wa rununu, PanaBIOS  utakao wezesha matokeo kote barani kuwekwa pamoja.

translation.en: However, digital health interventions have raised a lot of questions regarding data access and data privacy.
translation.sw: Lakini,tarakimu kuingilia kati afya kumezua maswali mengi kuhusu ufikavu na ufaragha wa data.

translation.en: Government-implemented surveillance and control can instill fear and threaten civil liberties, especially in a continent where only 27 countries out of 54 in Africa have fully functioning data protection and privacy laws.
translation.sw: Ufuatiliaji unaoendeshwa na serikali  na udhibati unaweza nuiza hofu na kutishia huru uraia, hasa katika bara ambapo  nchi 27 tu kati ya 54  wanayo sheria kamilifu ya ulinzi na ufaragha wa data.

translation.en: Some African countries, such as Ghana, have triggered new legislation giving the president emergency powers to fight the pandemic by ordering telecom companies to provide it with personal customer details such as subscriber database, subscriber cell reference data, uncashed subscriber mobile money transfer data, mobile money merchant codes, and addresses.
translation.sw: Nchi nyingine Afrika, kama Ghana yamebadili sheria kuipa rais mamlaka ya dharura kukabiliana na janga kwa kuamrisha kampuni ya mawasiliano ya simu kuipa maelezo ya kibinafsi ya wateja kama vile hifadhidata ya mteja, kumbukumbu ya simu ya mteja, data ya pesa uliohamishwa kutumia simu na haujatumika, misimbo ya wafanyabiashara wa miamala , na anwani.

translation.en: To ensure data protection and privacy, all machine learning techniques used by PanaBIOS are on aggregated data.
translation.sw: Kuhakiki ulinzi na ufaragha wa data, mbinu zote za masomo ya mashine inayotumiwa na PanaBIOS ziko katika data ya jumla.

translation.en: That is  data gathered is summarized for statistical analysis  not personal data used to target individuals  unless its for contact tracing purposes, where it would be required to reach out to suspected or infected people.
translation.sw: Hio ni  data iliokusanywa inahaririwa kwa ajili ya uchambuzi wa takwimu  sio data binafsi ya kulenga watu  isipokua kwa ajili ya kufuatilia mwasiliwa, ambapo itatakikana kufikia washukiwa ama waathiriwa.

translation.en: To ensure the prevention of privacy infringement, the African Union, PanaBIOS, and its partners must propose how it will comply with various country-based data protection laws to protect privacy, ensure data consent and avoid data sharing for commercial use.
translation.sw: Kuhakikisha uzuizi wa kuingilia ufaragha, Muungano wa Afrika, PanBIOS, na washirika wake lazima wapendekeze namna watakavyo zingatia sheria za ulinzi wa data za nchi tofauti tofauti kulinda ufaragha,hakikisha idhini ya data na kuepuka kushiriki data kibiashara.

translation.en: The app currently does not have a privacy policy available to the public, in which it explains to users its data collection and sharing practices.
translation.sw: Kwa sasa, huu pragramu-tumizi hauna sera ya faragha inayopatikana kwa umma, ambapo inaelezea watumiaji kanuni za kukusanya na kushiriki data.

translation.en: The challenge is how such data privacy policy will meet the various, continental, national, and regional data protection laws such as the African Unions Convention on Cybersecurity and Personal Data Protection, the Southern African Development Communitys (SADC) model law on data protection, Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS) Supplementary Act A/SA.1/01/10 on Personal Data Protection Within ECOWAS and the East African Communitys Framework for Cyberlaws.
translation.sw: Changamoto ni jinsi huo sera faragha utatimiza malengo mbalimbali, kibara, kitaifa, na kikanda ya sheria za kulinda data kama vile ya Muungano wa Afrika Mkataba juu ya Usalama wa Mtandao na Ulinzi wa Takwimu za Kibinafsi,ya Jumuiya ya Maendeleo Kusini mwa Afrika (SADC) sheria kielezo juu ya ulinzi wa data, Jumuiya ya Kiuchumi ya Mataifa ya Afrika Magharibi (ECOWAS) Sheria ya nyongeza A / SA.1 / 01/10 juu ya Ulinzi wa Takwimu Binafsi Ndani ya ECOWAS na Jumuiya ya Afrika Mashariki Kiunzi cha Kanuni za mtandao.

translation.en: Tech-based solutions contribute to Africas COVID-19 success
translation.sw: Suluhu za kiteknolojia zimechangia ufanisi kukabiliana na COVID-19 Afrika

translation.en: In addition to PanaBIOS, various African nations have activated tech-based responses to the COVID-19 crisis to mitigate its spread.
translation.sw: Pamoja na PanaBIOS, baadhi ya mataifa ya Afika wameamilisha itikio inayoegemea teknolojia kupambana na uenevu wa janga la COVID-19.

translation.en: For example, scientists from Senegal developed a $1 COVID-19 test kit and 3D ventilators for patients.
translation.sw: Kwa mfano, wanasayansi toka Sengali wametengeneza kifaa cha kupima COVID-19 inayogharimu $1 na Vipumuaji vya 3D ya wagonjwa.

translation.en: Wellvis, a Nigerian startup, created the COVID-19 Triage Tool, a free online tool to help users self-assess their coronavirus risk category based on their symptoms and their exposure history.
translation.sw: Wellvis, taasisi chipukizi ya Nijeria, walibuni chombo cha kupima COVID-19 , chombo huru ya mtandao kusaidia watumizi kujipima kiwango cha hatari ya kuambukizwa virusi vya korona kulingana na dalili na historia ya kuwemo hatarini..

translation.en: The South African government used Whatsapp to provide an interactive chatbot that can answer common queries about COVID-19 myths, symptoms, and treatment.
translation.sw: Serikali ya Afrika Kusini ilitumia mtandao wa ujumbe mfupi Whatsapp kutoa mazungumuzo ya mwingiliano kujibu maswali ya kawaida kuhusu hadithi za uongo, dalili na tiba ya COVID-19.

translation.en: And in Uganda, market women used the Market Garden app to sell their goods from their homes through the app, and then motorcycle taxis deliver the goods to customers.
translation.sw: Na Uganda,  wanawake wa soko walitumia programu-tumizi ya Soko Bustani kuuza bidhaa yao wakiwa nyumbani kutumia hii programu, kisha teksi ya pikipiki kumchukulia mnunuzi bidhaa.

translation.en: Africas successful control and management of the spread of COVID-19 has been attributed to its younger population, limited testing capacity and mortality tracking, and the possible presence of SARS-CoV-2 antibodies found in some Africans.
translation.sw: Afrika kufanikiwa kudhibiti na kusimamia uenevu wa COVID-19 umehusishwa na  umma changa, uwezo kadiri wa kupima na kufuatilia waliofariki, na uwezekano wa kuwepo na  kingamwili za SARS-CoV-2  miongoni Waafrika wengine .

translation.en: However, it is clear that Africas tech-based innovations are a major contributing factor to its success in controlling COVID-19, in addition to decisive leadership early on in the pandemic.
translation.sw: Lakini, ni bayana kwamba uvumbuzi zinazoegemea teknolojia zimechangia pakubwa kufanikisha uthibati wa COVID-19, pamoja na uongozi amuzi mwanzoni mwa janga.

translation.en: Solomon Zewdu, deputy doctor with the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation summarized how, in January, even as many Western nations hesitated, Ethiopia began intensive screening at Addis Ababa airport.
translation.sw: Solomon Zewdu, naibu daktari na shirika la Bill na Melinda  alifupisha jinsi, mnamo Januari, wakati mataifa mengi ya magharibi yakisita , Ethiopia ilianza kichujio kabambe uwanja wa ngege wa AddisAbaba.

translation.en: Rwanda became the first African nation to lock down on March 21, and many other African countries soon followed: South Africa implemented its comprehensive lockdown when it had only 400 cases and two fatalities.
translation.sw: Rwanda ikawa nchi ya kwanza Afrika kusitisha katikhuli za kawaida mnamo Machi 21,na nchi kadhaa Afrika kufuatilia hivo karibuni: Afrika kusini ikatekeleza sitisho katikhuli za kawaida kabambe wakati ilikua na kesi 400 na vifo mbili.

translation.en: (With a similar-sized population, Italy had more than 9,000 cases and 400 deaths when it acted.)
translation.sw: (Na idadi hicho ya umma, Italia ilikua na  zaidi ya kesi 9,000 na vifo 400  ilipochukua hatua.)

translation.en: In contrast, the number of infected cases and deaths in the US is six times that of Africa.
translation.sw: Kwa kulinganisha kinyume,idadi ya walioathiriwa na kufa Amerikani ni mara sita idadi ya Afrika.

translation.en: Public health experts predicted that the pandemic would horribly affect the continent with bodies lying in the streets.
translation.sw: Wataalam wa afya ya umma walikadiria kwamba janga lingeathiri pakubwa bara la Afrika na miili ya walokufa kutanda mitaa .

translation.en: Clearly, Africa has proven otherwise.
translation.sw: Bayana, Afrika imethibitisha vinginevyo.

translation.en: This story is based research by Factcheck Lab, a Hong Kong-based fact-checking agency and a media partner of Global Voices of which the author is a member.
translation.sw: Habari hii imetumia utafiti wa Factcheck Lab, wakala wa uhakiki wa ukweli ulioko Hong Kong,ambaye pia ni mshirika wa habari wa Global Voices ambapo mwandishi ni mwanachama.

translation.en: Since September 22, news reports and social media posts circulating on the Chinese-speaking internet inaccurately claim that World Health Organization (WHO) Chief Scientist, Dr. Soumya Swaminathan, said Chinas COVID-19 vaccines have proved to have an effect.
translation.sw: Tokea Septemba 22, taarifa za habari na machapisho ya mtandao ya kijamii inayoenea katika mitandao ya Kichina ilinukuu sivyo kuwa mwanasayansi mkuu wa Shirika la Afya Duniani (SAD), Dkt. Soumya Swaminathan, alisema chanjo za Uchina dhidi ya COVID-19 zimethibitishwa kuwa na athari.

translation.en: These reports and posts cite as a source a one-minute video produced by China Central Television for the Chinese video-sharing app Miaopai.
translation.sw: Hizi ripoti na machapisho zinanukuu chanzo  video ya dakika inayotayarishwa na televisheni ya China kwa programu-tumizi ya kushiriki video China Miaopai.

translation.en: The video shows a speech by WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus on the importance of the development of a COVID-19 vaccine, followed by remarks by Dr. Swaminathan.
translation.sw: Huo video inaonyesha hotuba ya mkurugenzi mkuu wa SAD Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus akiongelea umuhimu wa kukuza chanjo ya UVIKO-19,ikifuatiliwa na matamshi ya Dkt.Swaminathan.

translation.en: In the CCTV video, whose captions say WHO chief scientist: Chinese COVID-19 vaccines have proved to have an effect (), this is Swaminathan's speech:
translation.sw: Katika video ya CCTV, ambayo maelezo yake mafupi yanasema Mwanasayansi mkuu wa WHO: Chanjo za China za UVIKO-19 zimehakiki kuwa na athari (), huu ni taarifa ya Swaminathan:

translation.en: As you know, they also have a very active vaccine development programme and several of their vaccine candidates are in advanced stages of clinical trial, so this is also of interest to us, so we're following those very closely.
translation.sw: Kama mnavyofahamu,pia wanayo programu amilifu ya kukuza chanjo na baadhi ya chanjo yako hatua mbele katika majaribio ya kliniki, huu pia ni maslahi kwetu, tunaifuatilia kwa karibu.

translation.en: Some of their candidates actually prove to be successful in the clinical trials that are going on.
translation.sw: Wengineo wa washirika wamethibitisha kufaidika kutokana na majaribio la kliniki yanayoendelea..

translation.en: However, Dr. Swaminathan's original speech has been edited.
translation.sw: Lakini, hotuba asili ya Dkt.Swaminathan umehaririwa.

translation.en: Her last sentence, in reality, began with the word if, and the video's background music makes it sound as if she's saying proved instead of prove.
translation.sw: Sentensi yake ya mwisho, kwa uhakika, ulianza na neno ikiwa, na mziki wa mandharinyuma ulifanya utoke kana kwamba anasema ulithibitisha badala ya thibitisha.

translation.en: Dr. Swaminathan's complete remarks are the following:
translation.sw: Matamshi ya Dkt.Swaminathan kamili ni haya yafuatayo :

translation.en: We've been engaged in discussions with China for the last several months because, as you know, they also have a very active vaccine development programme and several of their vaccine candidates are in advanced stages of clinical trial so this is also of interest to us so we're following those very closely.
translation.sw: Tumehusika na mjadala na Uchina kwa miezi mingi iliyopita kwa sababu,mnavyojua, hao pia wanao programu amilifu ya kukuza chanjo na na chanjo zao mingi ziko hatua mbele ya majaribio ya kliniki, huu ni maslahi kwetu,kwa hivyo tunafuatilia kwa karibu.

translation.en: We've had very constructive and open discussions with them and they have always been reiterating their commitment to global access if some of their candidates actually prove to be successful in the clinical trials that are going on [emphasis added].
translation.sw: Tumekuwa na mjadala wa kujenga na wazi nao na kila mara wamesisitiza kujitolea kwao kwa ufikavu kote duniani  ikiwa baadhi ya chanjo zao zimepita majaribio ya kliniki yanayoendelea [msisitizo umeongezwa].

translation.en: So I think the conversations are going on, it's still open and we're hopeful that more countries are going to join.
translation.sw: Kwa hivyo nafikiria mazungumuzo yanayoendelea, bado ni wazi na tunatumania nchi mingi watajuinga.

translation.en: The remarks were delivered at a WHO virtual press conference that took place on September 21.
translation.sw: Haya matamshi yalitolewa katika mkutano wa wandishi si bayana ya SAD iliyofanyika mnamo Septemba 21.

translation.en: The complete transcripts of the one hour and 30 minutes event can be accessed here.
translation.sw: Nakala kamili ya tukio hiyo ya saa moja na nusu yanaweza patikana hapahere.

translation.en: The conference aimed to present updates on the 18-billion-USD initiative by WHO and other organizations to deploy a future COVID-19 vaccine around the world.
translation.sw: Hiyo kongamano ilinuia kuwasilisha sasisho kuhusu mpango uliogharimu dola bilioni 18 ya merikani ya WHO na mashirika mengine kupeleka chanjo cha UVIKO-19 hapo mbeleni kote duniani.

translation.en: So far, 156 countries have signed up for the program; neither China nor the U.S. is among them.
translation.sw: Kufikia sasa, mataifa 156 wamejisajili katika mpango huu; si Uchina wala Amerika ni miongoni mwao.

translation.en: As anticipated, CCTV's video, as well as the news reports and posts that it generated, have attracted a lot of patriotic endorsements.
translation.sw: Kama ilivyokadiriwa, video ya CCTVT,pamoja na ripoti ya habari na machapisho zinazozalishwa, zimevutia ridhaa za kizalendo.

translation.en: A post on Weibo by Daily Economic News has more than 337,000 likes.
translation.sw: Chapisho katika Weibo na Daily Economic News imependwa na watu zaidi ya 337,000.

translation.en: Below are some of the most popular comments:
translation.sw: Chini hapa ni baadhi ya maoni maarufu:

translation.en: I am so proud of you, my country.
translation.sw: Najivunia sana nchi yangu.

translation.en: This is the best present for the National Day and Mid Autumn Festival.
translation.sw: Hii ndio zawadi ya Siku ya Kitaifa na Tamasha la Katikati ya Vuli.

translation.en: You cant imagine Chinas speed.
translation.sw: Huwezi dhania ukasi wa Uchina.

translation.en: I am so proud of my mother country.
translation.sw: Navunia nchi yangu.

translation.en: China saves the whole world.
translation.sw: China imeokoa dunia.

translation.en: After fact-checkers pointed out that Dr. Swaminathans words had been distorted, some media outlets, including CGTN and CCTV, deleted their social media posts.
translation.sw: Baada ya wakaguzi hakika huashiria maneno ya Dkt. zimepotoshwa, baadh ya vyombo vya habari,ikiwa pamoja na  CGTN na CCTV, walifutilia machapisho yao ya mtandao wa kijamii.

translation.en: Among them is the Communist Youth League of China, whose post was captured by Twitter user @Emi2020JP before it disappeared from Weibo:
translation.sw: Miongoni mwao ni Ligi ya Kikomunisti ya Vijana ya China, ambao chapisho lao ilinikuliwa na mtumiaji wa mtandao wa twita @Emi2020JP kabla kupotea toka Weibo:

translation.en: Tedros should have the vaccine injection first.
translation.sw: Tedros anafaa kuchanjwa kwanza.

translation.en: Like @Emi2020JP, many Twitter users believed that WHO was assisting China with distorting the video, and posted angry comments at Tedros:
translation.sw: Kama @Emi2020JP, wengi wa watumiza wa mtandao wa twita waliamini WHO was assisting China with distorting the video, na kuchapisha maoni ya hasikwa kwake Tedros:

translation.en: Tedros is a toilet brush!
translation.sw: Tedros ni kisugulio ya choo!

translation.en: I will pay to give Tedros a few extra injection!
translation.sw: Nitalipa kumpatia Tedros sindano ya ziada!

translation.en: Yesterday my mom told me, the domestic news said that the U.S will buy huge amount of vaccines from China.
translation.sw: Jana mama yangu aliniambia, habari ya humu nchini ilisema Amerika itanunua chanjo mingi toka Uchina.

translation.en: Let them live in their fantasy.
translation.sw: Sina haja kuelezea.Wacha waishi katika fantasia yao .

translation.en: Such excellent service, from covering up the spread of the virus to marketing China's vaccines!
translation.sw: Kazi mzuri sana, kuanzia kusitiri ueneaji wa virusi mpaka matangazo ya mauzo ya chanjo!

translation.en: Although Chinese many posts have been deleted, copy-cats are still circulating on social media, such as this public post on WeChat.
translation.sw: Ingawa machapisho kwa uchina yamefutiliwa,nakala za kuiga bado yanasambaa katika mitandao ya kijamii, kama this public post WeChat.

translation.en: Pro-Beijing media outlets in Hong Kong, such as Speak Out HK (and Today Review (), have also published news stories based on the video.
translation.sw: Vyombo vya habari yanayoegemea Beijing huko Hong Kong, kama Speak Out HK (and Today Review (), pia yamechapisha habari kutokana na hio video.

translation.en: There are almost 200 COVID-19 vaccines in different stages of clinical trials around the world, and several of those are being produced by Chinese laboratories.
translation.sw: Kuna chanjo takriban 200 za UVIKO-19 yalioko katika hatua mbali mbali ya majaribio ya kliniki ulimwenguni, na mengi miongini mwao yameandaliwa na maktaba za Uchina.

translation.en: None of them has successfully passed a phase 3 trial yet.
translation.sw: Hakuna ambayo imepita awamu ya 3 ya majaribio kwa sasa.

translation.en: Demonstration against the death of doctor Silvio Dala in Luanda.
translation.sw: Maandamano dhidi ya kifo cha daktari Silvio Dala huko Luanda.

translation.en: Photo by Simão Hossi, CC-BY 3.0
translation.sw: Picha na Simão Hossi, CC-BY 3.0

translation.en: Hundreds of Angolans took to the streets on September 12 in Luanda, Benguela, and in cities in 15 other provinces against police violence.
translation.sw: Mamia ya Waangola waliingia mitaani kuandamana hapo Septemba 12 huko Luanda, Benguela na miji mingine 15 wakipinga ukatili wa polisi.

translation.en: The demonstrations took place following the shock from the news that Silvio Dala, a 35-year-old doctor, lost his life on September 1 while in police custody.
translation.sw: Maandamano hayo yalianza baada ya habari za kushtusha kutolewa kuhusu kifo cha daktari Silvio Dala, mwenye miaka 35, aliyepoteza maisha Septemba 1 akiwa chini ya uangalizi wa polisi.

translation.en: According to the authorities, Dala left by car from the David Bernardino Paediatric Hospital in Luanda, where he worked as clinical director when he was stopped by police officers for not wearing a mask.
translation.sw: Kulingana na taarifa za mamlaka, Dala aliondoka kwa gari yake kutoka hospitali ya  Watoto ya David Bernardino huko Luanda, ambapo ndiko hufanya kazi kama Mkurugenzi wa kliniki na alisimamishwa na polisi kwa sababu hakuvaa barakoa.

translation.en: The doctor was then taken to the Catotes police station, in the capital's Rocha Pinto neighbourhood, when he showed signs of fatigue and began to faint, having had a bad fall, which caused minor injuries to the head, the official police statement said.
translation.sw: Daktari huyo alipelekwa katika kituo cha polisi cha Catotes katika mji jirani wa Rocha Pinto, na alipoonesha dalili za kuishiwa nguvu na kuanza kuzimia, alianguka vibaya na kugonga kichwa na kusababisha jeraha dogo kichwani mwake ilisema taarifa rasmi ya polisi.

translation.en: It also states that Dala died while officers were taking him to hospital.
translation.sw: Pia ilisema kwamba Dala alifariki wakati maofisa wa polisi wakimpeleka hospitali.

translation.en: The Union of Doctors contests this version.
translation.sw: Chama cha Madaktari kiliipinga taarifa hiyo.

translation.en: The organizations president, Adriano Manuel, told Voice of America (VOA) that there are contradictions in the authorities explanations which suggest that the doctor was subjected to physical abuse.
translation.sw: Raisi wa chama hicho Adriano Manuel, aliiambia  Sauti ya Amerika (VOA) kwamba kuna utata katika maelezo ya mamlaka ambapo inaonesha kwamba daktari alisulubiwa.

translation.en: Manuel told Deutsche Welle (DW) that the cause of death described by the police is not the real one.
translation.sw: Manuel aliiambia  Sauti ya Ujerumani (DW) kwamba  chanzo cha kifo kilichoelezwa na polisi sio halisi.

translation.en: Anyone who is a doctor and has studied medicine knows that this is not what killed Silvio.
translation.sw: Mtu yeyote ambaye ni daktari na amesomea udaktari atajua kuwa hiki sicho kilichomuua Silvio.

translation.en: According to DW, a source from the Ministry of the Interior said that the autopsy, carried out in the presence of the family and a prosecutor, concluded that the doctor was not the victim of an assault.
translation.sw: Kulingana na DW, chanzo cha habari kutoka wizara ya mambo ya ndani kinasema kuwa uchunguzi ulifanyika mbele ya familia na mwendesha mashtaka na ikathibitika kwamba daktari hakuwa mhanga wa kipigo.

translation.en: The union said it will take legal action against the police.
translation.sw: Chama kimesema kuwa kitalichukulia jeshi la polisi hatua za kisheria.

translation.en: Meanwhile, the Angolan government announced the creation of a commission with the Ministry of Health to investigate the incident.
translation.sw: Wakati huo huo serikali ya Angola imeunda tume itakayoshirikiana na Wizara ya Afya kufanya uchunguzi wa tukio hilo.

translation.en: The protesters also did not believe the police's version of Dala's death.
translation.sw: Waandanaji hawaiamini taarifa ya polisi kuhusu kifo cha Dala.

translation.en: Signs used at the protests in Luanda, in different parts of the city, said: No more killings, You are paid to protect, you are not paid to kill, I am Silvio Dala, They killed Silvio Dala.
translation.sw: Mabango yaliyotumiwa na waandamanaji katika maeneo mbalimbali ya mji wa Luanda yalisema: Kusiwepo tena Mauaji, Mnalipwa kutulinda, hamlipwi kutuua, Mimi ni Silvio Dala, Wamemuua Silvio Dala.

translation.en: There were also calls for the Minister of the Interior Eugénio Laborinho to resign.
translation.sw: Pia kuna waliomtaka waziri wa Mambo ya Ndani Eugénio Laborinho ajiuzulu.

translation.en: The demonstrations were organized by the Union of Doctors and by various civil society collectives and organizations.
translation.sw: Maandamano yaliaandaliwa na Chama cha Madaktari wakishirikiana na mashirika na Taasisi za kiraia.

translation.en: Since the beginning of the pandemic in Angola, several cases of police violence have been reported during checks on compliance with restrictive measures, sometimes resulting in citizens deaths.
translation.sw: Tangu kuanza kwa janga la korona nchini Angola, vimeripotiwa visa kadhaa vya polisi kutumia nguvu kubwa wakati wakifanya ukaguzi  na wakati mwingine husababisha vifo vya raia.

translation.en: Speaking to Lusa, the rapper Brigadeiro 10 Pacotes, whose real name is Bruno Santos, called for Lugarinho's resignation as well as better police training schools to improve their conduct.
translation.sw: Akiongea na  Lusa, mwanamuziki wa kufokafoka  Brigadeiro 10 Pacotes, ambaye jina lake halisi ni  Bruno Santos, alimtaka Lugarinho ajiuzulu na pia akiitaka shule ya polisi iboreshe muundo wake wa mafunzo.

translation.en: The police is an organization that must give citizens confidence, today we live in serious insecurity where all citizens are afraid when they come across the police, he said.
translation.sw: Jeshi la polisi ni taasisi ambayo inapaswa kuwapa wananchi ujasiri, lakini leo wananchi wanakosa ujasiri, yaani wanaogopa wanapokutana na polisi, alimalizia kusema.

translation.en: Many took to Facebook and WhatsApp to protest the incident.
translation.sw: Wengi waliyahamishia maandamano haya katika kurasa za Facebook na WhatsApp kupinga tukio hilo.

translation.en: Activist and academic Nuno Álvaro Dala wrote on Facebook:
translation.sw: Mwanaharakati na mwanazuoni  Nuno Álvaro Dala aliandika huko  Facebook:

translation.en: THE NATIONAL POLICE IS RESPONSIBLE FOR THE DEATH OF THE DOCTOR SILVIO DALA
translation.sw: POLISI WA NCHI HII WANAHUSIKA NA KIFO CHA DAKTARI SILVIO DALA

translation.en: The images are powerful and very clear.
translation.sw: Picha zina nguvu sana na ziko sawia.

translation.en: We must all demand that justice be done.
translation.sw: Lazima wote tudai haki itendeke.

translation.en: The National Police must pay for the crime they have committed.
translation.sw: Polisi wa nchi hii lazima walipe kwa uhalifu waliotenda.

translation.en: Things must not continue like this.
translation.sw: Mambo hayawezi kuendelea kuwa hivi.

translation.en: On Twitter, Isabel dos Santos, former chairperson of the board of directors (PCA) of the state oil company Sonangol, and daughter of former president José Eduardo dos Santos, said:
translation.sw: Huko Twitter, Isabel dos Santos, mwenyekiti wa zamani wa bodi ya wakurugenzi wa kamapuni ya mafuta ya Sonangol, binti wa rais wa zamani José Eduardo dos Santos, alisema:

translation.en: #EuSouSilvioDala sábado anunciada manifestação pacífica e silenciosa pelo Sindicato Nacional dos Médicos de Angola (SINMEA),convidando todos profissionais de saúde,outros sindicatos e sociedade civil, contra a violência policial em memória de Sílvio Dala, 12:30hLargo da Mutamba pic.twitter.com/blRs117IdY

translation.en: On Saturday the National Union of Doctors of Angola (SINMEA) announced a peaceful and silent demonstration, calling on all health professionals, other unions and civil society, against police violence in memory of Silvio Dala, 12:30 pm Largo da Mutamba
translation.sw: Siku ya Jumamosi Chama cha Madaktari wa Angola (SINMEA) kilitangaza mgomo wa kimya na wa amani wakiwataka wafanyakazi wa afya, vyama vingine na taasisi za kiraia kupinga ukatili wa polisi ikiwa ni ishara ya kumkumbuka daktari Silvio Dala, mnamo saa 6:30 mchana huko  Largo da Mutamba

translation.sw: Kichwa cha habari: waAngola waingia mitaani wakipinga ukatili wa polisi na wakitaka mauaji yakomeshwe.

translation.en: Meanwhile, Alejandro, also on Twitter, questioned the participation of Angolan online influencers in this case:
translation.sw: Wakati huo huo,  pia  huko Tweeter Alejandro alihoji ushiriki wa wahamasishaji wa mitandaoni nchini Angola katika tukio hili:

translation.en: Quando o George Floyd foi morto os chamados Influencers Angolanos mostraram o seu apoio ao movimento Black Lives Matter, mas com a morte do medico angolano Sílvio Dala os tais irmãos influencers não fazem nada em relação a perda!
translation.sw: Quando o George Floyd foi morto os chamados Influencers Angolanos mostraram o seu apoio ao movimento Black Lives Matter, mas com a morte do medico angolano Sílvio Dala os tais irmãos influencers não fazem nada em relação a perda!

translation.en: Ale Alejandro (@AlejandroCutieG) September 7, 2020
translation.sw: Ale Alejandro (@AlejandroCutieG) September 7, 2020

translation.en: When George Floyd was killed the so-called Angolan Influencers showed their support for the Black Lives Matter movement, but with the death of the Angolan doctor Silvio Dala, these brothers don't do anything about the loss!
translation.sw: Wakati  George Floyd alipouawa hao wanaojiita wahamasishaji wa ki-Angola mitandaoni walionesha kuunga mkono mchakato wa Maisha ya Weusi Yana Thamani, lakini katika kifo cha daktari wa ki-Angola Silvio Dala, hawa ndugu hawafanyi chochote kuhusu janga hili!

translation.sw: Dondoo ya Mhariri: Huu ni uchambuzi wenye sehemu mbili juu ya Hachalu Hundessa, mwanamuziki maarufu wa Oromo ambaye mauaji yake yaliamsha vurugu za itikadi za kidini na kikabila kwa sababu ya taarifa zisizo sahihi zilizotolewa katika mitandao ya kijamii.

translation.en: Read Part II here.
translation.sw: Soma Sehemu ya pili hapa

translation.en: Iconic Ethiopian singer Hachalu Hundessa gained prominence for using his creative talent to raise the consciousness of the Oromo people.
translation.sw: Mwanamuziki mkubwa wa Kiethopia Hachalu Hundessa alipata umaarufu kwa kutumia ubunifu na kipaji chake kuutambulisha umma kuhusu watu wa Oromo.

translation.en: He was assassinated in a suburb of Ethiopias capital, Addis Ababa, on June 29.
translation.sw: Aliuawa katika viunga vya mji mkuu wa Ethiopia, Addis Ababa, tarehe 29 Juni mwaka huu.

translation.en: That night, at 9:30 pm, as Hachalu was exiting his vehicle, a man named Tilahun Yami allegedly walked up to his car and fired a gun into the artists chest.
translation.sw: Usiku ule mnamo saa tatu na nusu, wakati Hachalu akishuka kwenye gari lake, mwanaume aliyejulikana kwa jina la Tilahun Yami alitembea kuelekea gari yake na kumpiga risasi  kifuani mwake.

translation.en: He was rushed to the nearest hospital, where he was officially declared dead.
translation.sw: Alikimbizwa katika hospitali ya karibu ambapo ilithibitishwa rasmi kwamba amefariki.

translation.en: It was later determined that the bullet severely damaged his internal organs.
translation.sw: Iligundulika baadaye kwamba risasi iliharibu vibaya sana viungo vyake vya ndani.

translation.en: Addis Ababas police chief reported two suspects were arrested.
translation.sw: Mkuu wa polisi wa Addis Ababa  aliripoti kwamba watuhumiwa wawili wamekamatwa.

translation.en: After a few days, government authorities charged an alleged assassin along with two other accomplices.
translation.sw: Baada ya siku chache mamlaka za serikali ziliwahukumu wauaji hao pamoja na washirika wao wawili.

translation.en: In the wake of his murder, the country has struggled to come to terms with the violence that followed.
translation.sw: Katika kuuawa kwake, nchi imeingia katika wakati mgumu wa kutuliza ghasia zilizofuata.

translation.en: The truth of Hachalu's assassination is not yet fully clear, and in its aftermath, speculation began to fly as politicians and activists stoked long-standing tensions between Oromo and Amahara elites, two of Ethiopia's largest ethnic groups.
translation.sw: Ukweli ni kwamba mauaji ya Hachalu hayajawekwa wazi vizuri na pia matokeo yake, uvumi ulianza kuenea baada ya wanasiasa na wanaharakati  kuweka msisitizo mkubwa kuhusu mgogoro uliopo baina ya viongozi wakuu wa Oromo na Amahara ambayo ni makabila makubwa kabisa nchini Ethiopia.

translation.en: That day, mourners flooded the streets of Addis Ababa and cities and towns across Oromia state.
translation.sw: Siku ya maziko yake, waombolezaji walifurika katika mitaa ya Addis Ababa na miji mingine inayozunguka jimbo la Oromo.

translation.en: The next morning, Oromia Media Network (OMN), a satellite TV station on which Hachalu had his last contentious interview, provided online and TV coverage as his casket was transferred from Addis Ababa to Hachalus hometown, Ambo.
translation.sw: Asubuhi iliyofuata Kituo cha runinga ya setilaiti cha Oromia Media Network (OMN), ambapo ndipo Hachalu alifanya mahojiano yake ya mwisho walirusha matangazo mubashara kupitia runinga na pia mitandao na kuonesha wakati jeneza lake likisafirishwa kutoka Addis Ababa kwenda nyumbani kwao huko mjini Ambo.

translation.en: The slow, televised journey turned into a deadly battle between government authorities and opposition politicians over where Hachalu would be buried, and OMN interrupted its coverage as the hearse was forced to return to Addis Ababa.
translation.sw: Matangazo hayo yaliyokwenda polepole sana yaligeuka kuwa uwanja wa mapambano baina ya mamlaka za serikali na viongozi wa upinzani, kukiwa na mabishano ya wapi hasa akazikwe Hachalu  na OMN ilibidi wakatize matangazo yake; inasemekana walilazimishwa kurejea Addis Ababa.

translation.en: At least ten people were killed and several were injured in Addis Ababa.
translation.sw: Watu kumi waliuawa na wengine kadhaa kujeruhiwa huko Addis Ababa.

translation.en: The scuffle led to the arrest of several opposition politicians including Jawar Mohammed, an OMN figurehead, and opposition politician Bekele Gerba, who were both charged with instigating the mayhem.
translation.sw: Mgongano huo ulipelekea kukamatwa kwa baadhi ya viongozi wa upinzani akiwepo Jawar Mohammed ambaye ni kiongozi wa  OMN  na pia kiongozi wa upinzani Bekele Gerba ambapo walishtakiwa kwa kuchochea vurugu.

translation.en: Confusion swirled after government authorities eventually took Halachu's body back to Ambo by helicopter, where feuding parties continued to clash, denying the bereaved family members a proper burial.
translation.sw: Utata uliibuka zaidi baada ya mamlaka za serikali kuuchukua tena mwili wa Hachalu na kuupeleka mjini kwao Ambo kwa njia ya helkopta, ambapo pia pande mbili ziliendelea kugombana na kuinyima familia ya marehemu fursa ya kumpa ndugu yao maziko stahiki.

translation.en: Meanwhile, turmoil and violence ensued.
translation.sw: Baada ya hapo vurugu na mapigano yalifuata.

translation.en: A three-day rampage gripped parts of Oromia and Addis Ababa, at a substantial cost: 239 people were left dead; hundreds of others were injured and more than 7,000 people were arrested for violence and property damage worth millions of Ethiopian birr.
translation.sw: Mapigano hayo yalichukua siku tatu yaliyararua baadhi ya maeneo ya miji ya Oromo na Addis Ababa na uharibifu halisi ni: vifo vya watu 239  na mamia wamejeruhiwa, zaidi ya watu 7,000 wamekamatwa kwa kusababisha vurugu na uharibifu wa mali  zenye thamani ya mamilioni ya birr, fedha ya Kiethopia.

translation.en: On June 30, the government imposed an internet shutdown to attempt to halt calls for violence circulating on social media that lasted three weeks.
translation.sw: Hapo Juni 30, serikali ilijaribu kuzima mtandao ili kuzuia kuenea kwa uhamasishaji wa kufanya vurugu unaofanyika katika mitandao ya kijamii na kudumu kwa wiki tatu.

translation.en: A number of people were shot and killed by government security forces, but several news outlets including Voice of America and Addis Standard reported that angry mobs from the Oromo ethnic group attacked multiethnic, interfaith towns and cities in southeastern Oromia, targeting non-Oromo, non-Muslim families in the region.
translation.sw: Watu kadhaa walipigwa risasi na mamlaka za usalama lakini baadhi ya vyanzo vya habari ikiwamo Sauti ya Amerika na Addis Standard viliripoti kuwa vikundi vya watu wenye hasira kutoka kabila la Oromo walishambulia watu wa makundi mbalimbali ikiwepo miji na mitaa inayokaliwa na watu wa imani tofauti tofauti, iliyo Kusini Mashariki mwa mji wa Oromo, wakilenga hasa familia za watu wasio Waoromo na wasio Waislam katika ukanda huo.

translation.en: Most of the violence fell along ethnic Amahara-Oromo lines, but religion may have played a more central role due to an intricate, localized understanding of ethnicity: The southeast Oromo communitys ethnic identity markers usually combine the religion of Islam and the Afan-Oromo language.
translation.sw: Vurugu zaidi zilikuwa katika ukanda wenye mchanganyiko wa watu wa Amahara-Oromo na dini inaweza ikawa imecheza nafasi kubwa kwa sababu ya uelewa uliopo kwamba: jamii ya Waoromo wa Kusini Mashariki inatambulishwa kwa mchangayiko wa dini ya Kiislamu na watumiaji wa lugha ya Afan-Oromo.

translation.en: A local farmer reportedly said we thought Hachalu was Oromo after he watched Hachalu's televised funeral rites that followed the traditions of the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church.
translation.sw: Mkulima mmoja wa maeneo hayo alisema kwamba tulifikiri Hachalu ni Muoromo baada ya kuangalia matangazo yaliyorushwa moja kwa moja yakionesha shughuli za maziko ya Hachalu yaliyofuata desturi za Kanisa la Kiothodoksi la Tewahedo Ethiopia.

translation.en: According to reports, most victims of the most gruesome violence were minority Christian Amharas, Christian Oromos and Gurage people.
translation.sw: Kulingana na ripoti, wahanga wengi wa vurugu hizo walikuwa ni Wakristo wa ki-Amhara, Wakristo wa ki-Oromo na watu wa Gurage.

translation.en: Eyewitnesses say mobs destroyed and burned property, committed lynching and beheadings and dismembered victims.
translation.sw: Shuhuda mmoja alisema kuwa makundi hayo yaliharibu na kuchoma moto mali na kufanya mauaji  kwa kuwakata vichwa na miguu wahanga.

translation.en: A fateful interview
translation.sw: Utabiri wa Mahojiano

translation.en: When news of Hachalus assassination first hit, Oromo diaspora media outlets zeroed in on Hachalus fateful interview with OMN host Guyo Wariyo, that aired the week before Halachu was killed.
translation.sw: Wakati taarifa kuhusu mauaji ya Hachalu ziliposikika tu, chanzo cha habari za Waoromo wa diaspora zilihusisha kifo chake na  mahojiano ya mwisho aliyoyafanya Hachalu na kituo cha runinga cha OMN yakiongozwa na Guyo Wariyo, na yalirushwa wiki moja kabla Hachalu hajauawa.

translation.en: During the interview, Guyo repeatedly asked Hachalu provocative questions about his alleged sympathy for the ruling party, interrupting him multiple times to challenge his answers.
translation.sw: Wakati wa mahojiano Gayo alirudia rudia kumuuliza Hachalu maswali ya mtego kuhusu yeye kukiunga mkono chama tawala na pia mara kwa mara alimkatiza alipokuwa akijibu.

translation.en: Hachalu fiercely denied any sympathies with the ruling party, but also decried the deeply discordant and fractionalized Oromo political parties, demonstrating his staunch independence as a thinker and musician  a quality that made him a target for online abuse until the day of his murder.
translation.sw: Hachalu alikataa kuunga chama tawala mkono lakini pia alikosoa  migogoro na utengano katika vyama vya siasa vya Oromo, akionesha uhuru wa mawazo kama mwanamuziki  hali ambayo ilimfanya kuwa mlengwa wa mashambulizi ya watu mtandaoni mpaka siku aliyouawa.

translation.en: At one point, however, Guyo asked Hachalu about the historical injustices allegedly committed against the Oromo people by Menelik II, Ethiopias 19th-century emperor who shaped modern Ethiopia.
translation.sw: Hata hivyo, Guyo alimuuliza Hachalu kuhusu unyanyasaji wa kihistoria uliofanywa kwa watu wa Oromo na mfalme Menelik II aliyeijenga Ethiopia ya sasa.

translation.en: Hachalu shocked some listeners when he answered that the horse seen immortalized in Meneliks equestrian statue in Addis Ababa belongs to an Oromo farmer called Sida Debelle, and that Menelik robbed that horse.
translation.sw: Hachalu aliwashangaza wasikilizaji wengi aliposema kuwa farasi aliyepandwa na Menelik katika sanamu iliyopo huko Addis Ababa alikuwa mali ya mkulima wa ki-Oromo aliyeitwa Sida Debelle, na Menelik alimuiba farasi huyo.

translation.en: This exchange attracted applause  and criticism  from commentators on Facebook and Twitter.
translation.sw: Majibu hayo yalivutia maoni ya kumsifia  na pia ya kumkosoa kutoka kwa watu mbalimbali huko Facebook na Twitter.

translation.en: When Hachalu was killed one week later, many members of the Oromo diaspora community immediately speculated that Hachalus criticism of the Menelik II statue infuriated sympathizers of imperial Ethiopia, which may have led to his murder.
translation.sw: Wakati Hachalu alikiuawa wiki moja baadaye watu wengi wa jamii ya Oromo wanaokaa nje ya nchi walihisi kwamba kitendo cha Hachalu kuikosoa sanamu ya Menelik II kiliwakasirisha wanaoiunga mkono Ethiopia ya kifalme na kusababisha kuuawa kwake.

translation.en: On social media, Oromo netizens focused obsessively on Hachalus Menelik-related remarks, which led many down a winding path to an insidious disinformation campaign.
translation.sw: Katika mitandao ya kijamii wananchi waling'ang'ana na kile Hachalu alichokisema dhidi ya Menelik, na hili lilisababisha kuenea kwa uvumi wenye taarifa nyingi za uongo.

translation.en: The rest of the interview contains other loaded issues of divisions and contradictions within the Oromo community.
translation.sw: Sehemu nyingine ya mahojiano imebeba taarifa za mambo yanayohusu utengano na migogoro ndani ya jamii ya Waoromo.

translation.en: Throughout the interview, Guyo grilled Hachalu about the countrys ongoing political reforms, stoking anti-government sentiment with questions about Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed, himself an Oromo, and whether or not the government had met the demands of the Oromo people after the prime minister came to power in 2018.
translation.sw: Katika mahojiano yote Guyo alimchimba sana Hachalu kuhusu mabadiliko ya kisiasa yanayoendelea nchini na kuhusu vuguvugu la kuipinga serikali kwa kuuliza swali kuhusu Waziri Mkuu Abiy Ahmed, ambaye ni Muoromo na kwamba kama serikali imeweza kutimiza matakwa ya watu wa Oromo tangu aingie madarakani mwaka 2018.

translation.en: Hachalu reiterated his non-involvement in the rabid partisanship of Oromo politics but he did criticize those who question Abiys Oromo identity.
translation.sw: Hachalu alirudia kusema kuwa hajihusishi na siasa za ovyo za Oromo lakini aliwakosoa wote wanaohukumu uzalendo wa Abiy.

translation.en: He defended his position against top Oromo opposition leaders who sought an alliance with the Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF), a once-dominant party with historic ties to the now-defunct Ethiopian People's Revolutionary Front (the EPRDF).
translation.sw: Aliilinda nafasi yake dhidi ya viongozi wakuu wa upinzani walioungana na Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF), ambacho kilishawahi kuwa na ukaribu na  chama kikuu chenye historia kubwa cha Ethiopian People's Revolutionary Front (the EPRDF).

translation.en: The TPLF turned into an opposition party after Abiy dismantled the EPRDF.
translation.sw: TPLF iligeuka kuwa chama cha upinzani baada ya Abiy kuibomoa EPRDF.

translation.en: Hachalu also addressed the political violence in the Oromia region, blaming both government authorities and the militant, splinter right-wing Oromo Liberation Front (OLF) militia group (informally known as OLF-Shane).
translation.sw: Hachalu pia alizungumza kuhusu vurugu za kisiasa zinazoendelea katika mkoa wa Oromo akilaumu pande zote yaani mamlaka za serikali na wanamgambo wa kikundi cha wanamgambo wa mrengo wa kulia Oromo Liberation Front (OLF) ambapo pia (hufahamika kama OLF-Shane).

translation.en: Following Hachalus murder, the government was able to acquire and release the full 71-minute interview to the public.
translation.sw: Kufuatia mauaji ya Hachalu, serikali iliweza kuchukua mkanda wa mahojiano yenye urefu wa dakika 71 na  kuyarusha kwa umma.

translation.en: The missing tape included Hachalus accounts of death threats he received from parts of western Oromia, where the radical OLF-Shane militia is active.
translation.sw: Mkanda huo unajumuisha ujumbe wa vitisho vya kuuawa alivyotumiwa Hachalu kutoka pande za Magharibi mwa Oromo, ambapo ndipo vikosi vya wanamgambo wa OLF-Shane wanafanyia shughuli zao.

translation.en: Hachalu said he believed he would not have been attacked on social media if he had praised OLF-Shane.
translation.sw: Hachalu alisema aliamini kuwa asingeshambuliwa mitandaoni kama angewasifia OLF-Shane.

translation.en: He addressed a direct conflict he had with Getachew Assefa, Ethiopias security and intelligence chief during the TPLF period.
translation.sw: Alizungumzia moja kwa moja mgogoro baina yake na Getachew Assefa, Afisa Usalama Mkuu wa Ethiopia katika kipindi TPLF ikiwa madarakani.

translation.en: Guyo, who promoted this interview on Facebook as must-see TV in the days before its broadcast, has since been arrested and the government is investigating the full 71-minutes of interview tape for further clues that may help determine the facts regarding Hachalu's murder.
translation.sw: Guyo, aliyeyatangaza mahojiano hayo katika ukurasa wake wa Facebook kwa kuyaita lazima uyaone siku chache kabla ya kurushwa kwake hewani, amekamatwa na polisi tangu wakati huo na serikali inafanya upelelezi wa mkanda wa dakika 71 za mahojiano hayo ili kupata vielelezo vitakavyosaidia kupata ufumbuzi wa chanzo cha mauaji ya Hachalu.

translation.en: Read more about the consequences of Hachalu Hundessa's murder in Part II.
translation.sw: Soma zaidi kuhusu madhara yaliyotokana na mauaji ya Hachalu Hundessa katika sehemu ya II.
