translation.sw: Picha kutoka  Guardian YouTube video kuhusu ukeketaji wa wanawake.

translation.en: COVID-19 has deeply affected womens rights in the Middle East and North Africa (MENA), from increased domestic violence to job loss.
translation.sw: Janga la COVID-19 limeathiri kwa kiwango kikubwa haki za wanawake huko Mashariki ya Kati na Kaskazini mwa Afrika;  kutoka kuongezeka kwa ukatili majumbani mpaka kupoteza ajira zao.

translation.en: But there is also one less visible area where women are affected: female genital mutilation (FGM), due to disruption in prevention because of the pandemic.
translation.sw: Lakini kuna eneo moja lililowazi ambapo wanawake wameathirika ambalo mi ukeketaji, na hii ni baada ya kulipuka kwa janga la Korona na heka heka za kukabiliana nalo.

translation.en: In April, the United Nations announced that due to pandemic-related disruptions in prevention programs, two million FGM cases could occur over the next decade that would otherwise have been averted.
translation.sw: Mwezi April, Umoja wa Mataifa ulitangaza kuwa kutokama ma vizuizi vilivyotokana na juhudi za kupambana na janga la korona, kuna visa milioni 2 vya ukeketaji ambavyo vinakisiwa kutokea kwa muongo ujao ambapo ingewekana kuzuia kama uzuiaji wa korona usingetibua mpango na juhudi za kupambama na ukeketaji

translation.en: Female genital mutilation includes all procedures that involve partial or total removal of the external female genitalia, or other injury to the female genital organs for non-medical reasons, according to the World Health Organization (WHO).
translation.sw: Ukeketaji unajumuisha shughuli za kukata kwa sehemu au kuondoa kabisa sehemu ya nje ya uke, au kuumiza sehemu  za uke bila uhusiano au dhana yoyote ya kutabibu, kulingana na Shirika la Afya Ulimwenguni (WHO).

translation.en: The practice, rooted in extensive traditions, cultural and religious beliefs throughout Africa, the Middle East and Asia, is typically performed by traditional midwives or healers using knives, razors or glass.
translation.sw: Kitendo hiki ni utamaduni wa kimila na kidini ulioota mizizi kote barani Afrika, Mashariki ya Kati na Asia , na hufanywa na wakunga wa jadi, waganga kwa kutumia visu, nyembe au vipande vya chupa.

translation.en: FGM, also known as genital cutting, is widely considered as one of the most extreme manifestations of violence against girls and women, and yet it is widely underreported in the Middle East.
translation.sw: Ukeketaji pia unafahamika kama ukataji wa sehemu za siri inaaminika kwa upana kuwa ni  moja ya ukatili uliopitiliza dhidi ya wasichana na wanawake, na bado unaripotiwa kwa uchache sana hasa huko Mashariki ya Kati.

translation.en: It is estimated that it affects at least 200 million women worldwide.
translation.sw: Inakadiriwa kuwa angalau wanawake milioni 200 wameathiriwa nao.

translation.en: The issue is explained in this UNICEF video:
translation.sw: Jambo hili limeelezewa vyema na UNICEF katika video:

translation.en: In the MENA region, Female Genital Mutilation (FGM) is a problem that primarily concerns Egypt, Sudan, Yemen, Iraq and Djibouti.
translation.sw: Katika ukanda wa Mashariki ya Kati na Kaskazini mwa Afrika, ukeketaji ni tatizo ambalo kimsingi linazitatiza nchi za Misri,  Sudan, Yemen, Iraq na Djibouti.

translation.en: Carlos Javier Aguilar, Regional Adviser Child Protection, explains more.
translation.sw: Carlos Javier Aguilar, Mshauri wa Masuala ya Ulinzi wa Mtoto anaelezea zaidi,

translation.en: Somalia has the highest prevalence of FGM with an estimated 98 percent of females between 15 and 49 years who experienced genital cutting.
translation.sw: Somalia inadhaniwa kuwa na idadi kubwa ya wahanga wa ukeketaji ambapo asilimia 98 ya wanawake wenye miaka kati ya 15 mpaka 49 wamekeketwa.

translation.en: In Djibouti, an estimated 93 percent are affected, Egypt, 91 percent, Sudan, 88 percent, Mauritania, 69 percent, Yemen,19 percent and Iraq, 7 percent, according to the latest figures released in June by the United Nations Population Fund (UNFPA).
translation.sw: Huko Djibouti, inakadiriwa asilimia 93 wameathirika, Misri asilimia 92, Sudan asilimia 88, Mauritania asilimia 69, Yemen asilimia 19  na Iraki asilimia 7 kulingana na takwimu zilizoachiliwa Juni na Shirika la Umoja wa Mataifa linaloshughulika na Idadi ya watu  (UNFPA).

translation.en: The practice varies according to social class, ethnicity and education in each country, with notable differences between urban and rural areas.
translation.sw: Kitendo hiki hutofautiana kulingana na tabaka la kijamii, kabila na hata kiwango cha elimu katika kila nchi na katika maeneo ya mijini au vijijini.

translation.en: FGM more often occurs among the poorest, least educated families in rural areas.
translation.sw: Ukeketaji mara nyingi hutokea baina ya watu maskini zaidi au katika familia ambazo hazijaelimika katika maeneo ya vijijini.

translation.en: In Yemen, FGM is concentrated in coastal regions but less common in the north.
translation.sw: Huko Yemen, ukeketaji umeota mizizi katika ukanda wa Pwani lakini unafanyika kidogo katika maeneo ya Kaskazini.

translation.en: In Iraq, the practice is more prevalent in northern Kurdish provinces.
translation.sw: Nchini  Iraq, kitendo hiki kimesambaa sana katika upande wa Kaskazini mwa jimbo la Kurdi.

translation.en: In Egypt, it is markedly higher among girls living in upper Egypt.
translation.sw: Huko Misri unafanyika zaidi kwa wasichana wanaoishi ukanda wa Juu wa Misri.

translation.en: In Mauritania, more than 90 percent of women from the poorest families have endured FGM compared to 37 percent of women from the richest families.
translation.sw: Nchini Mauritania, zaidi ya asilimia 90 ya wanawake kutoka katika familia maskini zaidi wamefanyiwa ukeketaji ukilinganisha na asilimia 37 ya wanawake kutoka katika familia zenye kipato cha juu.

translation.en: FGM: An underreported violation
translation.sw: UKEKETAJI: Ukatili Unaoripotiwa Kidogo Zaidi

translation.en: The scale and scope of FGM may be underestimated because the official global picture of FGM/C is incomplete, according to a joint report from March, authored by Equality Now, End FGM European Network and the US End FGM/C Network.
translation.sw: Ukubwa na upana wa ukeketaji utakuwa umedharauliwa kwa sababu ya ulimwengu kutokuwa na picha halisi ya ukeketaji iliyokamilika, kulingana na ripoti ya pamoja kuanzia Machi, imeidhinishwa na  Usawa sasa, Mtandao kutoka Ulaya wa Kutokomeza Ukeketaji   na  Mtandao wa kutokomeza ukeketaji kutoka Marekani.

translation.en: The report revealed growing evidence that the ritual is also practiced in other regions including the Middle East and Asia, and the world woefully underestimates FGM.
translation.sw: Taarifa hiyo ilidhihirisha kuwa utamaduni huu unaongezeka na pia unafanyika hata Mashariki ya Kati na Asia, na  dunia kwa hakika imeupuuzia ukeketaji.

translation.en: Small sample researches have recently shown that FGM is also practiced in Iran, along with Gulf states such as Kuwait, the UAE, Oman, and Saudi Arabia.
translation.sw: Tafiti ndogo zilizo fanyika hivi karibuni zinaonesha kuwa ukeketaji pia unafanyika huko Iran, pamoja na nchi zote za  Ghuba  kama vile  Kuwait, Falme za Kiarabu, Omani na Saudi Arabia.

translation.en: Divya Srinivasan from Equality Now told Reuters that she was particularly surprised at the results of small studies from places like Saudi Arabia and Oman, which are not normally countries that come to mind when you think of FGM.
translation.sw: Divya Srinivasan kutoka Usawa Sasa aliiambia Reuters kwamba alishangazwa sana na matokeo ya utafiti huo mdogo kutoka maeneo kama vile Omani na Saudi Arabia ambapo kwa kawaida sio maeneo ambayo yanaweza kukujia akilini unapoliwazia suala la Ukeketaji

translation.en: The report, published during the peak of the COVID-19 crisis in the Middle East, was not picked up by the Arabic speaking media or translated into Arabic, with little coverage of FGM in Arabic at all.
translation.sw: Taarifa hii ilichapishwa wakati janga la COVID-19 likiwa limeshika kasi huko Mashariki ya Kati na haikuchapishwa wala kutafsiriwa hata kidogo na vyombo vya habari na mitandao ya kijamii ya Kiarabu.

translation.en: This lack of public awareness may perpetuate the perception that FGM is not an issue of concern.
translation.sw: Jamii kukosa uelewa kuhusu ukeketaji inaweza kuthibitisha dhana ya kuwa ukeketaji sio jambo la kutilia maanani kabisa.

translation.en: Social taboos
translation.sw: Miiko ya Kijamii

translation.en: In the Middle East, taboos around womens bodies and sexuality prevent open, public discussions about sensitive issues like FGM, often tied to cultural, religious and traditional beliefs.
translation.sw: Huko Mashariki ya Kati, kuna miiko inayoizingira miili ya wanawake ambapo ni marufuku kujadili hadharani mambo ya siri kama vile ukeketaji ambapo umefungamanishwa na imani za kimila, dini na utamaduni.

translation.en: In Egypt, for example, Christians and Muslims both believe that circumcision of girls prevents them from vice and makes them more attractive for future husbands; mothers fear that their daughters cant get married if they have not been cut, according to a report by Stop FGM Middle East, a campaign created in 2013 to raise awareness about FGM and whose aim is to get the message out that FGM exists not only in Africa, but also in many countries in the Middle East and Asia.
translation.sw: Kwa mfano, nchini Misri Wakristo na Waislamu kwa pamoja wanaamini kwamba ukeketaji wa wasichana unawafanya wavutie zaidi waume zao watarajiwa na unawakinga na mabaya, pia wamama huhofia kwamba mabinti zao hawataolewa kama hawatakeketwa, kulingana na ripoti ya Tokomeza Ukeketaji Mashariki ya Kati, kampeni ambayo iliandaliwa mwaka 2013 kuipa jamii uelewa Kuhusu ukeketaji na pia kuuambia ulimwengu kuwa ukeketaji haupo Afrika pekee bali pia katika nchi nyingi za Mashariki ya Kati na Asia.

translation.en: The organization lobbies for more data on FGM and has created a survey toolkit to help individuals and groups create small-scale surveys on FGM.
translation.sw: Taasisi hii inaendelea kukusanya taarifa zaidi za ukeketaji na imetengeneza njia ya kukusanya taarifa itakayosaidia mtu mmoja mmoja au vikundi vya watu kufanya tafiti ndogo juu ya ukeketaji.

translation.en: Unless there is a critical incident that makes headlines, such as the recent FGM-related death of a 12-year-old girl in southern Egypt in February, people tend to avoid the topic.
translation.sw: Watu hupendelea kuepuka mazungumzo na  mada za ukeketaji labda tu litokee tukio litakalogusa vichwa vya habari kama tukio la kifo cha binti wa miaka 12 alifariki baada ya kukeketwa huko Kusini mwa Misri mwezi Februari, ndipo watu huzungumza.

translation.en: Ghida Hussein, an Egyptian student researching FGM, told Global Voices:
translation.sw: Ghida Hussein, mwanafunzi wa Kimisri aliiambia Global Voices kwamba:

translation.en: As we dont talk about it, it is as if the problem doesnt exist.
translation.sw: Kwa kuwa hatuzungumzi kuhusu jambo hili, ni kama vile tatizo hili halipo kabisa.

translation.en: FGM is often practiced silently behind closed doors.
translation.sw: Ukeketaji unafanyika kimya kimya nyuma ya milango iliyofungwa.

translation.en: It is happening far from the more educated urban centers of power where activists and politicians are seated.
translation.sw: Inatokea huko mbali na watu walioelimika mijini ambapo ndipo wanaharakati na wanasiasa wanakaa.

translation.en: FGM is a controversial sensitive issue and unless there is international attention and funding, it is not seen locally as a priority by an overwhelming male political class.
translation.sw: Ukeketaji ni jambo tata na labda  jumuiya ya kimataifa zitoe msaada wa fedha na uhamasishaji, lah sivyo hutaona jamii inayotawaliwa na tabaka la wanaume  wakilipa jambo hili kipaumbele.

translation.en: Breaking the taboo and speaking out about FGM can expose human rights defenders and victims to hate speech and backlash.
translation.sw: Kuvunja miiko na kuongea kuhusu ukeketaji huwafanya watetea haki za Binadamu kushambuliwa kwa lugha za matusi na chuki.

translation.en: In Oman, Women's rights activist Habiba al Hinai, founder of the Omani Association for Human Rights (OAHR), conducted a survey in Oman in 2017 and found that 78 percent of women have been cut.
translation.sw: Nchini Oman, mwanaharakati wa haki za wanawake Habiba al Hinai, mwanzilishi wa Taasisi ya Haki za Binadamu  Omani  alifanya utafiti mdogo mwaka  2017 huko Omani na akagundua kuwa asilimia 78 ya wanawake wamekeketwa.

translation.en: After publishing her findings online, Habiba received attacks and threats:
translation.sw: Baada ya kuchapisha matokeo ya utafiti wake mtandaoni, Habiba alipokea mashambulizi na vitisho:

translation.en: I posted my results online and the response was huge.
translation.sw: Niliweka matokeo ya utafiti wanhu mtandaoni na mwitikio ulikuwa mkubwa.

translation.en: I was attacked by religious conservatives who say female circumcision is a form of Islamic worship.
translation.sw: Nimeshambuliwa na waafidhina wa kidini ambao walisema kuwa ukeketaji ni sehemu ya ibada ya Waislam.

translation.en: In Oman, where FGM is not officially recognized, there is no protection or support for victims.
translation.sw: Huko Omani, ambapo ukeketaji hautambuliki rasmi, hakuna ulinzi kwa wahanga.

translation.en: Habiba added in the report:
translation.sw: Habiba aliongeza haya katika taarifa yake:

translation.en: How can you ask a survivor to speak out against FGM and then face all the consequences criticism and online defamation, her family and her tribe may disown her, maybe her husband will divorce her  without proper support.
translation.sw: Ni jinsi gani unaweza kumwambia manusura aongee kuhusu ukeketaji na kisha akumbane na madhara yote haya ikiwamo kukosolewa, kutukanwana hata familia au ukoo wame unaweza kumtenga kabisa, pengine hata mumewe anaweza kumtaliki- kama hakuna namna rasmi ya kuunga mkono.

translation.en: I dont expect these women to speak out and face society.
translation.sw: Sitarajii wanawake hawa kusimama na kuzungumza lwa ujasiri na kuikabili jamii.

translation.en: FGM eradication: Too slow, too inadequate
translation.sw: Kutokomeza Ukeketaji: Iko Taratibu sana, Haijitoshelezi

translation.en: In Yemen and the United Arab Emirates, FGM is only banned in medical facilities, but not in homes.
translation.sw: Nchini Yemen na  Umoja wa Nchi za Kiarabu, ukeketaji umezuiwa kufanyika katika Taasisi za afya pekee, lakini sio majumbani.

translation.en: In Mauritania, there are legal restrictions, but not an outright ban.
translation.sw: Nchini Mauritania, kuna kizuizi cha kisheria lakini sio kukatazwa moja kwa moja.

translation.en: In Iraq, FGM is outlawed in the Kurdish Autonomous Region but is still legal in central Iraq.
translation.sw: Nchini Iraq, ukeketaji umekatazwa huko kwenye jimbo la kidini la Kurdi, lakini bado ni halali katika ukanda wa kati wa Iraq.

translation.en: There have, however, been some major breakthroughs to eradicate FGM.
translation.sw: Kumekuwepo na dalili za kutokomeza ukeketaji.

translation.en: Following years of advocacy from womens rights organizations, Egypt banned the practice in 2008.
translation.sw: Miaka iliyofuata baada ya  kuanzishwa kwa taasisi ya haki za wanawakee, Misri  imekataza ukeketaji mwaka 2008.

translation.en: Sudan, in a political transition after 30 years of dictatorship, is the latest to outlaw FGM in April.
translation.sw: Sudani ikiwa katika kipindi cha mpito kisiasa  baada ya miaka 30 ya udikteta, imekuwa ya kwanza kukataza ukeketaji hapo  April.

translation.en: But law enforcement remains a major challenge because FGM still has a high degree of acceptance and prevalence.
translation.sw: Lakini utekelezaji wa sheria ni changamoto kubwa kwa sababu ukeketaji bado uko kwa kiwango cha juu na unakubalika pia umesambaa kwa sehemu kubwa .

translation.en: Although laws are an important deterrent, they are not enough.
translation.sw: Ingawa sheria sio silaha muhimu sana lakini bado hazijitoshelezi.

translation.en: States need national, comprehensible strategies that include input from police, judiciary, clerics, health care providers and education to civil society.
translation.sw: Nchi zinahitaji mpango na mkakati wa kitaifa unaotekelezeka ukihusisha polisi, mahakama, watoa huduma za afya, makarani na kutoa elimu kwa jumuiya ya kijamii.

translation.en: A series of regional crises and authoritarian rule has delayed reforms, limiting campaigns and resources to tackle womens rights violations.
translation.sw: Mfululizo wa majanga ya kikanda na mamlaka za kidikteta imechelewesha mabadiliko yakizuia kampeni na rasilimali za kupambama na uvunjifu wa hali za wanawake.

translation.en: Now, with the world's attention shifted to COVID-19 and its economic impact, many programs that advocate for womens rights and provide social services to vulnerable women are postponed or no longer a priority.
translation.sw: Sasa macho yote ya ulimwengu yameelekezwa kwenye kupambana na COVID-19 na madhara yake katika uchumi na programu nyingi ambazo zinahusika moja kwa moja na haki za wanawake walio katika mazingira hatarishi na kutoa huduma za kijamii zimeahirishwa kwa au pengine sio kipaumbele tena.

translation.en: With more families falling below the poverty line and girls taken out of school or forced into early marriage, FGM is also likely to continue to take place without notice in the region.
translation.sw: Kukiwa na familia nyingi maskini na wasichana wengi wanaoachishwa shule au ndoa utotoni, ukeketaji ni kama vile unaendelea kupata nafasi bila kujulikana katika ukanda huu.

translation.en: Abubakar Idris Dadiyata, image used with permission from The SignalNg.
translation.sw: Picha ya Abubakar Idris Dadiyata, imetumika kwa ruhusa kutoka kwa The SignalNg.

translation.en: Abubakar Idris Dadiyata, a lecturer and fierce critic of the Nigerian government, was abducted from his home on August 1, 2019,  in the Barnawa neighbourhood of Kaduna, in northwestern Nigeria.
translation.sw: Abubakar Idris Dadiyata, mhadhiri na mkosoaji mashuhuri wa serikali ya Nigeria alitekwa nyumbani kwake mnamo mwezi Agosti 1, 2019, huko Barnawa jirani na Kaduna, Kaskazini Magharibi mwa  Nigeria.

translation.en: One year after his abduction, Dadiyata has not been found.
translation.sw: Mwaka mmoja baada ya kutekwa kwake bado Dadiyata hajapatikana.

translation.en: Abubakar Idris (Didiyata) was abducted from his home in Kaduna state, Nigeria.
translation.sw: Abubakar Idris (Didiyata) alitekwa nyumbani kwake katika jimbo la Kaduna, Nigeria.

translation.en: His whereabouts still not known.
translation.sw: Nyendo zake bado hazijafahamika.

translation.en: His family and friends are demanding answer to the question: where is @dadiyata?
translation.sw: Familia yake  na marafiki wanataka majibu ya maswali yao ambayo ni: yuko wapi @dadiyata?

translation.en: Abubakar is a victim of enforced disappearance.
translation.sw: Abubakar ni mhanga wa kupotezwa #SikuYaKupotea #MwachieniHuruDadiyata.

translation.en: Dadiyata taught at Federal University Dutsinma, Katsina State.
translation.sw: Dadiyata alikuwa mkufunzi katika chuo Kikuu cha Umma cha Dutsinma, katika Jimbo la Katsina.

translation.en: As a member of the opposition Peoples Democratic Party, Dadiyata often sparred with members of the ruling All Progressive Congress party on social media.
translation.sw: Kama mwanachama wa chama cha upinzani cha Watu na Demokrasia (People's Democratic Party) mara zote Dadiyata alikwaruzana na wanachama wa Chama tawala cha Maendeleo Kwa Watu Wote (All Progressive Congress party) katika mitandao ya jamii.

translation.en: Read more: Apprehension rises over the abduction of a Nigerian government critic
translation.sw: Soma Zaidi: Hofu yatanda dhidi ya utekaji wa mkosoaji wa serikali ya Nigeria

translation.en: Both the state and federal agencies are busy doing nothing
translation.sw: Taasisi zote za serikali ya jimbo na serikali kuu hazijishugulishi na chochote

translation.en: Dadiyata was forcefully taken by abductors at about 1 a.m. as he arrived at his home, a year ago on August 1, 2019, Premium Times reported.
translation.sw: Dadiyata alichukuliwa kwa nguvu na watekaji mnamo saa 7 usiku alipowasili nyumbani kwake, mwaka mmoja uliopita siku ya tarehe 1, Agosti 2019, iliripoti Premium Times.

translation.en: Kadija, Dadiyatas wife recalls in an interview with BBC that her husband was making a phone call, his car was still running, when he was seized by his abductors.
translation.sw: Mke wa Dadiyata, Kadija katika mahojiano na shirikika la habari la BBC alikumbuka kwamba mumewe alikuwa anaongea na simu huku injini ya gari yake ikiwa inaunguruma bado, alipokamatwa na watekaji hao.

translation.en: Although Kadija could not hear what ensued over the phone or who he was talking to, she recalled that her husband's abductors had followed him, they even came into the house.
translation.sw: Ingawa Kadija hakuweza kusikia kilichokuwa kinazungumzwa au ni nani alikuwa anaongea naye kwenye simu, anakumbuka watekaji wa mume wake walikuwa wanamfuatilia na walikuja hadi nyumbani.

translation.en: Dadiyatas wife watched from her room as they drove her husband away.
translation.sw: Mke wa Dadiyata alibaki kuchungulia dirishani chumbani kwao wakati mumewe akichukuliwa na kuondoka watekaji hao.

translation.en: Sadly, theres still no information about Dadiyatas whereabouts.
translation.sw: Mbaya zaidi, ni kwamba hamna taarifa kuhusu alipo Dadiyata.

translation.en: It is painful, Kadija told the BBC, as their children keep asking about their missing father.
translation.sw: Inaumiza, sana jinsi watoto wao wanavyoendelea kumuulizia baba yao aliyepotea, Kadija aliiambia BBC.

translation.en: Rather than finding Dadiyata, Nigerian security agencies are absolving themselves from any form of guilt or blame for his disappearance.
translation.sw: Kuliko kumtafuta Dadiyata, taasisi za ulinzi za Nigeria zimeendelea kujitoa kwenye lawama za aina yoyote zinazohusiana na kupotea kwake.

translation.en: Nigerias Department of State Security (DSS) had in January denied having Dadiyata in their custody.
translation.sw: Idara ya Ulinzi wa Taifa la Naijeria, mpaka Januari iliendelea kukataa kumweka Dadiyata kizuizini.

translation.en: The state security agency stated that since Dadiyata was taken away from his house by some armed men does not suggest that those men were DSS staff.
translation.sw: Idara ya Ulinzi wa Taifa inasema kwamba kwa kuwa Dadiyata alichukuliwa nyumbani kwake na watu wenye silaha haimaanishi kwamba watu hao ni wafanyakazi wa Idara ya Usalama wa Taifa.

translation.en: Similarly, Aisha Dikko, the attorney general of Kaduna State, denied knowing the whereabouts or of being involved whatsoever in Dadiyatas abduction.
translation.sw: Vilevile mwanasheria mkuu wa Jimbo la Kaduna, Aisha Dikko, alikataa kufahamu alipo au kuhusika na lolote katika utekaji wa Dadiyata.

translation.en: Anything to the contrary is a vile assertion that seeks to stretch the fact that he was abducted within Kaduna State to mean the involvement of the state government, said Dikko.
translation.sw: Kwa vyovyote ni kinyume na ni mtazamo finyu kutaka kuamini kwamba kwa kuwa alitekwa akiwa katika jimbo la Kaduna basi serikali ya jimbo inahusika, alisema Dikko.

translation.en: However, these denials by DSS and Kaduna State Government neither mitigates the agony of Dadiyatas wife and their two children  nor does it restore his liberty.
translation.sw: Hata hivyo, kukana kuhusika kwa Usalama wa Taifa na serikali ya jimbo la Kaduna hakuondoi sononeko la mke wa  Dadiyata na watoto wao wawili wala hairejeshi uhuru wake.

translation.en: The plea for Dadiyatas release still echoes on Twitter in this hashtag #OneYearWithOutDadiyata, as Nigerians demand his release.
translation.sw: Maombi ya kutaka kuachiliwa kwa Dadiyata bado yanaendelea kurushwa katika kurasa za Twitter yakiwa na hashtagi ya #MwakaMmojaBilaDadiyata, ikiwa ni dai la Uhuru wake kutoka kwa Wanaijeria.

translation.en: Bulama Bukarti lamented about the trauma that this kind of impunity has caused Dadiyata's family:
translation.sw: Bulama Bukarti alilalamikia maumivu ambayo uharamia huu umeisababishia familia ya Dadiyata:

translation.en: Its unfathomable how a Nigerian would disappear just like that.
translation.sw: Inashangaza jinsi Mnaijeria anaweza kupotea namna hiyo.

translation.en: We must continue to do everything we can to get Dadiyata reunited with his family.
translation.sw: Lazima tuendelee kufanya kila liwezekanalo kumuunganisha Dadiyata na familia yake.

translation.en: There must be no place for this kind of impunity.
translation.sw: Hakuna nafasi ya uharamia wa namna hii.

translation.en: Those that abducted Dadiyata will pay the price.
translation.sw: Hao waliomteka Dadiyata watakuja kuilipa gharama.

translation.en: If not now, definitely later.
translation.sw: Kama sio sasa basi lazima iwe baadaye.

translation.en: This Twitter user was shattered on hearing Dadiyata's wife interview:
translation.sw: Mtumiaji huyu wa Twitter alighafilika alipoyasikia mahojiano ya mke wa Dadiyata:

translation.en: I was shattered to hear Dadiyatas wife speak to @bbchausa, this morning.
translation.sw: Nilighafilika kwa kumsikia mke wa  Dadiyata akihojiana na @bbchausa, asubuhi hii.

translation.en: All she is demanding is for his holders to forgive him and let him come back to his family; especially his little children.
translation.sw: Kitu pekee anachoomba ni watekaji wamsamehe na kumruhusu mumewe arudi kuungana na familia yake, hasa watoto wake wadogo.

translation.en: Akin Akíntáyọ cannot understand how Dadiyata can disappear without a trace for a year:
translation.sw: Akin Akíntáyọ haelewi jinsi  Dadiyata anaweza  kupotea bila kujulikana alipo kwa mwaka mzima:

translation.en: One question, how can Dadiyata and his car disappear without trace for a year in Nigeria and the government be just so nonchalant about it, seeking exculpation rather than taking full responsibility for finding him, especially when they were a target of his criticism?
translation.sw: Swali moja ninalojiuliza ni jinsi gani Dadiyata na gari lake walivyopotea bila kuacha alama kwa mwaka mzima tena ndani ya Naijeria; na wala serikali haina wasiwasi juu ya jambo hilo, zaidi inatafuta kujiosha badala ya kuchukua wajibu wa kumtafuta kwa kuwa alikuwa mlengwa kwao kwa sababu ya ukosoaji wake?

translation.en: Unfortunately, it seems as if nobody cares about finding the critic.
translation.sw: Bahati mbaya ni kama vile hakuna mtu anayejali kumtafuta mkosoaji huyo:

translation.en: Rather both the state and federal agencies are busy avoiding blame and doing nothing states human rights activist Professor Chidi Odinkalu in an interview with Vyral Africa:
translation.sw: Kinyume chake taasisi za serikali zote za jimbo na serikali kuu zinapambana kuepuka  lawama kutokufanya chochote alisema mwanaharakati wa Haki za Binadamu Professor Chidi Odinkalu katika mahojiano yake  na Vyral Africa:

translation.en: Besides saying that they dont know where he is.Nobody has really made the effort to tell us what they have done to find him and how it is that they cant account for him.
translation.sw: Zaidi ya kusema kuwa hawajui alipo,hakuna mtu ameonesha  jitihada za kutuambia wamefanya nini hasa ili kumpata  na ni jinsi gani hawatakiwi kuhusishwa naye.

translation.en: It tells you how so little we matter as citizens.
translation.sw: Hii inakuonesha ni jinsi gani hatuna maana kama raia wadogo.

translation.en: The least we can do is ask where Dadiyata is and why cant our government find him.
translation.sw: Kidogo tunachoweza kufanya ni kuuliza yuko wapi Dadiyata na ni kwa nini serikali yetu haimtafuti?

translation.en: School children in Kaduna State, Nigeria.
translation.sw: Wanafunzi katika Jimbo la Kaduna, Nigeria.

translation.en: Image by Jeremy Weate, January 15, 2010 via  Flickr / CC BY 2.0.
translation.sw: Picha na  Jeremy Weate, Januari 15, 2010 kupitia  Flickr / CC BY 2.0.

translation.en: Armed bandits attacked a secondary school in Kaduna, northwestern Nigeria, on August 24, killing one person and kidnapping four students and a teacher, reports Nigerian online medium, SaharaReporters.
translation.sw: Maharamia wakiwa na silaha walivamia shule ya sekondari huko Kaduna, Kaskazini Magharibi mwa Nigeria hapo Agosti 24 na kumuua mtu mmoja na kuwateka wanafunzi wanne na mwalimu kiliripoti chanzo cha habari za mitandaoni, SaharaReporters.

translation.en: The gunmen who arrived at Damba-Kasaya village in Chikun Local Government Area, Kaduna State, at around 7:45 a.m. on motorbikes first raided the community, where they reportedly killed Benjamin Auta, a farmer, according to Nigerian online newspaper Premium Times.
translation.sw: Watu hao wakiwa na silaha walifika na kushambulia kijiji cha Damba-Kasaya katika serikali ya mtaa wa Chikun, jimbo la Kaduna mnamo saa 1.45 asubuhi wakiwa kwenye pikipiki na  iliripotiwa kuwa walimuua Benjamin Auta, ambaye ni mkulima, kulingana na taarifa ya gazeti la mtandaoni la Premium Times.

translation.en: The gunmen then proceeded to Prince Academy Secondary School, where they abducted teacher Christianah Madugu, and four students: Favour Danjuma, 9, Miracle Danjuma, 13, Happy Odoji, 14, and Ezra Bako, 15.
translation.sw: Watu hao wenye silaha walielekea katika shule ya sekondari ya Prince ambapo walimteka  mwalim Christianah Madugu na wanafunzi wanne ambao ni Favour Danjuma, 9, Miracle Danjuma, 13, Happy Odoji, 14, na Ezra Bako, 15.

translation.en: Happys father, Isiaka Odoji,  told Daily Trust, a Nigerian daily, that the gunmen are asking for a ransom of 20 million naira (about $53,000 USD) to set their children free  an amount they cannot possibly afford.
translation.sw: Baba yake Happy,  Isiaka Odoji,  aliiambia  Daily Trust, gazeti la kila siku la Naijeria kwamba watekaji hao wanadai fedha kiasi cha Naira milioni 20(sawa na Dola za Marekani $53,000) ili waweze kuwaachilia huru watoto wao, lakini kamwe hawana uwezo wa kukusanya kiasi hicho.

translation.en: The kidnapped students in the last year of junior secondary school were writing their final examinations.
translation.sw: Wanafunzi waliotekwa walikuwa wakifanya mtihani wao wa kumaliza elimu yao ya msingi.

translation.en: Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, only students in exit classes were allowed to come back to school.
translation.sw: Kwa sababu ya mlipuko wa gonjwa la Korona, wanafunzi wanaomaliza shule pekee ndio waliruhusiwa kurudi shuleni.

translation.en: Both the federal and Kaduna state governments have remained silent on the fate of the abducted students and their teacher.
translation.sw: Serikali kuu na ile ya jimbo la Kaduna zimebaki kimya  kuhusu majaaliwa ya wanafunzi hao waliotekwa pamoja ma mwalimu wao.

translation.en: Its a normal day in Nigeria
translation.sw: Ni Siku Ya Kawaida Nchini Nigeria

translation.en: Twitter user Ndi Kato called the incident devastating for the nation:
translation.sw: Mtumiaji wa Twitter, Ndi Kato alisema tukio hili ni la kufadhaisha Taifa:

translation.en: Today in Kaduna state, children in exit classes who were told to resume school were kidnapped by armed gunmen.
translation.sw: Leo katika jimbo la Kaduna, watoto walio katika madarasa ya kumaliza ambao waliamriwa kuendelea na masomo wametekwa na watu wenye silaha.

translation.en: One was reportedly killed.Small boy, his life cut short.The others have been taken away and we may never hear of them again.
translation.sw: Mtu mmoja ameripotiwa kuuawa, maisha ya kijana mdogo yamefupishwa, na wengine wameondoka nao na pengine hatutawaona tena.

translation.en: This should devastate any nation
translation.sw: Hili lazima lilifadhaishe Taifa lolote..

translation.en: But it is still a normal day in Nigeria piqued Twitter user Chima Chigozie:
translation.sw: Lakini bado ni siku ya kawaida Naijeria alilalama mtumiaji wa Twitter,  Chima Chigozie:

translation.en: Some school children were kidnapped in kaduna, one of the school boys was killed along the line.
translation.sw: Baadhi ya wanafunzi wametekwa huko Kaduna, mmoja wa wanafunzi wa kiume ameuawa wakati wa tukio hilo.

translation.en: The boys life was cut short, the school children are being held in fear.This should spike the nation but NO, it's a normal day in Nigeria.
translation.sw: Maisha ya mvulana huyo yamefupishwa, hili lilipaswa kulishtua Taifa, lakini HAPANA, hii ni siku ya kawaida nchini Naijeria.

translation.en: Jaja blames politics for the absence of public empathy and outrage for the kidnapped school children:
translation.sw: Jaja anazilaumu siasa kwa kusababisha umma kukosa huruma na hasira dhidi ya utekaji huu wa wanafunzi:

translation.en: The abducted Kaduna Boys will not get the same support and attention as the Chibok Girls because firstly, they are boys, and secondly, GEJ isn't President.
translation.sw: Wavulana wa Kaduna waliotekwa hawatapata huruma waliyoipata wasichana wa Chibok kwa sababu kwanza ni wavulana na pili Goodluck Jonathan (GEJ ) sio Rais.

translation.en: Goodluck Ebele Jonathan (GEJ) was Nigeria's president when, in April 2014, 276 schoolgirls from a government secondary school were kidnapped by Boko Haram militants from the northeastern town of Chibok.
translation.sw: Goodluck Ebele Jonathan (GEJ) alikuwa Rais, wakati wasichana 276 kutoka katika shule ya serikali walipotekwa na wanamgambo wa  Boko Haram, kutoka Kaskazini Mashariki mwa mji wa Chiboko mnapo mwezi Aprili 2014.

translation.en: This lead to the global hashtag movement #BringBackOurGirls that resonated with millions of people around the world.
translation.sw: Utekaji huu ulisababisha kuwepo kwa mchakato ulioenea dunia nzima kukiwepo na hashtagi ya #WarudisheniMabintiZetu iliyoitikiwa na mamilioni ya watu mitandaoni.

translation.en: Read more: Nigerians celebrate the release of 82 Chibok girls from Boko Haram's captivity
translation.sw: Soma Zaidi: Wanaijeria Washerehekea kurejeshwa kwa wasichana 82 wa Chibok waliokuwa mikononi mwa Boko Haram

translation.en: On February 19, 2018, Boko Haram also kidnapped 110 schoolgirls from Government Girls Science and Technical College, Dapchi, Yobe State, northeastern Nigeria.
translation.sw: Pia Februari 19, 2018, Boko Haram waliwateka wanafunzi wa kike 110 kutoka katika shule ya wasichana ya sayansi na ufundi huko Dapchi, jimbo la Yobe, Kaskazini Mashariki mwa Naijeria.

translation.en: Read more: Nigerian schoolgirl abducted by Boko Haram allegedly dies in captivity
translation.sw: Soma Zaidi: Wanafunzi wa kike waliotekwa na Boko Haram nchini Naijeria washukiwa kufa

translation.en: The kidnapping of the Damba-Kasaya school children and their teacher is a grisly deja vu.
translation.sw: Utekaji wa wanafunzi wa Damba-Kasaya na mwalimu wao ni tukio la kutisha lililojirudia.

translation.en: The only difference is that this time around, those responsible for this horrendous incident are not Boko Haram  but armed bandits.
translation.sw: Tofauti pekee ni kwamba kwa sasa wale ambao wanahusika na tukio hili la kutisha sio Boko Haram bali ni maharamia wenye silaha.

translation.en: The rampaging bandits of Kaduna
translation.sw: Ukatili wa Maharamia wa Kaduna

translation.en: Banditry violence spiked in Nigerias northwestern states of Zamfara, Kaduna, Niger, Sokoto, Kebbi and Katsina.
translation.sw: Vurugu za kiharamia zililipuka Kaskazini Mashariki mwa Naijeria katika majimbo ya Zamfara, Kaduna, Niger, Sokoto, Kebbi na Katsina.

translation.en: ACAPS, an independent humanitarian think tank, asserts that this armed violence is unconnected to the Boko Haram insurgency in the northeast:
translation.sw: ACAPS ni shirika huru linaloshughulika na masuala ya kibinadamu, lilithibitisha kwamba vurugu hizi hazihusiani na uasi wa Boko Haram huko Kaskazini Mashariki:

translation.en: The banditry violence began as a farmer/herder conflict in 2011 and intensified between 2017 to 2018 to include cattle rustling, kidnapping for ransom, sexual violence and killings.
translation.sw: Vurugu hizi za kiharamia zilianza kama mgogoro baina ya wafugaji na wakulima mwaka 2011 na kukua zaidi kati ya mwaka 2017 na 2018 zikihusisha wizi wa mifugo, utekaji kwa ajili ya kujipatia fedha, ubakaji na mauaji.

translation.en: By March 2020, more than 210,000 people have been internally displaced.
translation.sw: Mpaka mwezi Machi 2020 zaidi ya watu 210,000 wamekuwa wakimbizi wa ndani.

translation.en: Rural communities have been left at the mercy of these bandits who, between January and June this year, have killed at least 1,126 people in northern Nigeria.
translation.sw: Jamii za vijijini zimebaki kuishi kwa hisani ya maharamia ambapo kati ya Januari na Juni mwaka huu wameshauawa watu wapatao 1,126 kutoka Kaskazini mwa Naijeria.

translation.en: Villages in southern Kaduna are the worst hit, with 366 lives lost in the first half of 2020, says Amnesty International.
translation.sw: Vijiji vya Kusini mwa Kaduna ndivyo vinavyoshambuliwa zaidi ambapo wameshauawa watu 366 katika nusu ya kwanza ya mwaka 2020, lilisema Shirika la Kimataifa la Haki za Binadamu.

translation.en: Chikun LGA, the home of the kidnapped students, had experienced a series of militia attacks that has resulted in the deaths, abduction, with 45 communities displaced and occupied since 2019, according to the Southern Kaduna Peoples Union.
translation.sw: Chikun LGA, nyumba ya wanafunzi waliotekwa imekuwa ikikumbana na mashambulizi kutoka katika vikundi vya wanamgambo ambayo yameambatana na utekaji na vifo pamoja na  jamii 45 kukimbia makazi yao ambapo yaliporwa tangu mwaka 2019, kulingana na  taarifa ya muungano wa watu wa Kusini mwa Kaduna.

translation.en: The people of southern Kaduna allege that the bandits are Fulani herders, on a land grab mission, with the passive consent of both the federal and state governments.
translation.sw: Watu wa Kusini mwa Kaduna wanadai kuwa maharamia hao ni wafugaji wa kabila la Fulani ambao wana mkakati wa kupora ardhi, wakisaidiwa na kutokuchukuliwa kwa hatua na serikali kuu na ile ya jimbo.

translation.en: But Kaduna State governor, Nasir El-Rufai denied that the carnage had anything to do with land grabbing nor any ethnoreligious motivation.
translation.sw: Lakini gavana wa jimbo la Kaduna,  Nasir El-Rufai alikataa uharamia huo kuhusishwa na mpango wa kupora ardhi au kuchochewa na itikadi za kidini.

translation.en: On August 22, the Kaduna State government relaxed the curfew from 6 p.m. to 6 a.m., which was imposed in some parts of the state to curb the banditry.
translation.sw: Agosti 22, serikali ya jimbo la Kaduna iliamuru watu kutokutoka ndani kuanzia saa 12 jioni  mpaka saa 12 asubuhi, ambapo katika baadhi ya maeneo inasadikika kuwa ni sehemu ya mkakati wa  serikali kukomesha uharamia.

translation.en: Nonetheless, Luka Binniyat, spokesman of the Southern Kaduna Peoples Union (SOKAPU) laments that hunger is also killing us because we cannot go to our farms.Our people are helpless.
translation.sw: Hata hivyo, msemaji wa Umoja wa watu wa Kaduna Kusini, Luka Binniyat, alilalamika kwamba njaa pia inatuua kwa sababu watu hawaendi mashambani mwao, watu wetu wamekosa tumaini kabisa.

translation.en: Poet Henry Swapon and lawyer Imtiaz Mahmood.
translation.sw: Mshairi Henry Swapon na Mwanasheria Imtiaz Mahmood.

translation.en: Collage from photos shared widely on social media.
translation.sw: Muunganiko huu ni wa picha zao zilizosambaa sana katika mitandao ya kijamii.

translation.en: Two people were arrested on May 14 and 15, for comments they had posted on Facebook.
translation.sw: Watu wawili walikamatwa hapo Mei 14 na 15 kwa kuweka maoni yao katika kurasa zao za Facebook.

translation.en: The arrests have sparked indignation and concern on social media.
translation.sw: Ukamataji huo umeleta maswali miongoni mwa jamii katika mitandao ya jamii.

translation.en: The arrest of poet Henry Swapon
translation.sw: Ukamataji wa Mshairi Henry Swapon

translation.en: On May 14, poet and journalist Henry Swapon was arrested at his home in Barishal city, located in south central Bangladesh.
translation.sw: Mei 14, Mshairi na Mwanahabari Henry Swapon alikamatwa akiwa nyumbani kwake katika mji wa Barishal, ulio Kanda ya Kati Kusini mwa Bangladesh.

translation.en: He has been accused of violating Bangladesh's Digital Security Act.
translation.sw: Amekuwa akituhumiwa kwa kukiuka sheria ya Usalama wa Mitandaoni ya Bangladesh

translation.en: A member of the small local Christian community, Swapon was previously sued, along with two brothers Alfred and Jewel Sarkar, for hurting religious sentiments of both Christians and Muslims on social media.
translation.sw: Akiwa ni mshirika katika jumuiya ndogo ya Kikristo, hapo mwanzo Swapon alishawahi kushtakiwa yeye na kaka zake Alfred na Jewel Satkat kwa kuumiza hisia za  kiimani za Waislam na Wakristo katika mitandao ya jamii.

translation.en: Bangladeshi poet and editor Henry Swapan was arrested, under digital security act law!
translation.sw: Mshairi na Mhariri wa Bangladeshi Henry Swapan alikamatwa chini ya sheria ya usalama wa mitandao!

translation.en: #freethepoet #bangladesh #bangladeshiblogger #FreedomOfSpeech pic.twitter.com/MGoCec2nsR
translation.sw: #MshairiAwekweHuru #bangladesh #bangladeshiblogger #UhuruwaMaoni pic.twitter.com/MGoCec2nsR

translation.en: According to the Dhaka Tribune, Swapon wrote a post on Facebook criticizing Lawrence Subrata Howlader, the Bishop of the Catholic Diocese of Barishal.
translation.sw: Kulingana na Dhaka Tribune, Swapon aliweka bandiko katika ukurasa wake wa Facebook akimkosoa Lawrence Subrata Howlader, ambaye ni Askofu Kanisa Katoliki katika Dayosisi ya Barishal.

translation.en: The Bishop had elected to hold a scheduled cultural program at a local Catholic church on April 22, 2019, the day after the terror attacks in Sri Lanka.
translation.sw: Askofu alichagua kufanya tukio la kiutamaduni katika moja ya makanisa ya Kikatoliki tarehe 22 Aprili 2019, ikiwa ni siku moja tu baada  shambulio la Kigaidi huko Sri Lanka.

translation.en: Swapon felt the Bishop should have postponed the festivities out of respect for hundreds of people killed in the attacks.
translation.sw: Swapon alidhani kuwa Askofu angeahirisha tamasha hilo kwa kuheshimu maisha ya mamia ya watu yaliyopotea katika shambulio hilo.

translation.en: Other Christians were angry about the tone he took with the Bishop and some even sent him death threats.
translation.sw: Wakristo wengine walikasirikia lugha aliyoitumia kwa Askofu na wengine walimtumia hata vitisho vya kumuua.

translation.en: Swapon has been vocal in social media against all the injustices and corruption in his town.
translation.sw: Swapon amekuwa mzungumzaji sana mitandaoni akikemea kila aina ya uonevu na rushwa katika mji wao.

translation.en: Netizen Swakrito Noman wrote on Facebook:
translation.sw: Mwanamtandao Swakrito Noman waliandika huko Facebook:

translation.en: In Bangladesh, the tactics of attacking activists with the allegation of hurting religious sentiments had been a monopoly of the Muslim fundamentalists.
translation.sw: Ndani ya Bangladesh, mkakati wa kushambulia wanaharakati kwa kuwatuhumu kuumiza hisia za kiimani umekuwa ni wa kawaida kwa viongozi wa Kiislamu.

translation.en: Now we see that conservative Christians are also at it.
translation.sw: Sasa tunaona hata wale wa  Wakristo wasiobadilika nao wameanza kutumia mbinu hii.

translation.en: I think those who feel this way hearing criticism are mentally sick.
translation.sw: Nafikiria ambao wanachukia namna hii ya ukosoaji ni wagonjwa wa akili.

translation.en: The state should arrange treatment for these sick individuals.
translation.sw: Serikali iandae utaratibu wa kuwapa matibabu wagonjwa hawa.

translation.en: We strongly condemn the arrest of poet Henry Swapon and demand his unconditional release.
translation.sw: Tunakemea kwa nguvu zote ukamatwaji wa Mshairi Henry Swapon na tunataka aachiliwe haraka bila masharti yoyote.

translation.en: The arrest of lawyer Imtiaz Mahmood
translation.sw: Kukamatwa kwa Mwanasheria Imtiaz Mahmood

translation.en: On the morning of 15 May, police arrested supreme court lawyer and writer Imtiaz Mahmud in a case filed in 2017 under the country's now-defunct Information and Communication Technology Act, in which a private citizen, Shafiqul Islam, alleged that one of Mahmood's Facebook posts had hurt religious sentiments and incited communal violence in Bangladesh's southeastern Chittagong region.
translation.sw: Asubuhi ya tarehe 15 Mei, polisi walimkamata Mwanasheria wa mahakama kuu  na mwandishi  Imtiaz Mahmud chini ya kifungu cha  sheria ya 2017 ambayo haitumika kwa sasa, sheria ya Habari, Mawasiliano na Teknolojia ambapo, raia mmoja, Shafiqul Islam, alilalamika kuwa mija ya machapisho ya Mahmood huko Facebook yameumiza hisia zake za kiimani na yalichochea uhalifu katika ukanda wa Kusini Mashariki mwa mkoa Chittagong, Bangladesh .

translation.en: Imtiaz Mahmood secured an anticipatory bail when the case was originally brought, but a Khagrachhari court issued another arrest warrant against him in January 2019.
translation.sw: Imtiaz Mahmood alipata alipata dhamana kwa muda kesi ilipoletwa kwa mara ya kwanza lakini mahakama ya Khagrachhari ilitoa amri ya kukamatwa tena kinyume na ile ya Januari 2019.

translation.en: Mahmood had commented on ethnic tensions that arose after a Bengali motorcyclist was killed in Khagrachhari, prompting a group of Bengalis to torch a number of houses and shops of the indigenous people in the Rangamati area of Chittagong.
translation.sw: Mahmood  alichangia maoni yake wakati wa  machafuko ya kikabila yaliyotokea baada ya mwendesha pikipiki wa  Bengali kuuwawa huko Khagrachhari, yakisababisha kikundi cha wa-Bengali kutia moto nyumba kadhaa na maduka ya wakazi wa eneo la Rangamati ndani ya Chittagong.

translation.en: Local sources told the Dhaka Tribune that police had taken no measures to control the situation.
translation.sw: Vyanzo vya huko viliiambia Dhaka Tribune kuwa polisi hawakuchukua hatua zozote kuzuia jambo hilo.

translation.en: Hundreds of similar lawsuits were filed from 2013 until 2018, when the ICT Act was effectively replaced by the Digital Security Act.
translation.sw: Mamia ya mashtaka ya aina hiyo yalifunguliwa  kuanzia mwaka  2013 mpaka 2018, wakati sheria ya Habari na Mawasiliano ilipobadilisha na sheria ya Usalama wa Mitandao.

translation.en: Bangladesh crackdown on social media.
translation.sw: Bangladesh yakandamiza mitandao ya jamii.

translation.en: Police have made a second arrest in less than a day under Digital Security Act.
translation.sw: Polisi wamefanya Ukamataji wa pili ndani ya siku mbili chini ya Sheria ya Usalama wa Mitandao.

translation.en: Writer Imtiaz Mahmood was arrested in a case over ICT act on Wednesday morning.
translation.sw: Mwandishi Imtiaz Mahmood alikamatwa kwa kesi iliyo chini ya sheria ya Habari na Mawasiliano siku ya Jumatano asubuhi.

translation.en: #Freedomofexpression #ICTLawhttps://t.co/eH8H38unCr
translation.sw: #UhuruwaKujieleza #ICTLawhttps://t.co/eH8H38unCr

translation.en: Writer Meher Afroz Shaon posted on Facebook:
translation.sw: Mwandishi Meher Afroz Shao aliandika  huko Facebook:

translation.en: He loves the mountains and the people who live there.
translation.sw: Anaipenda milima na watu ambao wanaishi pale.

translation.en: He writes about their rights.
translation.sw: Huandika kuhusu haki zao.

translation.en: I have never seen violent words in his writings.
translation.sw: Sijawahi kuona maneno ya uchochezi katika uandishi wake.

translation.en: There is something wrong Something is very wrong.
translation.sw: Kuna jambo haliko sawaKuna makosa makubwa sana.

translation.en: I hope the wrongs will be right soon.
translation.sw: Ninaamini  makosa yatarekebishwa haraka.

translation.en: PS: I have seen a lot of posts on Facebook which have violent words and slurs in them.
translation.sw: PS: Nimeshaona machapisho mengi sana huko Facebook ambayo yana lugha chafu na ubaguzi ndani yake.

translation.en: If one sues them, is an arrest warrant issued immediately?
translation.sw: Ikiwa watu hao wakishtakiwa leo, je hati ya kuwakamata itatolewa papo hapo?

translation.en: Many netizens have expressed condemnation against both arrests, with some demanding that the law should be repealed.
translation.sw: Wananchi wa Mitandaoni wengi wamekemea ukamatwaji huo wa wawili hao, wakitaka sheria ifutiliwe mbali.

translation.en: Expat Bangladeshi Leesa Gazi tweeted:
translation.sw: Mhamiaji wa Bangladeshi Leesa Gazi alitwit:

translation.en: Absolutely shameful.
translation.sw: Ni aibu kabisa.

translation.en: The Bangladesh government cannot ensure public safety but prompt to arrest people under the repressive Digital Security Act which is, by the way, against the very spirit of the constitution of Bangladesh.
translation.sw: Serikali ya Bangladesh haina uwezo wa kuhakikisha usalama wa umma lakini inajaribu kuwakamata watu chini ya sheria kandamizi ya Usalama wa Mitandani ambayo ni kinyume na Roho ya Katiba ya Bangladesh.

translation.en: https://t.co/1sFKY10OPV
translation.sw: https://t.co/1sFKY10OPV

translation.en: Journalist Probhash Amin wrote on Facebook:
translation.sw: Mwandishi wa Habari  Probhash Amin aliandika huko Facebook:

translation.en: After poet Henry Swapon, lawyer Imtiaz Mahmood (was arrested).
translation.sw: Baada ya Mshairi Henry Swapon, mwanasheria Imtiaz Mahmood (walikamatwa).

translation.en: Freedom of opinion is being restricted slowly.
translation.sw: Uhuru wa kujieleza umezuiwa.

translation.en: I want the repeal of all draconian acts.
translation.sw: Ninataka sheria zote za kikatili zifutwe.

translation.en: I want the freedom of expression.
translation.sw: Ninataka uhuru wa kujieleza.

translation.en: I want immediate release of Henry Swapon and Imtiaz Mahmood.
translation.sw: Ninataka Henry Swapon na Imtiaz Mahmood waachiliwe mara moja.

translation.en: Despite concerns about its implications for freedom of expression, the Bangladeshi parliament approved the Digital Security Act in September 2018.
translation.sw: Pamoja na kuonesha kuwa sheria hiyo ingebana uhuru wa kujieleza, bunge la Bangladeshi  iliipitisha sheria ya Usalama wa Mitandaoni hapo Septemba 2018.

translation.en: The law replaced the notorious Information and  Technology Act, which had also been used as a tool for silencing critical speech online.
translation.sw: Sheria hii ilichukua nafasi ya sheria nyingine kandamizi ya Habari na Teknolijia, ambayo pia ilikuwa ilitumika kama chombo cha  kuwanyamazisha wakosoaji Mitandaoni.

translation.en: The Act criminalizes various types of online speech, ranging from defamatory messages to speech that injures religious values or sentiments introducing hefty fines.
translation.sw: Sheria hii inahukumu baadhi ya mazungumzo mitandaoni kuanzia jumbe za kubeza mpaka  mazungumzo yenye kuumiza hisia na maadili ya  kidini ikiorodhesha pia faini kubwa.

translation.en: It also authorizes lengthy prison sentences for using the internet to create public unrest, and for gathering, sending or preserving classified government documents using a digital device.
translation.sw: Pia inaruhusu vifungo vya muda mrefu kwa makosa ya  kutumia mitandao kusababisha vurugu katika jamii na kwa kukusanya, kutuma na kuhifadhi habari na nyaraka nyeti za serikali kupitia huduma za kidigitali.

translation.en: The Editors Council of Bangladesh said that the Act is against the freedom guaranteed by the constitution, media freedom and freedom of speech.
translation.sw: Baraza la Wahariri la Bangladeshi lilisema kuwa sheria hii ni kinyume na uhuru uliotolewa kikatiba, uhuru wa vyombo vya habari na uhuru wa kujieleza.

translation.en: Read more: Free speech advocates say Bangladesh's new Digital Security Act is ripe for abuse
translation.sw: Soma zaidi: wanaharakati wa Uhuru wa Kujieleza Bangladesh wanasema sheria moja ya Usalama wa Digitali ni kwa kusudi la kunyanyasa

translation.en: The Act also provides absolute power to law enforcement agencies to initiate investigations of anyone whose activities are deemed harmful or threating.
translation.sw: Sheria inatoa  mamlaka kubwa sana  kwa  taasisi za kusimamia sheria kuanzisha upelelezi kwa yeyote ambaye shughuli zake zinahisiwa kuwa zina madhara na ni tishio kwa usalama.

translation.en: Khartoum, Sudan.
translation.sw: Khartoum, Sudan.

translation.en: Photo via Flickr by Christopher Michel under CC BY 2.0.
translation.sw: Picha na Christopher Michel kutoka Flickr chini ya  CC BY 2.0.

translation.en: In the aftermath of the Sudanese revolution, transitional authorities of Sudan have signed a peace agreement with The Sudan Revolutionary Front  the main rebel group still active after former leader Omar al-Bashir was deposed last year.
translation.sw: Baada ya mapinduzi ya Sudani, mamlaka za mpito za Sudani zimesaini makubaliano ya amani na The Sudan Revolutionary Front  kikundi kikuu cha waasi ambacho kimeendelea na utendaji wake hata baada ya kuondolewa kwa kiongozi wake wa zamani Omar al-Bashir, mwaka jana.

translation.en: The historic peace agreement, signed on August 31, in the city of Juba, South Sudan, found regional and international support from Troika countries, the European Union, Egypt and several Gulf countries.
translation.sw: Makubaliano haya ya amani ya Kihistoria yalisainiwa hapo Agosti 31, katika mji wa Juba, Sudani Kusini ambapo yanaungwa mkono na jumuiya za Kikanda na zile za Kimataifa kama vile nchi za Kitroika, Umoja wa Ulaya, Misri na baadhi ya nchi za Ghuba.

translation.en: But this exciting moment is also overshadowed by a period of historic flooding that has devastated parts of Sudan, causing a downward spiral in an already stressed economy.
translation.sw: Pia jambo hili la kusisimua limegubikwa na kipindi cha mafuriko ya Kihistoria ambayo yameathiri baadhi ya maeneo ya Sudani, yakisababisha kuendelea kuporomoka kwa uchumi ambao tayari ulikuwa umeshadorora.

translation.en: Still, Sudanese citizens on social media also welcomed the news.
translation.sw: Hata hivyo bado raia wa Sudani mitandaoni walisherehekea habari hizo mitandaoni.

translation.en: Waleed Ahmed, a Sudanese blogger, wrote:
translation.sw: Bloga wa Kisudani Waleed Ahmed aliandika:

translation.en: Today we give back, we return home.
translation.sw: Leo tunajitolea, tunarudi nyumbani.

translation.en: The video at the moment the Sudan Liberation Movement/Army (SLMA) led by Minawi announced a ceasefire in support of the December 16, 2019, revolution movement.
translation.sw: Video ambayo inaonesha jeshi (Sudan Liberation Movement (SLMAA) likiongozwa na Minawi likitangaza kuweka silaha chini hapo Disemba 16, 2019, ili kuunga mkono harakati za mapinduzi.

translation.en: Mini Arko Minawi, leader of SLMA, wrote:
translation.sw: Mini Arko Minawi, kiongozi wa SLMA, aliandika:

translation.en: Mini Arko Minawi.
translation.sw: Mini Arko Minawi.

translation.en: Yesterday's signing will put Sudan in a new momentum, on the parties, the Sudanese people, parties and civil society, in cooperation with friends and the regional neighbourhood.
translation.sw: Utiaji saini wa jana utaiweka Sudani katika mwendo mpya, katika vyama na kwa watu wa Sudani, mashirika na vyama vya kijamii katika ushirikiano na marafiki na kanda jirani.

translation.en: We must create a solid platform for a new history for our country.
translation.sw: Lazima tutengeneze jukwaa madhubuti kwa ajili ya historia mpya ya nchi yetu.

translation.en: Sudans Prime Minister Abdalla Hamdok welcomed the peace agreement, saying:
translation.sw: Waziri Mkuu wa Sudan Abdalla Hamdok aliyakaribisha makubaliano ya amani kwa kusema:

translation.en: I dedicate the peace that we signed today in the brotherly State of South Sudan, to our children who were born in displacement and asylum camps, to mothers and fathers who long for their villages and cities, waiting for the glorious December revolution, the promise of return, the promise of justice, the promise of development, and the promise of safety.
translation.sw: Ninaituma amani ambayo tumeitilia saini leo katika Taifa letu la Sudani kwa watoto wetu ambao wamezaliwa ukimbizini na katika makambi, kwa baba na mama ambao wanatamani vijiji na miji yao wakiyasubiri kwa hamu mapinduzi tukufu ya Disemba, ahadi ya kurejea, ahadi ya haki na ahadi ya maendeleo na usalama.

translation.en: The agreement guaranteed autonomy for rebel groups in their controlled areas under the supervision of the federal government.
translation.sw: Makubaliano haya yanavihakikishia uhuru wa kujitawala wenyewe vikundi vya waasi katika maeneo wanayoyashikilia chini ya uangalizi wa serikali kuu.

translation.en: It will guarantee one-third of parliament chairs for people from rebel areas in order to reflect their needs and issues.
translation.sw: Makubaliano yatahakikisha kuwa theluthi moja ya viti vya ubunge ni vya watu kutoka katika maeneo ya waasi ili kuwasilisha mahitaji na masuala yao.

translation.en: The agreement will guarantee justice and equality for those who were persecuted by the former regime, often for being non-Muslim and non-Arab.
translation.sw: Makubaliano pia yanahakikisha haki na usawa kwa wote ambao walishtakiwa na uongozi uliopita wengi wao wakiwa ni watu ambao sio Waislam au watu wasio na asili ya Kiarabu.

translation.en: This is not the first peace agreement in Sudan history.
translation.sw: Haya sio Makubaliano ya kwanza ya amani katika historia ya Sudani.

translation.en: Some netizens say that peace agreements are routine in Sudan, and may not bring peace and stability.
translation.sw: Baadhi ya wananchi mitandaoni walisema kuwa makubaliano ya amani ni mzunguko wa kawaida nchini Sudani na yanaweza yasilete amani wala utulivu.

translation.en: Inbal Ben Yehuda wrote:
translation.sw: Inbal Ben Yehuda aliandika:

translation.en: An event that occurs once in every 5-9 years is not a historic moment.It's routine.
translation.sw: Tukio linalotokea mara moja kila baada ya miaka 5-9 sio jambo la Kihistoria ni mzunguko tu.

translation.en: Abuja peace agreement  2006
translation.sw: Makubaliano ya Amani ya Abuja  2006

translation.en: Doha peace agreement  2011
translation.sw: Makubaliano ya Amani ya Doha  2011

translation.en: Juba peace agreement  2020
translation.sw: Makubaliano ya Amani ya Juba   2020

translation.en: Better to wait before we celebrate.
translation.sw: Bora tusubiri kabla ya  kusherehekea

translation.en: Incomplete agreement
translation.sw: Makubaliano Hayajakamilika

translation.en: Despite this exciting moment, two main rebel groups did not sign the agreement: The SLMA), led by Abdul Wahid al-Nur, and Sudan Peoples Liberation Movement-North (SPLM-N), led by Abdelaziz al-Hilu, both refrained due to lingering questions about the mechanisms for integrating armies and the country identity.
translation.sw: Pamoja na uwepo wa tukio hili la kusisimua, makundi mawili ya waasi hayajatia saini makubaliano haya.Kikundi cha SLMA kiliongozwa na Abdul Wahid al-Nur, na Chama cha harakati za Uhuru wa Wasudani kaskazini  (SPLM-N), kinachoongozwa na Abdelaziz al-Hilu, wote walijitoa kwa sababu ya kutokujibiwa kwa baadhi ya maswali kuhusu mfumo wa uendeshaji wa jeshi la muungano na utambulisho wa nchi.

translation.en: Three days after the peace signing, Sudan PM Abdalla Hamdok traveled to Addis Ababa, Ethiopia, to meet with al-Hilu to discuss points of contention, according to Sudan Tribune.
translation.sw: Siku tatu baada ya kusainiwa kwa makubaliano ya amani Waziri Mkuu wa Sudani alisafiri kwenda Addis Ababa, Ethiopia, kuonana na al-Hilu kujadili kuhusu ya mgongano huo kulingana na Usuluhishi wa Sudani

translation.en: Prime Minister Abdallah Hamdok on Wednesday held a secret meeting with Abdel Aziz al-Hilu in an effort to break the deadlock in the peace talks mediated by the South Sudanese government.https://t.co/IrNxxW9a0M pic.twitter.com/VgtyDZxfv3
translation.sw: Hapo Jumatano, Waziri Mkuu Abdallah Hamdok alifanya mkutano wa siri na Abdel Aziz al-Hilu zikiwa ni jitihada za kuondoa vikwazo katika mazungumzo ya amani yaliyofanywa na serikali ya Sudani Kusini.

translation.en: The meeting resulted in the signing of a joint agreement of memorandum reinforcing the principles of the peace talks in Juba.
translation.sw: Mkutano huu ulisababisha kusainiwa kwa mkataba utakaosimamia kuheshimiwa kwa makubaliano ya amani yaliyofanyika huko Juba.

translation.en: Sudan social media buzzed with a circulated copy of the agreement in English, with a particular focus on Article 3 on the subject of religion and state:
translation.sw: Mitandao ya kijamii ya Sudan ilizizima kwa kusambazwa kwa nakala ya makubaliano hayo yaliyoandikwa kwa lugjs ya Kiingereza, mkazo ukiwa katika kipengele cha 3 kinachozungumzia masuala ya dini na utaifa:

translation.en: A democratic state must be established in Sudan.
translation.sw: Taifa la kidemokrasia lazima lisimikwe Sudani.

translation.en: For Sudan to become a democratic country where the rights of all citizens are enshrined, the constitution should be based on the principle of separation of religion and state in the absence of which the right to self-determination must be respected.
translation.sw: Kwa Sudani kuwa Taifa la kidemokrasia ambapo haki za watu wote zinaheshimiwa, katiba lazima iwe na misingi ya kutenga udini na utaifa  ambapo haki za mtu binafsi lazima ziheshimiwe.

translation.en: Freedom of belief and worship and religious practice shall be guaranteed in full to all Sudanese citizens.
translation.sw: Uhuru wa kuamini na kuabudu na shughuli za kidini utolewe kwa  wananchi wote wa Sudani.

translation.en: The state shall not establish an official religion.No citizen shall be discriminated against based on their religion.
translation.sw: Serikali isiweke dini ya Taifa, asiwepo mwananchi atakayebaguliwa kwa sababu ya dini yake.

translation.en: Sudanese people split into two camps on the matter: The first sees the separation of religion and state as a guarantee of fundamental human rights; the second says the transitional government does not have the right to decide this without authorization from citizens via democratic elections.
translation.sw: Wananchi wa Sudani wamegawanyika katika makundi mawili katika suala hili: kundi la kwanza linaona kuwa kutenga uraia na dini ni jambo la msingi katika misingi haki za Binadamu; kundi la pili linaona kuwa serikali ya mpito haina mamlaka ya kufanya maamuzi juu ya jambo hilo bila ruhusa ya wananchi kupitia uchaguzi wa kidemokrasia.

translation.en: Following the meeting, the prime ministers Twitter account published an Arabic version of the agreement that differed from the English one, addressed as a joint press release.
translation.sw: Baada ya mkutano huo, ukurasa wa Twitter wa Waziri Mkuu ulichapisha nakala ya mkataba huo kwa lugha ya Kiarabu  ambapo maudhui yake yalitofautiana na yale yaliyopo katika nakala iliyoandikwa kwa lugha ya Kiingereza.

translation.en: While the English document emphasized the separation of religion from the state as an inevitability, the Arabic document only recommended discussion of the controversial issue.
translation.sw: Wakati katika nakala ya Kiingereza msisitizo umewekwa kwa kuonesha kuwa haiwezekani kutenganisha dini na utaifa, katika nakala ya lugha ya Kiarabu inapendekeza majadiliano katika suala hili lenye utata.

translation.en: The differences between the two documents raise questions about the future of this agreement.
translation.sw: Tofauti katika nakala hizi mbili umeibua maswali mengi kuhusu hatma ya makubaliano haya.

translation.en: Historic peace, historic floods
translation.sw: Amani Ya Kihistoria, Mafuriko Ya Kihistoria

translation.en: While peace has brought happy news to Sudan, the Nile River continues to flood, ushering in an unprecedented humanitarian disaster.
translation.sw: Wakati amani ikileta furaha nchini Sudani, mto Nile unaendelea kufurika ukileta majanga yasiyotarajiwa kwa binadamu.

translation.en: According to a Sudanese National Council for Civil Defense report on September 8, total losses due to the Nile flood amounted to 103 deaths, 50 injuries, 5,482 deaths of livestock, 27,341 complete house collapses, 42,210 cases of partial house collapse, damage to 179 government and private facilities, loss of 359 shops and stores and damage to 4,208 agricultural acres.
translation.sw: Kulingana na taarifa ya Septemba 8  ya, baraza la Ulinzi wa Taifa, kutokana na mafuriko hayo vimetokea vifo vya watu 103, majeruhi 50, vifo vya mifugo 5,482, nyumba 27,341zimebomoka kabisa na nyumba 42,210 zimebomoka nusu,  majengo ya serikali na taasisi binafsi 179 yameharibiwa, maduka na maghala 359 yameharibiwa na hekari 4,208 za mazao zimeharibiwa na mafuriko hayo.

translation.en: YouStorm on Twitter showed a video comparing the Nile Basin from July 16 and August 16:
translation.sw: YouStorm katika ukurasa wake wa Twitter walionesha video wakilinganisha ujazo wa maji katika mto Nile Julai 16 na Agosti 16:

translation.en: Floods on the Nile in Sudan  16 July comparison with 30 August #Sentinel2  north of Khartoum.
translation.sw: Mafuriko katika mto Nile nchini Sudani  Julai 16 ukilinganisha na Agosti 30 #Sentinel2  Kaskazini mwa Khartoum.

translation.en: Made with #EOBrowser @sentinel_hub #Sudanfloods pic.twitter.com/l8LRNBFY9m
translation.sw: Imetengenezwa kwa  #EOBrowser @sentinel_hub #Sudanfloods pic.twitter.com/l8LRNBFY9m

translation.en: On September 3, Sinnar state governor Ustaz Elmahi Sulieman issued a distress call on Facebook:
translation.sw: Hapo Septemba 3, gavana wa jimbo la Sinnar,  Ustadhi Elmahi Sulieman alitangaza hali ya hatari katika ukurasa wake wa Facebook:

translation.en: The levels of the Blue Nile this night witnessed a great rise accompanied by heavy rain, which led to the breaking of the covers and shields, a simple dam built by sacks of the soil, of the city of Singa and Umm Benin areas, and the water began to flood the city and its homes, as well as the neighbourhoods of Umm Benin.
translation.sw: Kimo cha maji ya Mto Nile usiku huu kimeongezeka kutokana ma mvua kubwa ambazo zimesababisha kuvunjika kwa vizuizi na kuta za ulinzi ambavyo ni bwawa dogo lililojengwa na magunia yaliyojazwa udongo za mji wa Singa na maeneo ya Umm Benin, na maji yameanza kufurika katika mji na katika makazi ya watu.

translation.en: Therefore, we launch a directive to all official bodies and an appeal to all civil authorities and organizations to come to the rescue of the citizens as soon as possible, and to provide shelter, medicines and food.
translation.sw: Hivyo basi tunatoa maelekezo kwa mamlaka zote za serikali na mashirika binafsi kujitokeza na kuja kusaidia kuwaokoa wananchi mapema iwezekanavyo na pia kuwapatia hifadhi, chakula na matibabu.

translation.en: The situation is catastrophic:
translation.sw: Hali ni ya kutisha:

translation.en: Sinnar state | Singa city The situation is catastrophic after the rain broke out the city's water shield, which allowed the waters of the Blue Nile to enter the city.
translation.sw: Katika Jimbo la Sinnar | mji wa Singa,  hali ni ya kutisha baada ya mvua kuvunja ukuta wake wa kizuizi hivyo kuruhusu maji kutoka Mto Nile kuingia mjini.

translation.en: Sudanese youth from Tuti Island have built a shield to prevent floodwaters from reaching the islands interior.
translation.sw: Vijana wa Kisudani kutoka kisiwa cha Tuti walijenga ukuta wa kuzuia maji ya mafuriko kuingia ndani ya kisiwa chao.

translation.en: It was a heroic scene, described by Hassan Shaggag:
translation.sw: Kilikuwa kitendo cha kishujaa, alisimulia Hassan Shaggag:

translation.en: These are the ones who will build Sudan  and not the ones who are fighting for power now.
translation.sw: Hawa ndio watakaoijenga Sudani..na ndio wanaogombea madaraka sasa.

translation.en: Sudanese citizens lack basic necessities like bread, gas, medicine and electricity  with power outages up to six hours a day.
translation.sw: Wananchi wa Sudani wana upungufu wa mahitaji muhimu kama vile mkate, gesi, madawa na umeme- baada ya kukatika kwa umeme kwa masaa sita kwa siku.

translation.en: The Sudanese pounds inflation rate has exceeded 202 percent, according to Professor Steve Hanke.
translation.sw: Kudorora kwa fedha ya Sudani sasa imezidi asilimia 202, kulingana na  Professor Steve Hanke.

translation.en: Yet, transitional authorities have not been able to gain control over the market.
translation.sw: Hata hivyo, mpaka sasa serikali ya mpito haijaweza bado kulitawala soko.

translation.en: Now that theres again the promise of peace, what are the governments plans to make life easier for citizens?
translation.sw: Sasa tena kuna ahadi ya amani, ni nini hasa mkakati wa serikali kuyarahisisha maisha ya wananchi?

translation.en: Student leader Jutatip Sirikhan covered herself in white paint in a symbolic act of protest following her release.
translation.sw: Kiongozi wa wanafunzi Jutatip Sirikhan akiwa amefunikwa kwa rangi nyeupe ikiwa ishara ya mgomo baada ya kuachiliwa kwake.

translation.en: Photo and caption from Prachatai
translation.sw: Picha na maelezo kutoka kwa Prachatai

translation.en: This article is from Prachatai, an independent news site in Thailand, edited and republished by Global Voices as part of a content-sharing agreement.
translation.sw: Makala hii ni kutoka kwa Prachatai, chanzo huru cha habari huko Thailand, ikiwa imehaririwa na kuchapishwa na Global Voices kama sehemu ya makubaliano ya kushirikishana mahudhui.

translation.en: Student Union of Thailand (SUT) president Jutatip Sirikhan has been arrested while on the way to university on September 1 for her participation in the July 18 mass protest.
translation.sw: Raisi wa Umoja wa wanafunzi wa Thailand Jutatip Sirikhan amekamatwa akiwa njiani akielekea chuoni hapo Septemba 1, kwa sababu ya kushiriki katika maandamano makubwa ya Julai 18.

translation.en: Jutatip was arrested while in a taxi on her way to class at Thammasat Universitys Tha Prachan campus in Bangkok.
translation.sw: Jutatip alikamatwa akiwa ndani ya gari akielekea darasani katika chuo kikuu cha Thammasat kampasi ya Tha Prachan huko Bangkok.

translation.en: She went live on Facebook at 12:50 pm on September 1 when plainclothes police officers stopped the taxi she was in and delivered an arrest warrant.
translation.sw: Aliingia mubashara katika ukurasa wake wa Facebook mnamo saa 07:50 mchana hapo Septemba 1, wakati askari waliovalia kiraia waliposimamisha taksi aliyokuwa amepanda na wakamwonesha hati ya kumkamata.

translation.en: Jutatip was taken to Samranrat Police Station.
translation.sw: Jutatip alipelekwa kwenye kituo cha polisi cha  lSamranrat.

translation.en: An officer accompanied her in another taxi to the station, since she did not feel safe enough to travel in the private car the officers brought to arrest her.
translation.sw: Afisa wa polisi aliambatana naye kuelekea kituoni akiwa kwenye taksi nyingine kwa sababu hakujisikia kuwa salama kupanda gari binafsi walilokuja nalo askari waliokuja kumkamata.

translation.en: She stayed live on Facebook and read out passages from the Thai translation of Thomas Paines Common Sense during the travel to the station.
translation.sw: Aliendelea kuwa mubashara katika ukurasa wake wa Facebook, akisoma kifungu cha habari  Ufahamu wa Kawaida kilichotafsiriwa kwa Kithailand na Thomas Paine.

translation.en: She was then taken to the Bangkok Criminal Court and was granted bail and released at 5:20 pm in the custody of a lecturer at Thammasat University.
translation.sw: Alipelekwa katika mahakama ya kihalifu ya Bangkok na alipewa dhamana na kuachiliwa saa 11.20 jioni akiwa chini ya uangalizi wa Mhadhiri kutoka chuo kikuu cha Thammasat.

translation.en: The Court did not require her to immediately pay the 100,000 baht (3,190 US dollars) bail but imposed the condition that she does not repeat the actions for which she was being charged  the same condition given to everyone else who has been arrested and released on the same charges.
translation.sw: Mahakama haikumtaka alipe papo hapo kiasi cha baht 100,000  (sawa na dola za Marekani 3,190) kwa ajili ya dhamana, lakini aliwekewa masharti kwamba hatakiwi kurudia tena makosa aliyoshtakiwa kwayo  masharti hayo hayo yalitolewa kwa kila mmoja aliyekamatwa na kuachiliwa kwa mashtaka hayo.

translation.en: Jutatip is the 14th activist to be arrested for participating in the July 18 mass protest.
translation.sw: Jutatip ni mwanaharakati wa 14 kukamatwa kwa kushiriki maandamano makubwa ya Julai 18.

translation.en: Fifteen other participants at the protest have also received a summons and reported to Samranrat Police Station to hear the charges against them on August 28.
translation.sw: Washiriki wengine 15 wa maandamano hayo wamepokea wito na wameripoti katika kituo cha polisi cha  Samranrat kusikiliza mashtaka yao hapo Agosti 28.

translation.en: Jutatip was charged with sedition and violation of the Emergency Decree and the Communicable Diseases Act, among other charges.
translation.sw: Jutatip alishtakiwa kwa uchochezi, kukaidi Amri ya Dharura na Sheria ya Magonjwa ya Kuambukiza, pamoja na mashtaka mengine.

translation.en: Jutatip appeared in front of the Criminal Court after her release and gave a short press conference.
translation.sw: Jutatip alitoka mbele ya mahakama ya kihalifu baada ya kuachiliwa huru na alifanya mkutano mfupi na vyombo vya habari.

translation.en: Paint can be washed out, but we cant wash out injustice
translation.sw: Rangi inaweza kusafishwa, lakini hatuwezi kusafisha uonevu

translation.en: I didnt intend to run away to begin with.
translation.sw: Sikupanga kukimbia tangu awali.

translation.en: I know I have an arrest warrant.
translation.sw: Nilifahamu kuwa nina hati ya kukamatwa

translation.en: I have been waiting to be arrested for a very long time, but it didnt happen until today.
translation.sw: na nimekuwa nikisubiri kukamatwa kwa muda mrefu, lakini haikutokea mpaka leo.

translation.en: Each time someone gets arrested, there will be slurs against our side that we did not protest peacefully.
translation.sw: Kila mara anapokamatwa mtu mmoja lazima yatokee maneno mabaya kwamba hatukuandamana kwa amani.

translation.en: I am a student and I have been harassed by the police for months, for years.
translation.sw: Mimi ni mwanafunzi na nimekuwa nikisumbuliwa na askari kwa miezi, kwa miaka kadhaa.

translation.en: Why is there no compensation for me?
translation.sw: Kwa nini hakuna fidia kwangu?

translation.en: Why must there be compensation for the police who are servants of the dictatorship?
translation.sw: Kwa nini iwepo fidia kwa polisi tu ambao ni watumishi wa udikteta?

translation.en: There should actually be a summons first, but what happened was that the police brought the arrest warrant and arrested me.
translation.sw: Ingetakiwa uwepo wito kwanza, lakini kilichotokea ni kwamba polisi walikuja na hati ya kunikamata moja kwa moja.

translation.en: Its extremely unfair to a student.
translation.sw: Ni uonevu wa hali ya juu kwa mwanafunzi.

translation.en: They followed me with my phone signal, followed me from where Im staying.
translation.sw: Walinipata kwa kufuatilia mawasiliano yangu ya simu kuanzia ninapoishi.

translation.en: They threatened my home, they threatened my family, they took a warrant to my house, so now we have to escalate our protest.
translation.sw: Wametishia watu nyumbani kwangu, familia yangu na waliipeleka hati ya kunikamata nyumbani  kwa hiyo sasa inabidi tuyaimarishe maandamano yetu.

translation.en: Everything is supported by the Constitution.
translation.sw: Kila kitu kipo kulingana na katiba.

translation.en: We pay our taxes.We must receive protection from the state, not harassment from the state.
translation.sw: Tunalipa kodi zetu, lazima tulindwe na serikali sio kudhalilishwa na serikali.

translation.en: So today I have to express myself symbolically that we can do this.
translation.sw: Kwa hiyo leo, nimejieleza kwa kuashiria kwamba tunaweza tukalifanya hili.

translation.en: We must stand by our rights and freedoms.
translation.sw: Lazima tusimame kwa ajili ya haki zetu na uhuru wetu.

translation.en: Throwing paint is also something that can be done.
translation.sw: Kujimwagia rangi pia ni kitu kinachoweza kufanyika.

translation.en: Jutatip then threw a bucket of white paint over herself while holding up her hand in the three-finger Hunger Games salute.
translation.sw: Kisha Jutatip alijimwagia ndoo ya rangi nyeupe mwilini mwake huku akiwa ameinua mkono wake juu huku akiwa amenyoosha vidole vitatu saluti  ya Mchezo wa Njaa.

translation.en: She said that the white paint represents purity and justice, and that they are demanding justice back.
translation.sw: Alisema kuwa rangi nyeupe inawakilisha usafi na haki, na wanadai urejesho wa haki.

translation.en: We are showing that this is freedom, this is the kind of expression we can do.
translation.sw: Tunaonesha kuwa hii ni haki, hii ni aina ya kielelezo cha kwamba tunaweza kufanya.

translation.en: Even if now it is throwing paint over ourselves, it is a way of showing that we can throw paint at any time.
translation.sw: Hata kama ni kujimwagia rangi kwa sasa, ni njia ya kuonesha kuwa tunaweza kujimwagia rangi saa yoyote.

translation.en: We can throw paint over those with power, because those with power throw legal charges over us, throw bullets at us without exception.
translation.sw: Tunaweza kuwamwagia rangi hao walio na mamlaka kwa sababu wanatutia hatiani na kuturushia risasi saa yoyote bila kujali, kwa kuwa wana mamlaka.

translation.en: Paint can be washed out, but we cant wash out injustice.
translation.sw: Rangi inaweza kusafishwa lakini uonevu hauwezi kusafishwa.

translation.en: Afterward, Jutatip thanked the lecturer who came to make bail for her and the people who came to support her and helped the crowd clean the paint off the sidewalk in front of the footpath in front of the Court.
translation.sw: Baada ya hapo, Jutatip alimshukuru Mhadhiri ambaye alimuwekea dhamana na watu waliokuja kumuunga mkono na kusaidia umati kusafisha rangi iliyokuwa imetapakaa katika njia ya waenda kwa miguu mbele ya mahakama.

translation.en: We wont stop fighting until we win in everything, including monarchy reform and a new constitution, Jutatip said.
translation.sw: Hatutaacha kupambana mpaka tushinde kila kitu, ikiwemo marekebisho ya ufalme na  katiba mpya, alisema Jutatip.

translation.sw: Chapisho hili liliandikwa na Grace Jolliffe na mwanzoni and originally alilirushwa na Video Volunteers, kikundi cha kumtandao cha kimataifa kilichoshinda tuzo na makao yake makuu ni  India.
