translation.sw: Toleo lililohaririwa kidogo imechapishwa hapo chini kama sehemu ya makubaliano ya kushirikishana maudhuhi.

translation.en: While India is going through a major general election spread over seven phases from 11 April to 19 May 2019 in order to elect its 17th parliament (Lok Sabha), some Indian voters have taken the unusual step of boycotting the electoral process.
translation.sw: Wakati India ikipitia kipindi cha uchaguzi mkuu uliogawanyika katika awamu saba zinazoanzia 11 April mpaka 19 Mei 2019 ili kuchagua bunge lake la saba (Lok Sabha), baadhi ya wapiga kura wa India wamechukua hatia isiyo ya kawaida kwa kugomea shughuli za uchaguzi.

translation.en: Read More: All you need to know about India's 2019 general elections
translation.sw: Soma Zaidi: Yote unayotaka kufahamu kuhusu uchaguzi mkuu wa India 2019

translation.en: In Goa, a southwestern state of India, residents of a tribal hamlet in Canacona block (district subdivision), Marlem Village refused to vote on 23 April during the third phase of the general election, alleging that the government had been oblivious to the problems of their village.
translation.sw: Huko Goa, jimbo la Kusini mwa India, wakazi wa kijiji kidogo kilichopo kitongoji  cha Cancona (sehemu ya wilaya), kijiji cha Marlem walikataa kupiga kura tarehe 23 Aprili katika awamu ya tatu ya uchaguzi mkuu wakiwa na madai kwamba serikali imekuwa ndio tatizo kuwa katika kijiji chao.

translation.en: Their main grievance is that basic facilities, such as proper roads and water supply, have not been provided by the government.
translation.sw: Malalamiko yao makubwa ni kwamba mahitaji na huduma muhimu kama vile barabara nzuri na huduma ya maji safi na salama hazijawahi kutolewa na serikali.

translation.en: A video by Community Correspondent Devidas Gaonkar, a member of the aboriginal shepherd tribe of Goa called Velip, documented the protests of the villagers:
translation.sw: Video ya Mtangazaji wa masuala ya kijamii  Devidas Gaonkar, mzaliwa wa kabila la wafugaji la waGoa inayoitwa Velip, ikionesha maandano ya wanakijiji hao:

translation.en: In this video, Pandurang Gaonkar, a resident from Marli village, states that:
translation.sw: Katika video hii, Pandurang Gaonkar, mkazi wa kijiji cha Marli alisema kwamba:

translation.en: Tirwal to Marlem is a three-quilometres road stretch, which is incomplete.
translation.sw: Kuanzia Tirwal mpaka Marlem ni kilomita tatu tu za barabara lakini hazijakamilika.

translation.en: To date, no action has been taken by the authorities.
translation.sw: Mpaka leo hakuna hatua zozote zilizochukuliwa na mamlaka husika.

translation.en: They only make false promises, but no implementation.
translation.sw: Wanatupa ahadi za uongo tu hakuna utekelezaji.

translation.en: For this reason, we havent cast our votes.
translation.sw: Na kwa sababu hiyo basi, hatujapiga kura.

translation.en: The residents of Marlem have been living in this village for more than 20 years.
translation.sw: Wakazi wa kijiji cha Marlem wamekuwa wakiishi katika kijiji hicho kwa zaidi ya miaka 20 sasa.

translation.en: In 1968, the Forest Department declared Marlem village part of a wildlife sanctuary.
translation.sw: Mwaka 1968, idara ya misitu ilitangaza kuwa kijiji cha Marlem kama  sehemu salama kwa wanyama wa mwituni.

translation.en: This makes the construction of roads, or any development work in this area, a rather complex issue.
translation.sw: Hili linafanya ujenzi wa barabara au kazi yoyote ya maendeleo katika eneo hili kuwa na ugumu wa kutekeleza.

translation.en: According to reports, an underground power cabling project for carrying electricity to the area had been initially approved, but when digging work commenced, it was soon halted following objections coming from the state Forest Department.
translation.sw: Kulingana na taarifa,  ni kwamba mpango wa kupitisha mkongo wa umeme aridhini ili uweze kufika eneo hilo ulishapitishwa lakini ulizuiwa hivi karibuni kutokana na mapingamizi kutoka kwa Idara ya Misitu ya Taifa

translation.en: Another source of frustration for the local population is the absence of proper roads.
translation.sw: Chanzo kingine cha mahangaiko ya wakazi wa hapa ni ukosefu wa barabara nzuri.

translation.en: One has to navigate a 2.8 km unpaved and broken road to reach the first household at Marlem from the main road.
translation.sw: Mtu anatakiwa kusafiri  kutoka barabara kuu umbali wa kilomita 2.8 katika barabara mbaya na ambayo haijasafishwa vizuri ili aweze kukuta nyumba ya kwanza katika kijiji cha Marlem.

translation.en: Finally, the supply of electricity and safe drinking water remain a challenge for the villagers.
translation.sw: Mwisho kabisa, usambazaji wa umeme na maji safi na salama kwa wanakijiji vimebaki kuwa changamoto kwa wanakijiji.

translation.en: Having publicly and repeatedly voiced their complaints, but failing to get any answers, the residents of Marlem, as well as residents from two other villages decided not to vote in the elections in order to draw the attention of the authorities towards their issues.
translation.sw: Pamoja na kuweka malalamiko yao hadharani mara kwa mara, lakini wameshindwa kupata majibu ya mahitaji yao, wakazi wa Marlem pamoja na wakazi kutoka katika vijiji vingine viwili waliamua kutokupiga kura ili kuvuta masikio ya mamlaka dhidi ya masuala yao wanayoyalalamikia.

translation.en: Polling officials came to talk to us, but our decision of not to vote, still stands, added Pandurang.
translation.sw: Wafanyakazi wa tume ya uchaguzi walikuja kuongea nasi kuhusu uamuzi wetu wa kutokupiga kura na msimamo wetu uko pale pale, aliongeza Pandurang.

translation.en: Isidore Fernandes, an opposition (Indian National Congress) member of the legislative assembly of Cancona, also met the locals.
translation.sw: Isidore Fernandes, kiongozi wa upinzani kutoka chama cha (Indian National Congress) ambaye ni mbunge katika bunge la Cancona, pia alikutana na wakazi wa eneo hilo.

translation.en: After hearing the grievances he assured his support in favour of their agitation.
translation.sw: Baada ya kusikiliza kero zao alieahakikishia kuwa atawasaidia kushughulikia jamjo hilo.

translation.en: It is important for any government to provide road, water, and electricity to people.
translation.sw: Ni muhimu kwa serikali yoyote kutengeneza barabara, kusambaza umeme na maji kwa ajili ya watu wao.

translation.en: Till now, all government officials have neglected these facilities in Marlem Village, stated Fernandes.
translation.sw: Mpaka sasa maafida wote wa serikali wamepuuza kutoa huduma hizi katika kijiji cha Marlem, alisema   Fernandes.

translation.en: Boycotting elections is now becoming a way of protest, although voting is not mandatory in India.
translation.sw: Kususia uchaguzi sasa imekuwa kama njia mojawapo ya mgomo, ingawa kupiga kura sio lazima katika nchi ya India.

translation.en: Apart from Goa, villages in the central state of Madhya Pradesh, the western state of  Maharashtra, and the eastern state of Odisha are employing this method in order to get pressing issues addressed by the authorities in charge.
translation.sw: Tofauti ya kijiji cha Goa, vijiji vilivyo katika jimbo la Kati Madhya Pradesh, Magharibi jimbo la Maharashtra, na Mashariki jimbo la Odisha wamekuwa wakitumia mbinu hii ili kuweza kufikisha mambo yao muhimu mbele ya viongozi wa mamlaka zinazohusika.

translation.en: So far, none of those boycotts seem to have translated into action on the side of government.
translation.sw: Hata hivyo, hakuna mgomo wowowte kati ya hii ambao umechukuliwa hatua na serikali.

translation.en: Ultimately, voters are adopting such tactics as a show of frustration towards officials and politicians who often reach out to neglected communities only before elections, in hope of securing their votes, but fail to deliver once the elections are over.
translation.sw: Wapiga kura wengi wameanza kuzoea kutumia mbinu hii kama ishara ya kuonesha hasira zao kwa wanasiasa na maofisa wa serikali ambao huzigeukia jamii walizozitelekeza katika kipindi cha uchaguzi wakiwa ma matumaini ya kupata kura zao, huku wakishindwa kutekeleza ahadi zao baada ya uchaguzi.

translation.en: In the end, if boycotting elections does not heed changes in society, what else can members of neglected communities do to get the attention of those supposed to hear them and take proper action?
translation.sw: Lakini mwishowe, kama Kugomea chaguzi haitaleta mabadiliko katika jamii, je ni kitu gani wanajamii wataamua kufanya ili kuvuta masikio ya wenye mamlaka ambao wanapaswa kusikia sauti zao na kuchukua hatua za utekelezaji?

translation.en: The journalist Amade Abubacar.
translation.sw: Mwandishi wa Habari  Amade Abubacar.

translation.en: Photo: Screengrab, caiccajuda/Youtube.
translation.sw: Picha na:  caiccajuda/Youtube.

translation.en: Journalists Amade Abubacar and Germano Adriano, who were detained earlier this year while covering the military conflict in northern Mozambique, were released pending trial on 23 April, 2019.
translation.sw: Waandishi wa Habari Amade Abubacar na  Germano Adriano, ambao waliokamatwa mapema mwaka huu wakati wakikusanya habari za mgogoro wa kijeshi  katika ukanda wa Kaskazini mwa Msumbiji, wameachiliwa huru bila kushtakiwa mnamo tarehe 23 April,  2019.

translation.en: Amade, who contributes to various local media outlets including Zitamar News and A Carta, was detained on 5 January while he interviewed internally displaced people in the Macomia district of Cabo Delgado, a northern province of the country.
translation.sw: Amade, ambaye amekuwa akichangia habari katika vyanzo mbali mbali vya habari vikiwamo Zitamar News na A Carta, aliwekwa kizuizini tarehe 5 Januari wakati akifanya mahojiano na wakimbizi wa ndani kutoka katika wilaya ya Macomia katika jimbo la Kaskazini mwa nchi, Cabo Delgado.

translation.en: Germano, a reporter for the local community radio Nacedje, disappeared on 6 February and was found to have been detained on 18 February.
translation.sw: Germano, ambaye ni mwandishi wa habari wa kituo cha redio ya jamii cha Nacedje, alipotea tangu Februari 6 na alipatikana akiwa kizuizini tarehe 18, Februari.

translation.en: According to the Media Institute of Southern Africa (MISA), Amade and Germano were charged with spreading defamatory messages against members of the Mozambican Armed Defence Forces via a Facebook account that announced attacks which occurred in villages in the district of Macomia.
translation.sw: Kulingana na taarifa kutoka kwa Shirikisho la Vyombo Vya Habari Kusini Mwa Afrika(MISA), Amade na Germano walishtakiwa kwa kueneza habari za kuwachafua baadhi ya viongozi wa Jeshi la Wananchi wa Msumbiji kupitia kurasa zao za Facebook ambapo walitangaza kuanza kwa mapigano yaliyotokea katika vijiji vya wilaya ya Macomia.

translation.en: The journalists were released from the provincial jail of Mieze in Pemba, Cabo Delgados capital, and will be on probation as they await trial before the provincial judicial court of Cabo Delgado.
translation.sw: Wanahabari hao waliachiliwa huru kutoka katika gereza la  Mieze huko Pemba, makao makuu ya Cabo Delgado na wapo katika kipindi cha uangalizi wakati wakisubiri kushtakiwa katika mahakama ya hakimu mkazi huko Cabo Delgado.

translation.en: Their first hearing is scheduled for 17 May.
translation.sw: Kesi imepangwa kusikilizwa kwa mara ya kwanza hapo Mei 17.

translation.en: Since 2017, groups armed with knives have carried out attacks on villages in Cabo Delgado, burning houses and decapitating residents.
translation.sw: Tangu mwaka 2017, makundi ya watu wenye silaha kama vile visu wamekuwa wakifanya mashambulizi katika vijiji vya Cabo Delgado, wakichoma nyumba  na kuwachinja wakazi.

translation.en: More than 90 people have died since the attacks began, according to the police.
translation.sw: Zaidi ya watu 90 wameshauwa tangu kuanza kwa mashambulio hayo kulingana na taarifa za polisi.

translation.en: To date, no group has publicly claimed responsibility for the attacks.
translation.sw: Mpaka leo hakuna kikundi ambacho kimejitokeza hadharani kukiri kuhusika na mashambulio hayo.

translation.en: In December 2018, the newspaper A Carta de Moçambique revealed the existence of a Facebook page, run under a name that appears to have been falsified, that praised the armed groups attacks in Cabo Delgado.
translation.sw: Hapo Disemba 2018 gazeti la  A Carta de Moçambique lilidhihirisha uwepo wa ukurasa wa Facebook, yenye jina ambalo inaonekana ni la kughushi ambapo ukurasa huo unasifu mashambulio ya vikundi vya watu wenye silaha huko Cabo Delgado

translation.en: It unknown whether or not the accusations against Amade and Germano are concerning this same page.
translation.sw: Haifahamiki kama mashtaka dhidi ya Amade na Germano yanahusishwa na ukurasa huo.

translation.en: The journalists defence team says there is no connection between them and any illegal activity via Facebook.
translation.sw: Timu ya utetezi wa wanahabari hao inasema kuwa hakuna uhusiano wowote baina yao na ukurasa huo au vitendo vingine vya uhalifu vinavyofanyika katika kurasa za Facebook.

translation.en: The proceedings against the journalists have been marked by irregularities.
translation.sw: Mashtaka dhidi ya wanahabari hawa yamegubikwa na sintofahamu nyingi.

translation.en: After detaining Amade, the police placed him in military custody.
translation.sw: Baada ya Amade kuwekwa kizuizini, polisi walimweka chini ya ulinzi wa Jeshi la Wananchi.

translation.en: He was put in a military prison, where he spent 12 days incommunicado before being transferred to a civilian prison.
translation.sw: Aliwekwa katika gereza la Kijeshi ambapo alikaa siku 12 bila kufanya mawasiliano yoyote na kisha kuhamishiwa katika gereza la kiraia.

translation.en: The journalists were only charged on 16 April, violating the deadline of 90 days set out in the Mozambican Law of Pre-trial Detention in the case of Abubacar.
translation.sw: Wanahabari hawa walishtakiwa tu ilipofika tarehe 16 Aprili, ikiwa ni ukiukwaji wa utaratibu wa mwisho wa siku 90, kinyume na sheria ya ukamataji na kuwekwa kizuizini ya Msumbiji, katika kesi ya Abubacar.

translation.en: In court proceedings during their pre-trial detention, both journalists were accused of crimes of violating state secrets through digital means and public incitement to a crime using digital means.
translation.sw: Katika muendelezo wa kesi katika kipindi chao cha kuwa kizuizini wandishi wote kwa pamoja walituhumiwa kwa makosa ya uhalifu wa kuvujisha siri za serikali kupitia mitandao ya kijamii na kuchochea jamii kwa kutumia njia za kidigitali.

translation.en: These accusations differ from the formal charges that have now been filed against them, which MISA described as spreading defamatory messages against members of the Mozambican Armed Defence Forces via a Facebook account that announced attacks which occurred in villages in the district of Macomia.
translation.sw: Mashtaka haya yanapishana na mashtaka ya awali yaliyotolewa dhidi yao, ambapo MISA waliyatafsiri kama  kueneza ujumbe wa kuchafua baadhi ya viongozi wa jeshi la wananchi wa Msumbiji kupitia ukurasa wa Facebook ambao ulingaza mashambulio ya watu katika vijiji vya wilaya ya Macomia.

translation.en: During the 106 days he spent in prison, Abubacar faced a lack of food and refusal of medical assistance, according to Amnesty International.
translation.sw: Katika kipindi cha siku 106 alizokaa gerezani, Abubacar alikumbana na ukosefu wa chakula na kunyimwa huduma za matibabu, kulingana na taarifa ya Shirika la Haki za Binadamu (Amnesty International).

translation.en: His family told the newspaper @Verdade that they were stopped from visiting him during the whole time that Abubacar was in custody.
translation.sw: Familia yake  waliliambia gazeti la @Verdade kwamba walizuiwa kumtembelea  Abubacar katika kipindi chote alichokuwa kizuizini.

translation.en: What has happened to these journalists may be part of a trend of intimidation against media workers in northern Mozambique.
translation.sw: Kilichotokea kwa waandishi hawa wa habari ni sehemu ya muendelezo  wa unyanyaswaji dhidi ya wafanyakazi wa vyombo vya habari Kaskazini mwa Msumbiji.

translation.en: Independent investigative journalist Estácio Valoi was detained in December 2018, also in Cabo Delgado on legally dubious terms.
translation.sw: Mwandishi wa Habari za Uchunguzi wa kujitegemea Estácio Valoi aliwekwa kizuizini  mwezi Disemba 2018,  pia huko Cabo Delgado kwa sababu za kisheria zisizoeleweka.

translation.en: He was later released, without any charge, but his work equipment remains in the armys custody.
translation.sw: Baadaye aliachiliwa huru bila mashtaka, lakini vifaa vyake vya kufanyia kazi vilibaki mikononi mwa jeshi.

translation.sw: Wito wa Haki

translation.en: Cídia Chissungo, an activist and organiser of the #FreeAmade campaign, celebrated the news:
translation.sw: Cídia Chissungo, ambaye ni mwanaharakati na mhamasishaji wa kampeni ya #AmedeAwekweHuru alisherehekea taarifa hizo kwa kusema:

translation.en: #AmadeAbubacar and #GeramanoAdriano are finally FREE after almost 4 months detained.
translation.sw: #AmadeAbubacar na #GeramanoAdriano hatimaye wako HURU baada ya kuwa kizuizini kwa miezi 4.

translation.en: Ofcourse we have to celebrate but we won't forget how everything started.
translation.sw: Kwa kweli tunasherehekea lakini hatutasahau jinsi kila kitu kilivyoanza.

translation.en: We said a long time ago:Journalism is not a crime
translation.sw: Tulishasema tangu kitambo kuwa: Uandishi wa Habari sio uhalifu.

translation.en: Thanks for your hands#FreeAmade #CaboDelgado #HandsForJustice pic.twitter.com/Lhb0b1ALCi
translation.sw: Asanteni kwa kutuunga mkono katika

translation.en: Angela Quintal, coordinator of the Africa Program for the Committee to Protect Journalists (CPJ), commented:
translation.sw: Angela Quintal, msimamizi wa  Mradi wa Kamati ya Kuwalinda Wanahabari (CPJ), ukanda wa Afrika alisema:

translation.en: Now to ensure charges are actually dropped and that #AmadeAbubacar can continue with his journalism without fear of reprisal.
translation.sw: Sasa ni kuhakikisha kuwa mashtaka yanatupiliwa mbali na #AmadeAbubacar anaweza kuendelea na kazi yake ya uandishi bila hofu ya kukamatwa.

translation.en: The fact that he had to endure detention without trial for 106 days before getting bail is unconscionable.
translation.sw: Ukweli ni kwamba amevumilia kuwa kizuizini bila kushtakiwa kwa siku 106 kabla ya dhamana,  sio uungwana aliotendewa.

translation.en: He should not be facing trial at all!
translation.sw: Hastahili kushtakiwa kabisa!

translation.en: Global Voices co-founder Ethan Zuckerman defines bridge figures as people who are passionate about explaining their home cultures to people from other societies.
translation.sw: Muanzishaji mwenza wa Global Voices  Ethan Zuckerman amewaelezea kuwa mfano wa daraja watu ambao wanapenda kuelezea utamaduni wa nyumbani kwao kwa watu wanaotoka katika jamii nyingine.

translation.en: The concept was developed through the deep roots it has in Global Voices, and defines much of the work and ethos of the community.
translation.sw: Wazo hiki lilitengenezwa kupitia mfumo ulioota mizizi ndani ya Global voices na unaelezea kazi kubwa na utamaduni wa jamii.

translation.en: Since our Iran coverage aims to bridge the divide that exists between external perspectives on Iran and the actual country itself, Global Voices Iran has started a series of interviews with various Iranian journalists and writers who practice this role.
translation.sw: Kwa kuwa kazi yetu imelenga kuunga utengano uliopo kati ya mitazamo ya nje juu ya Irani na ile halisi ndani ya nchi yenyewe,  Global Voices Iran imeanza mfululizo wa mahojiani na mwanadishi wa Kiirani na waandishi ambao watafanya hivyo.

translation.en: These interviews are done to understand how and why these figures, who make a career out of communicating the intricacies and complexities of a country riddled with contradictions, explain Iran to non-Iranians.
translation.sw: Mahojiano haya yatafanyika ili kuelewa kwa jinsi gani na kwa namna gani watu hawa waliofanya kazi zao kupitia kuielezea jamii iliyo nje ya Irani kuhusu Irani pamoja na ugumu na utata uliopo katika kuelezea.

translation.en: Golnaz Esfandiari: I think the use of social media in Iran and its significance is increasing
translation.sw: Golnaz Esfandiari: Nafikiri matumizi ya mitandao ya kijamii nchini Irani na manufaa yake yanaongezeka

translation.en: Golnaz Esfandiari is a senior correspondent at Radio Free Europe/Radio Liberty, and one of the few journalists based outside of Iran writing in English about the nuances and intricacies of Iranian society and politics.
translation.sw: Golnaz Esfandiari ni mtangazaji mwandamizi katika  Redio Free Europe/Radio Liberty, na mmoja wa waandishi wa habari wachache ambao wamejikita nje ya Irani wakiandika kwa lugha ya Kiingereza kuhusu usumbufu na changamoto za jamii na siasa za Wairani.

translation.en: Photo used with Golnaz Esfandiari's permission.
translation.sw: Picha imetumika kwa ruhusa ya Golnaz Esfandiari.

translation.en: Read more: Talking to Golnaz Esfandiari, English-Language Journalism's Bridge to Iran
translation.sw: Soma zaidi: Mazungumzo na Golnaz Esfandiari, Daraja la uhandishi wa habari kwa lugha ya Kiingerreza

translation.en: In an interview with Global Voices, she said:
translation.sw: Katika mahojiano na Global Voices, alisema:

translation.en: I think the use of social media in Iran and its significance is increasing.
translation.sw: Nafikiri matumizi ya mitandao ya kijamii nchini Irani yameongezeka na manufaa yake pia yameongezeka.

translation.en: Government officials admit that and I also see more people inside the country using social media sites and apps.
translation.sw: Maafisa wa serikali wanakiri hilo nami pia ninaona watu wengi ndani ya nchi wakitumia mitandao ya jamii.

translation.en: I actually think that since 2009, the use of social media has increased considerably.
translation.sw: Ninafikiri kuwa tangu mwaka 2009, matumizi ya mitandao ya kijamii imeongezeka kwa kiwango kikubwa.

translation.en: Some Iranians told me they joined Twitter after reading about the allegations about a Twitter Revolution in Iran.
translation.sw: Baadhi ya Wairani wameniambia kuwa wamejiunga na mtandao wa Twitter baada ya kusoma kuhusu yale madai ya Mapinduzi ya Twitter nchini Irani.

translation.en: Social networking sites have facilitated conversation and the sharing of content that is banned or considered sensitive, people can discuss taboo subjects relatively openly.
translation.sw: Mitandao ya kijamii inasaidia mazungumzo na kushirikishana maudhui ambayo yamekatazwa au yanayoonekana kama ya aibu na watu wanajadiliana kwa uwazi.

translation.en: They also challenge state policies and stances on social media quite regularly.
translation.sw: Pia mara nyingi watu wanakosoa sera na mitazamo ya serikali katika mitandao ya jamii.

translation.en: Kelly Golnoush Niknejad: You have to be a journalist, but a psychiatrist, professor, and mind reader as well
translation.sw: Kelly Golnoush Niknejad: Unapaswa kuwa mwandishi wa habari,  mwanasaikolojia, profesa na msoma mawazo ya watu kwa wakati mmoja

translation.en: Iranian media entrepreneur Kelly Golnoush Niknejad is the founder of Tehran Bureau, a news agency hosted by The Guardian that covers Iran and the Iranian diaspora.
translation.sw: Mwekezaji katika tasnia ya habari nchini Irani Kelly Golnoush Niknejad, ni mwanzilishi wa Taasisi ya Tehran chanzo cha habari kinachosaidizana na The Guardian ambapo huandika kuhusu Irani na Wairani walio ughaibuni.

translation.en: Her project is one of the leading sources of coverage that gives a dynamic view of the countrys culture, politics, and people.
translation.sw: Mradi wake ni mmoja kati ya chanzo kinachoongoza kinachotoa mtazamo tofauti kuhusu nchi hiyi katika masuala ya kisiasa, utamaduni na watu.

translation.en: Photo by Kelly Golnoush Niknejad and used with permission.
translation.sw: Picha na Kelly Golnoush Niknejad na imetumika kwa ruhusa.

translation.en: Read more: How Kelly Golnoush Niknejads Tehran Bureau Bridges Iran and the West
translation.sw: Soma zaidi: Jinsi  Taasisi ya Tehran  ya Kelly Golnoush Niknejad inavyounganisha Irani na ulimwengu wa Magharibi.

translation.en: On misconceptions that non-Iranians have about Iran, she explained:
translation.sw: Katika mtazamo mbaya walio nao watu wasio wa-Irani dhidi ya Irani, alifafanua:

translation.en: When it comes to Iran, I often find myself having to go all the way back to 1979, then explaining the transformations that took place decade-by-decade, just to make sense of the present.
translation.sw: Linapokuja suala la Irani, huwa ninajikuta mara zote nikirudi nyuma mpaka mwaka 1979 kisha naelezea mabadiliko yaliyofanyika muongo baada ya muongo ili kuleta maana ya wakati huu wa sasa.

translation.en: Its sometimes even hard for Iranians themselves to believe what goes on in Iran, let alone non-Iranians.
translation.sw: Mara nyingine inakuwa vigumu sana hata kwa wa-Irani wenyewe kuelewa kinachoendelea Irani kwa sasa sembuse wasio wa-Irani.

translation.en: This explains why its vital to cover Iran from the bottom up, chronicling the lives of ordinary people.
translation.sw: Hii inaonesha jinsi ilivyo muhimu kuifunika Irani gubigubi, tukiyaweka katika mtiririko maalum maisha ya watu wa kawaida.

translation.en: Covering a country by reporting on the pronouncements of the ruling elite is probably the least interesting or informative kind of journalism.
translation.sw: Tukiifikia nchini kwa kutoa taarifa za wasomi ma wenye mamlaka pekee hilo sio jambo la msingi au muhimu sana kwetu kama wanahabari.

translation.en: Thats why even very sophisticated people who follow the news on Iran have no idea what goes on there.
translation.sw: Ndio maana hata watu makini sana wanaofuatilia habari hawaelewi mambo ya msingi yanayotokea nchini Irani.

translation.en: Of course if they followed Tehran Bureau though, they would get a very dynamic view.
translation.sw: Ni kweli kama watafuatilia taarifa za kutoka Taasisi ya Tehran basi watapata mtazamo tofauti sana.

translation.en: Nina Ansary: I believe women will be at the forefront of any change in Iran
translation.sw: Nina Ansary: Ninaamini wanawake watakuwa mstari wa mbele katika mabadiliko yoyote nchini Irani

translation.en: Nina Ansary is the author of Jewels of Allah: The Untold Story of Women in Iran, the first book to cover the leading feminist political movements from the end of the 19th century to the present.
translation.sw: Nina Ansary ni mtunzi wa Johari za Mwenyenzi Mungu: Yasiyosimuliwa Kuhusu Wanawake Wa Irani, kitabu cha kwanza kabisa kuandika kuhusu mtazamo wa haki sawa kwa wanawake katika siasa kuanzia mwishoni mwa karne ya 19 mpaka sasa.

translation.en: Jewels of Allah cover
translation.sw: Jalada la kitabu cha Johari za Mwenyenzi Mungu

translation.en: The book explains how women have shaped Irans recent history, and continue to do so, while working to establish their rights and equality in a society that has traditionally marginalized them.
translation.sw: Kitabu kinafafanua jinsi wanawake wameweza kuijenga historia ya sasa ya Irani na wanavyoendelea kufanya hivyo, wakati wakiendelea kushughulika na kusimamisha misingi ya haki zao na usawa katika jamii ambazo zimekuwa zikiwakandamiza kwa asili.

translation.en: Read more: Talking to Iranian Feminist Author Nina Ansary on the Eve of Change in Iran
translation.sw: Soma zaidi: Mazungumzo na Mwandishi Mpigania Usawa wa wanawake wa Kiirani Nina Ansary katika Mkesha wa usiku wa mabadiliko nchini

translation.en: Ansary said she was cautiously optimistic about the future of Iran and the place of women in it:
translation.sw: Ansary alisema kuwa alikuwa na mtazamo chanya kuhusu kesho ya Irani na nafasi ya mwanamke ndani yake:

translation.en: only because I see their resilience.
translation.sw: na ni kwa sababu niliona urejesho wao.

translation.en: And this is because female activism has yielded partial results: women were not allowed to serve as judges, but can now serve as investigative judges.
translation.sw: Na hii ni kwa sababu wanaharakati wa kike hawakupata majibu ya uhakika: wanawake hawakuwa wakiruhusiwa kuwa majaji lakini sasa wanatumika kama majaji wapelelezi.

translation.en: Women werent allowed to enter certain fields of study, and over the years they have been able to penetrate into male dominated areas such as medicine and engineering.
translation.sw: Wanawake walikuwa hawaruhusiwi kusoma baadhi ya fani, lakini kwa miaka kadhaa wameweza kupenya hadi ndani ya fani ambazo zilitawaliwa na wanaume zaidi kama vile utabibu na uhandisi.

translation.en: I'm cautiously optimistic, but I believe women will be at the forefront of any change in Iran.
translation.sw: Kwa tahadhari kubwa ninatazamia yaliyo chanya, lakini ninaamini wanawake watakuwa mstari wa mbele katika mabadiliko yoyote nchini Irani.

translation.en: Saeed Kamali Dehghan: They see Iran as black and white, and Iran is not like that.
translation.sw: Saeed Kamali Dehghan: Wanaiona Irani kama picha ya rangi nyeusi na nyeupe lakini Irani haiko hivyo.

translation.en: Its a spectrum, its a rainbow.
translation.sw: Ipo kama Upinde wa Mvua uliosambaa.

translation.en: With over 800 Iran-related bylines to his name, Saeed Kamali Dehghan is the first staff journalist at The Guardian dedicated to covering Iran, and one of the few Iranian nationals employed by a major English-language media institution.
translation.sw: Akiwa na makala zaidi ya 800 zinazohusiana na Irani, Saeed Kamali Dehghan ndiye mwandishi mkuu wa kwanza kwanza wa The Guardian aliyejitolea kuandika kuhusu Irani na ni mmoja wa wa-Irani wachache walioajiriwa na kampuni kubwa ya habari za lugha ya Kiingereza.

translation.en: Photo used with Saeed Kamali Dehghan's permission.
translation.sw: Picha imetumika kwa ruhusa ya Saeed Kamali Dehghan.

translation.en: Much of his reporting relates to Irans human rights violations, but as he said in a phone interview, the common problem in many western media organisations is that they see Iran as black and white, and Iran is not like that.
translation.sw: Taarifa zake nyingi zinahusiana na uvunjaji wa haki za binadamu nchini Irani, lakini kama alivyosema katika mahojiano kwa njia ya simu, tatizo kubwa kwa vyombo vya habari vya Magharini ni kuwa wao huiona Irani kama picha ya rangi nyeusi na nyeupe lakini Irani haiko hivyo.

translation.en: Its a spectrum, its a rainbow.
translation.sw: Irani ni kama Upinde wa Mvua, imeenea rangi

translation.en: Read more: Saeed Kamali Dehghan on Covering Iran for The Guardian
translation.sw: Soma zaidi: Saeed Kamali Dehghan anayeiandikia Irani katika gazeti la The Guardian

translation.en: On the difficulties of covering a country he has an emotional attachment for, Saeed explains:
translation.sw: Katika magumu ya kuiandikia nchi ambayo anafungamana nayo kihisia, Saeed anafafanua kwamba:

translation.en: As an Iranian I have an emotional attachment to the country, but when Im writing news I step back and try to be impartial.
translation.sw: Kama mu-Irani nina hisia zangu juu ya nchi, lakini ninapoandika habari zake huwa ninajaribu kukaa pembeni kidogo ili kuondoa upendeleo.

translation.en: But Im allowed to express my opinion when I write op-eds, and Ive also done that sort of thing.
translation.sw: Lakini ninaruhusiwa kuelezea mawazo yangu wakati nikiandika habari za kinyume na nimekuwa nikifanya kitu kama hicho.

translation.en: I wrote about why Canada is getting it wrong on Iran, which led to the then Canadian foreign minister accusing me on Twitter of working for the Iranian authorities.
translation.sw: Niliandika kuhusu ni kwa nini Canada waliielewa Irani vibaya na hii ilipelekea waziri wa mambo ya nje wa wakati huo kunituhumu kupitia ukurasa wake wa Tweeter kuwa natumiwa na mamlaka za Irani.

translation.en: Ive been attacked by some people who accuse me of working for the Iranians and by others who accuse me of working for the Brits.
translation.sw: Nimekuwa nikishambuliwa na baadhi ya watu ambao wamekuwa wakinituhumu kuwa natumikishwa na wa-Irani na wengine wamekuwa wakinituhumu kuitumikia Uingereza.

translation.en: I hope thats a sign Im doing my job right!
translation.sw: Ninaamini hii ni ishara ya kuwa ninaifanya kazi yangu ipasavyo.

translation.en: Omid Memarian: To turn that explosive anger into something constructive, to put it into perspective and not take it personally, is an art.
translation.sw: Omid Memarian: Kuigeuza hasira yako kuwa kitu cha kujenga na kutokuyachukulia mambo kibinafsi ni sanaa

translation.en: Omid Memarian, an Iranian journalist living in New York.
translation.sw: Omid Memarian, mwanahabari wa ki-Irani anayeishi New York.

translation.en: Omid Memarian was formerly a widely read journalist inside Iran, and now works in the United States covering Iranian news for both English and Persian speaking audiences.
translation.sw: Omid Memarian ni mwandishi wa zamani aliyesomwa sana huko Irani na sasa anafanya kazi Marekani na amekuwa akiandika habari za Irani kwa watumiaji wa lugha zote za Kiingereza na Kiajemi.

translation.en: Our interview with him explores the nuances of covering Iran for different audiences, and his experiences as a journalist both inside Iran and out.
translation.sw: Mahojiano yetu yalitaka kufahamu utofauti katika kuandika habari kuhusu Irani kwa watumiaji wa lugha tofauti tofauti na uzoefu wake kama mwanahabari wa ndani na nje ya Irani.

translation.en: Read more: Iranian Journalist Omid Memarian
translation.sw: Soma zaidi: Mwanahabari wa ki-Irani Omid Memarian

translation.en: Memarian describes his experience writing and reporting on civil society as a journalist in Iran:
translation.sw: Memarian anaelezea uzoefu wake wa kuandika na kuripotia katika jumuiya ya kijamii nchini Irani kama ifuatavyo:

translation.en: There were, and still are, people in Iran who believe that by empowering civil society organizations, political parties and independent media, the Islamic Republic might change gradually from within.
translation.sw: Kulikuwapo na bado wapo watu ndani ya Irani ambao wanaamini kuziwezesha jumuiya za kijamii,vyama vya siasa na uhuru wa habari, serikali ya kiislamu inaweza kubadilika polepole kwa kuanzia ndani.

translation.en: On the other side, there are forces trying to prove them wrong, and one way to do so is by making the environment so threatening that no one dare stay active in the field.
translation.sw: Kwa upande mwingine kuna nguvu nyingine zinazopambana kuthibitisha kuwa hilo haliwezekani na njia mojawapo ni kuyafanya mazingira kuwa hatarishi kiasi kwamba hakuna mtu atadhubutu kubaki akifanya alichokuwa anakifanya.

translation.en: When I insisted on continuing to what I was doing, writing and promoting the things I believed in, I was arrested and thrown into jail.
translation.sw: Niliposisitiza kuendelea kufanya nilichokuwa nafanya, kuandika nankuhamasisha kuhusu vitu nilivyokuwa naamini nilikamatwa na kutupwa gerezani.

translation.en: Hooman Majd: Iran is not uniquely paradoxical: what's unique is that most people dont know about Iran.
translation.sw: Hooman Majd: Irani haina utofauti wa kipekee: upekee hapa ni kuwa watu wengi hawafahamu mengi kuhusu Irani.

translation.en: We are now at a turning point in US foreign policy.
translation.sw: Sasa tupo katika hatua za marejeo ya sera za nje za nchi ya Marekani.

translation.en: Weeks away from the end of the Obama presidency, there is a strong possibility that the US is moving away from the defining project of rapprochement with its long-time foe, the Islamic Republic of Iran.
translation.sw: Majuma kadhaa kuelekea ukingoni mwa utawala wa Obama, kuna uwezekano mkubwa Marekani ikaachana na mradi wake mkubwa wa muda mrefu wa maelewano na adui yake wa muda mrefu, jamuhuri ya Kiislamu ya Irani.

translation.en: At the dawn of the Donald Trump presidency, which is slated to be a peculiar shade of hardline and hawkish Republicanism, I thought it a timely moment to sit down with journalist and author Hooman Majd.
translation.sw: Katika mawio ya Uraisi wa Donald Trump yanayoonesha yatakuwa ya kipekee yenye uvuli wa magumu na jamuhuri ya kikatili, ninafikiri ni wakati wa kukaa chini na wanahabari na mtunzi Hooman Majd.

translation.en: His books, articles and commentary explaining the paradoxes of Iran became widely featured in the American mainstream media during the Bush era, when hawkish rhetoric against the Iranian government became a hallmark of the early 2000s foreign policy and media depictions of Iran.
translation.sw: Vitabu vyake, makala na machapisho yake yanafafanua kitendawili cha Irani ambayo kwa upana yameonekana katika vyombo vikubwa vya habari vya Marekani katika kipindi cha Bush, wakati wa ukatili dhidi ya serikali ya Irani ilipogeuka kuwa alama kuu mwanzoni mwa miaka ya 2000 katika sera za nje na mtazamo wa vyombo vya habari dhidi ya Irani.

translation.en: Hooman Majd has been known to be the voice of Iran to the western world.
translation.sw: Hooman Majd amekuwa akijulikana kama sauti ya Irani kwa nchi za Magharibi.

translation.en: Portrait of Majd by Ken Browar, used with permission.
translation.sw: Picha ya Majd ilipigwa na Ken Browar, imetumika kwa ruhusa.

translation.en: Read more: Talking to Hooman Majd, a Bridge Between Iran and the US Mainstream
translation.sw: Soma zaidi: Mazungumzo na Hooman Majd, daraja baina ya vyombo vya habari vya Irani na Marekani.

translation.en: On whether misconceptions on Iran have lessoned since his 2008 book that aimed to dispel misconceptions about Iranian society to American audiences:
translation.sw: Kama mtazamo mbaya dhidi ya Irani umeleta somo tangu kutoka kwa kitabu chake mwaka 2008 kilicholenga kupinga mitazamo mibaya kuhusu jamii ya wa-Irani kwa wasomaji wa Marekani:

translation.en: Ahmadinejad was the first to make himself available to the media, which is the source of a lot of the negativity.
translation.sw: Ahmadinejad ndiye alikuwa wa kwanza kuwa wazi kwa vyombo vya habari, ambavyo ndio chanzo cha kwanza kabisa cha habari hasi.

translation.en: But Iranian-Americans and Iranian-Europeans have written a lot about the culture in the recent years, and there's a lot more travel between Iran and the US, among both Iranian-Americans and Iranians themselves.
translation.sw: Lakini wa-Irani wenye asili ya Marekani na wa-Irani wenye asili ya Ulaya wameandika sana kuhusu utamaduni wao katika siku za hivi karibuni, na pia kuna safari nyingi sana kati ya Irani na Marekani baina na wa-Irani wenye asili ya Marekani na wa-Irani asilia.

translation.en: They are understanding it a little bit better and there have been a number of books.
translation.sw: Kwa sasa wanauelewa mzuri kidogo na kuna vitabu vingi kidogo.

translation.en: Iran is not uniquely paradoxical: what's unique is that most people dont know about Iran.
translation.sw: Irani sio kitendawili cha kipekee: lakini kilicho cha pekee ni kuwa watu wengi hawafahamu mengi kuhusu Irani.

translation.en: Protesters in Rio de Janeiro: Our weapon is education | Image: Marianna Cartaxo / Mídia NINJA/Used with permission
translation.sw: Waandamanaji mjini Rio de Janeiro: Elimu ndio silaha yetu.| Picha na: Marianna Cartaxo / Mídia NINJA/Imetumiwa kwa ruhusa

translation.en: On May 15, thousands of Brazilians took to the streets in all 26 states and the Federal District against the Bolsonaro government's slashing of federal funds to education that will affect dozens of universities and schools.
translation.sw: Hapo Mei 15, maelfu ya Wabrazili waliingia mitaani katika majimbo yote 26 wakiandamana kuipinga serikali ya Bolsonaro kukata fedha za elimu ambapo itaathiri mamia ya shule na vyuo.

translation.en: At the end of April, Brazil's government announced cuts of 30 percent on a so-called discretionary budget, which goes towards expenses such as electricity, water, general maintenance, and research.
translation.sw: Mwishoni mwa mwezi Aprili, serikali ya Brazili ilitangaza kukata kiasi cha asilimia 30 ya kile kinachosemekana ni bajeti ambayo ilikuwa kwa ajili ya gharama za maji, umeme, uendeshaji wa jumla pamoja na tafiti.

translation.en: When considering the total federal budget for higher education, the cuts would amount to around 3,5 percent.
translation.sw: Wakati ukifiria kuwa jumla ya bajeti kuu ya serikali kwa ajili ya elimu ya juu, makato hayo yanaweza kufikia mpaka asilimia tatu au 5.

translation.en: Besides, the government has suspended funds for 3,500 publicly-funded postgraduate scholarships.
translation.sw: Hata hivyo, serikali imefuta udhamini kwa wanafunzi wa elimu za juu wapatao 3,500 waliokuwa wakidhaminiwa na serikali..

translation.en: From Paulista Avenue in São Paulo, a traditional gathering spot for protests, to far away indigenous lands in Alto Rio Negro, near the border with Colombia, people went out to defend their public education.
translation.sw: Kuanzia mtaa wa Paulista huko São Paulo, kituo cha makutano ya maandamano cha kimila mpaka kwenye mashamba ya asili huko Alto Rio Negro, karibu ma mpaka wa Colombia, watu walitoka kwenda kutetea elimu ya umma.

translation.en: In Viçosa, Minas Gerais, a crowd of around 5,000 people marched with umbrellas under heavy rain.
translation.sw: Huko Viçosa, Minas Gerais, kundi la watu wapatao 5,000 waliandamana wakiwa na miamvuli huku mvua kubwa ikinywesha.

translation.en: Drone footage of the huge crowd of protestors gathered on on Av Paulista in São Paulo to protest the education & science funding cuts.#15M #TodosPelaEducação #TsunamidaEducação #NaRuaPelaEducação #MarchaPelaCiência pic.twitter.com/BmHEYBuF9F
translation.sw: Picha ya anga ikionesha kundi kubwa la waandamanaji huko mtaa wa Paulista huko São Paulo wakipinga makato ya fedha za elimu na tafiti za kisayansi.#15M #TodosPelaEducação #TsunamidaEducação #NaRuaPelaEducação #MarchaPelaCiência pic.twitter.com/BmHEYBuF9F

translation.en: https://globalvoices.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/WhatsApp-Video-2019-05-15-at-21.00.30.mp4
translation.sw: https://globalvoices.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/WhatsApp-Video-2019-05-15-at-21.00.30.mp4

translation.en: Brazil has 69 federal universities and a large number of state universities, all offering undergraduate and postgraduate education completely free of tuition, and several community-oriented services such as extension courses, legal assistance offices, and hospitals.
translation.sw: Brazili inayo vyuo vya umma 69 na idadi kubwa ya vyuo vikuu vya serikali na vyote vinatoa shahada ya kwanza na shahada ya uzamili bure kabisa bila kulipia ada na baadhi ya huduma za kijamii kama vile ofisi za ushauri wa kisheria na hospitali.

translation.en: Initially, the cuts would apply to only three federal universities, but they were later extended to the entire federal network.
translation.sw: Awali, makato hayo yalikuwa yafanyike katika vyuo vitatu lakini baadayr yaliendelezwa kwa vyuo vingine vyote.

translation.en: Bolsonaro's Education Minister Abraham Weintraub says that they're not cuts but a contingency of expenses.
translation.sw: Waziri wa elimu wa Bolsonaro, Abraham Weintraub alisema kuwa hayo sio makato bali ni kubana matumizi.

translation.en: Weintraub has justified the cuts because public universities are places of mayhem.
translation.sw: Weintraub alieleza kuwa kuna makato kwa sababu vyuo vya umma ni kama sehemu ya uharibifu.

translation.en: When asked by reporters to name examples of such mayhem, he mentioned the presence of social movements in campuses, and parties with naked people.
translation.sw: Alipoulizwa na wanahabari aleleze mifano ya huo uharibifuWhen alitaja uwepo wa mikusanyiko mikubwa ya kijamii vyuoni na pia uwepo wa sherehe za watu walio uchi.

translation.en: Weintraub was appointed as minister in early April after his short-lived predecessor's administration became involved in a series of controversies.
translation.sw: Weintraub aliteuliwa kuwa waziri mapema mwezi Aprili baada ya aliyemtangulia kukaa kwa muda kidogo kuondolewa kwa sababu ya kuhusishwa na baadhi ya migogoro.

translation.en: The new minister often voices rightwing conspiracy theories, such as that crack cocaine was introduced in Brazil as part of a communist plot, and that he wants to erase cultural Marxism from universities.
translation.sw: Waziri huyu mpya mara zote amekuwa akitoa maoni yanayowiana na sera za mrengo wa kulia kama vile madawa ya kulevya yalitambulishwa Brazili kama mkakati wa wakomunisti, na anataka kufuta utamaduni wa U-Marx vyuoni..

translation.en: Some university deans have said that the cuts might impede them from opening their doors as early as the second semester of 2019.
translation.sw: Baadhi ya wakuu wa vyuouni wamesema kuwa makato hayo yanaweza kuwazuia milango yao kufunguka mapema mwanzoni wa muhula wa pili wa 2019.

translation.en: The Federal Prosecutor's Office has sent a report to the attorney general claiming the cuts violate Brazil's Constitution.
translation.sw: Ofisi ya mwendesha mashataka wa serikali imetuma taarifa kwa mwanasheria mkuu akilalamikia makato ya kuwa ni ukiukwaji wa katiba ya Brazili.

translation.en: Rio de Janeiro you look BEAUTIFUL!
translation.sw: Rio de Janeiro unaonekana MZURI!

translation.en: Hundreds of thousands are occupying Avenida Presidente Vargas as night falls to protest the budget cuts to science and education.#15M #TodosPelaEducação #TsunamidaEducação #NaRuaPelaEducação pic.twitter.com/8MIn91crKX
translation.sw: Mamia na maelfu yanaushikilia Avenida Presidente Vargas usiku.unapoingia wakipinga makato ya bajeti ya elimu na sayansi .#15M #TodosPelaEducação #TsunamidaEducação #NaRuaPelaEducação pic.twitter.com/8MIn91crKX

translation.en: Researchers at the Federal University of Minas Gerais (UFMG) who study WhatsApp groups in Brazil have detected conversations around universities on that messaging app in the days following the budget cut's announcement.
translation.sw: Watafiti kutoka chuo kikuu cha Minas Gerais (UFMG) ambao wanatafiti makundi ya WhatsApp huko Brazili wamegundua kuna mazungumzo mengi kupitia app hiyo hasa baada ya kutangazwa kukatwa kwa bajeti.

translation.en: The study has developed a tool that monitors WhatsApp groups and is widely used by fact-checking agencies in Brazil.
translation.sw: Utafiti umetengeneza kitumizi ambacho kitafuatilia kwa upana makundi ya WhatsApp na kitatumiwa kwa upana na shirika linalojihusisha na kuuchimbua ukweli nchini Brazili.

translation.en: Lead researcher Fabrício Benevuto said on a Facebook post on May 8:
translation.sw: Mtafiti kiongozi Fabrício Benevuto hapo Mei 8 ukurasa wake wa Facebook alisema :

translation.en: [The images include] monographies/dissertation/events mocked by their titles and topics.
translation.sw: [Picha ni pamoja] picha zisizo na rangi/machapisho/matukio yaliyobezwa kwa sababu ya vichwa vya habari na mada zake.

translation.en: There are images of naked people in parties (that aren't even in universities) and protests and memes that say university students take 12 years to graduate because they're on drugs all the time.
translation.sw: Kuna picha za watu wakiwa uchi katika sherehe(ambao hawapo hata.vyuoni) na mizaha kadhaa ya waandamanaji inayosema kuwa inawachukua wanafunzi miaka 12 kuhitimu kwa sababu wanabwia dawa za kulevya muda wote.

translation.en: It's clearly an orchestrated effort.A professional's job.
translation.sw: Hili iko wazi kuwa ni kusudi lililopangwa.

translation.en: It's the same style of the electoral campaign.
translation.sw: Kwa mtindo ule ule wa kampeni za uchaguzi.

translation.en: Who finances this factory of disinformation?
translation.sw: Nani anakidhamini kiwanda hiki cheye kutoa habari za uongo?

translation.en: An article by website Ciência na Rua (science in the streets in Portuguese) claims that public universities produce 95 percent of scientific research in Brazil.
translation.sw: Makala katika wavuti ya Ciência na Rua (sayansi mitaani kwa Kireno) inadai kuwa vyuo vya umma vinazalisha asilimia 95 ya tafiti za kisayansi nchini Brazili.

translation.en: A study by the United States consultancy Clarivate Analytics in 2018 points out that on the top 20 universities with the most prominent research production, 15 are part of the federal network.
translation.sw: Utafiti uliofanywa na kamapuni toka Marekani ya Clarivate Analytics mwaka 2018 inaonesha kuwa kati ya vyuo 20 wazalishaji wa tafiti bora, 15 ni sehemu ya mtandao wa serikali.

translation.en: On the day of the protests, Minister Weintraub was summoned to testify about the budget cuts in the lower house of Congress.
translation.sw: Katika siku ya maandamano, waziri Weintraub aliitwa kwenda kutoa maelezo kuhusu kukatwa kwa bajeti katika bunge la nyumba ya chini ya Kongresi.

translation.en: Bolsonaro is the enemy of Education
translation.sw: Bolsonaro ni adui wa elimu

translation.en: Education is an act of Love and Courage#TsunamiDaEducacao pic.twitter.com/sEEOb5wDxz
translation.sw: Elimu ni kitendo cha Upendo na Ushujaa#TsunamiDaEducacao pic.twitter.com/sEEOb5wDxz

translation.en: Meanwhile, Bolsonaro was in Texas, in the United States, where he met former US president George W. Bush.
translation.sw: Baadaye Bolsonaro alikuwa jimbo la Texas nchini Marekani ambapo alikutana na Rais wa zamani wa Marekani George W. Bush.

translation.en: When asked about the protests, the president said:
translation.sw: Alipoulizwa kuhusu maandamano hayo Rais alisema:

translation.en: Its natural [that protests happen], now, the majority of people there are militants with nothing inside their heads.
translation.sw: Ni kawaida [kwamba maandamani yametokea], sasa, wengi wa watu pale ni mgambo wasio na kitu kichwani.

translation.en: If you ask the result of 7 times 8, they wont know.
translation.sw: Kama utawauliza jawabu la 7 mara 8, hawajui.

translation.en: If you ask about the composition of water, they wont know, they know nothing.
translation.sw: Kama unaju waulize kuhusu muundo wa maji hawatajuwa, hawajui kitu.

translation.en: They are useful idiots, imbeciles, and are being manipulated by a canny minority that commands many federal universities in Brazil.
translation.sw: Ni wajinga na wapumbavu wenye faida na wamekuwa wakitumiwa na watu wachache wenye hila wanaoongoza vyuo kadhaa vya umma nchini Brazili.

translation.en: Ugandan journalist Gertrude Uwitware Tumusiime has experienced the double burden of working as a woman journalist in Uganda.
translation.sw: Mwandishi wa habari wa Uganda Gertrude Uwitware Tumusiime ameonja matukio ya mzigo maradufu wakati akifanya kazi kama mwandishi wa habari mwanamke nchini Uganda.

translation.en: Screenshot from The Other Side: Gertrude Uwitware Tumusiime on YouTube.
translation.sw: Picha ya Skrini kutoka The Other Side: Gertrude Uwitware Tumusiime kwenye YouTube.

translation.en: In Uganda, female journalists who embrace digital tools to report, share views and access information face attacks and harassment for investigating and publishing sensitive political content.
translation.sw: Nchini Uganda, waandishi wa habari wanawake wanaotumia vifaa vya kidijitali kuripoti, kutoa maoni na kupata habari hukabiliwa na mashambulizi na udhalilishwaji kwa sababu wanachunguza na kuchapisha maudhui nyeti ya kisiasa.

translation.en: Online harassment has become a new form of censorship.
translation.sw: Dhuluma za mtandaoni zimekuwa mbinu mpya ya udhibiti.

translation.en: Women journalists carry the double burden of gender-based abuse online in addition to potential threats related to political reporting.
translation.sw: Waandishi wa habari wanawake wanaubeba mzigo maradufu wa dhuluma inayotokana na jinsia mtandaoni ikiwa ni pamoja na vitisho vinavyohusiana na kuandika habari za kisiasa.

translation.en: These ongoing threats have led women journos to withdraw from public discourse  leaving the journalism profession dominated by men.
translation.sw: Vitisho hivi vinavyoendelea vimesababisha waandishi wa habari wanawake kujiondoa kwenye  mijadala ya masuala ya umma  na kuacha taaluma ya uandishi wa habari kutawaliwa zaidi na wanaume

translation.en: Read more: Taxing dissent: Ugandas social media dilemma
translation.sw: Soma Zaidi: Gharama ya kuwa mwenye maoni tofauti: Kitendawili cha mitandao ya kijamii nchini Uganda

translation.en: Joy Doreen Biira, journalist.
translation.sw: Joy Doreen Biira, mwandishi wa habari.

translation.en: Photo by Wazabanga via Wikimedia Commons CC BY 3.0.
translation.sw: Picha na Wazabanga kupitia Wikimedia Commons CC BY 3.0.

translation.en: In November 2016, Ugandan journalist Joy Doreen Biira, who was working at the privately-owned Kenya Television Network (KTN) in Kenya, returned home to Uganda for a traditional ceremony.
translation.sw: Mnamo Novemba 2016, mwandishi wa habari wa Uganda, Joy Doreen Biira, aliyekuwa akifanya kazi katika televisheni binafsi ya Kenya Television Network (KTN) nchini Kenya, alirejea nyumbani Uganda kwa ajili ya sherehe ya kitamaduni.

translation.en: While Biira was home, Ugandan security forces clashed with members of the traditional Rwenzururu kingdom in the Rwenzori region of western Uganda, and their palace was burned to the ground.
translation.sw: Wakati Biira akiwa kwao, vikosi vya usalama vya Uganda vilipambana na walinzi wa ufalme wa Rwenzururu katika mkoa wa Rwenzori magharibi mwa Uganda, na ikulu yao ikateketezwa kwa moto.

translation.en: The gunbattle resulted in 62 deaths, including 16 policemen.
translation.sw: Mapambano hayo ya kufyatuliana risasi yalisababisha vifo vya watu 62, wakiwemo polisi 16.

translation.en: Biira reacted to the military raid by posting her thoughts on Facebook on November 27:
translation.sw: Biira aliandika hisia zake kuhusiana na tukio hilo la shambulizi la kijeshi kwa kuchapisha maoni yake kwenye Facebook mnamo Novemba 27:

translation.en: Its so sad what Ive witnessed today with my own eyes  part of the palace of the kingdom Im from, the Rwenzururu Kingdom, burning down.
translation.sw: Inasikitisha sana kile nilichokishuhudia leo kwa macho yangu mwenyewe  sehemu ya jumba la ufalme huko nitokako, Ufalme wa Rwenzururu, likiteketea kwa moto.

translation.en: It felt like watching your heritage deplete before my eyes.
translation.sw: Nilijihisi kana kwamba nilikuwa nikitizama urithi ukiangamizwa mbele ya macho yangu.

translation.en: That same day, Biira was arrested and accused of circulating graphic photos of the aftermath of a deadly battle between security forces and the regional kings royal guard of the Rwenzururu kingdom  to a widely subscribed WhatsApp group, according to the Committee to Protect Journalists (CPJ).
translation.sw: Siku hiyo hiyo, Biira alikamatwa na kutuhumiwa kusambaza picha tata za matukio hayo ya kutisha ya mapigano kati ya vikosi vya usalama na walinzi wa mfalme wa Rwenzururu  kwa kundi la WhatsApp lenye wanachama wengi, kwa mujibu wa Committee to Protect Journalists (CPIJ).

translation.en: She also posted an Instagram video of the king's palace burning and wrote about it on Facebook, CPJ reported.
translation.sw: Alichapisha pia video ya Instagram ya jumba la mfalme likiwaka moto na kuandika habari zake kwenye Facebook, taarifa za CPJ zilisema.

translation.en: Uganda security officers allegedly forced Biira to delete social media posts and her digital tools were also confiscated,  according to a 2018 Freedom House report.
translation.sw: Maafisa wa usalama nchini Uganda walidaiwa kumlazimisha Biira kufuta machapisho kwenye mitandao ya kijamii na vifaa vyake vya kidijitali vikatwaliwa, kwa mujibu wa ripoti ya Freedom House ya 2018.

translation.en: Biira was charged with abetting terrorism for illegal filming of a military raid on a regional kings palace  an act punishable by death under the Anti-Terrorism Act if convicted.
translation.sw: Biira alishtakiwa kwa kosa la kuunga mkono ugaidi kwa kuchukua video za shambulio la kijeshi kwenye ikulu ya mfalme  kosa ambalo adhabu yake ni kifo chini ya sheria ya kupambana na ugaidi kama mtu akipatikana na hatia.

translation.en: However, a day later, she was released on bail.
translation.sw: Hata hivyo, siku moja baadaye, aliwachiliwa kwa dhamana.

translation.en: Biiras ordeal sparked condemnation on social media through hashtags such as #FreeJoyDoreen and #JournalismIsNotaCrime.
translation.sw: Kisa hicho cha Biira kilizua shutuma kali kwenye mitandao ya kijamii kupitia kauli mbiu kamaa vile #FreeJoyDoreen na #JournalismIsNotaCrime.

translation.en: This netizen criticized Ugandan President Yoweri Musevenis tendency to silence journalists:
translation.sw: Mwanamtandao huyu alimshutumu Rais wa Uganda Yoweri Museveni kwa tabia yake ya kuwanyamazisha waandishi wa habari:

translation.en: #FreeJoyDoreen President @KagutaMuseveni should stop silencing journalists.
translation.sw: #FreeJoyDoreen Rais @KagutaMuseveni hana budi kuacha tabia ya kuwanyamazisha waandishi.

translation.en: That is total impunity in our continent pic.twitter.com/SGUX985cM0
translation.sw: Kitendo hicho ni ukiukwaji mkubwa wa haki za binadamu katika bara letu.

translation.en: Biiras lawyer, Nicholas Opiyo, posted a tweet of Biiras official charges:
translation.sw: Wakili wa Biira, Nicholas Opiyo, alichapisha twiti iliyoonyesha mashtaka rasmi aliyokabiliwa nayo Biira:

translation.en: Copy of Joy's police bond  charged with abetting terrorism (ridiculous!)
translation.sw: Nakala ya dhamana ya Joyanayeshtakiwa na kosa la kusaidia ugaidi (kichekesho!)

translation.en: #journalism is not terrorism @KTNKenya @KTNKenya #FreeJoyDoreen pic.twitter.com/g5v7cgGryn
translation.sw: #journalism (uandishi wa habari) si uhalifu @KTNKenya @KTNKenya  #FreeJoyDoreen

translation.en: Opiyo told Global Voices that Biiras case was dropped and closed in March 2017 after authorities investigated it and found no evidence to charge her in a court of law.
translation.sw: Opiyo aliiambia Global Voices kuwa kesi ya Biira ilitupiliwa mbali na kufutwa mnamo Machi 2017 baada ya utawala kufanya uchunguzi na kukosa ushahidi wa kumfungulia mashtaka mahakamani.

translation.en: Like many such cases, one is reviewed to be free but left with a sense of unfairness, injustice, and pain, said Opiyo, who is also the executive director of Chapter Four Uganda, a human rights organization.
translation.sw: Sawa na kesi nyinginezo kama hizi, mtu hutua mzigo kwenye nafsi lakini hubaki na hisia ya uonevu, ukosefu wa haki, na maumivu, alisema Opiyo, ambaye pia ni mkurugenzi mtendaji wa Chapter Four Uganda, ambalo ni shirika la haki za binadamu.

translation.en: Opiyo added that spending a few days in jail and enduring the pain of being locked up never leaves you.
translation.sw: Opiyo aliongeza kwamba kukaa jela siku kadhaa na kustahimili maumivu ya kutiwa nguvuni ni hisia ambazo kamwe hazimtoki mtu.

translation.en: Targeted online attacks
translation.sw: Mashambulizi ya kulenga mtandaoni

translation.en: Women journalists who experience abuse online rarely see justice and often struggle to have their complaints taken seriously and properly investigated.
translation.sw: Ni nadra sana kwa waandishi wa habari wanawake wanaokumbwa na dhuluma mtandaoni kupata haki, na mara nyingi huwa na wakati mgumu kuhakikisha kwamba malalamiko yao yanachukuliwa kwa uzito na kuchunguzwa ipasavyo.

translation.en: In April 2017, Gertrude Tumusiime Uwitware, a news anchor at NTV Uganda, defended Stella Nyanzi, an outspoken professor who criticized the Museveni administration for failing to fulfill a campaign promise to distribute sanitary pads to poor girls.
translation.sw: Mnamo Aprili 2017,  Gertrude Tumusiime Uwitware, mtangazaji wa runinga ya NTV Uganda, alimtetea Stella Nyanzi, mwanaharakati msomi aliyeukosoa utawala wa Museveni kwa kutotimiza ahadi za kampeni za kuwasambazia taulo za sodo wasichana masikini.

translation.en: Authorities forced Uwitware to delete her Twitter and Facebook posts with comments in support of Nyanzi.
translation.sw: Watawala walimlazimisha Uwitware kufuta machapisho yake ya Twitter na Facebook yenye maoni ya kumuunga mkono Nyanzi.

translation.en: She received threats on Facebook and was then abducted by unknown assailants for at least eight hours, according to a 2017 Uganda human rights report.
translation.sw: Alipokea vitisho kwenye Facebook na kisha kutekwa nyara na watu wasiojulikana kwa takribani saa nane, kulingana na ripoti ya haki za binadamu ya Uganda ya 2017.

translation.en: Her kidnappers allegedly interrogated her about her connection with Nyanzi, badly bit her and cut her hair.
translation.sw: Watekaji nyara wake walidaiwa kumhoji kuhusu uhusiano wake na Nyanzi, wakampiga vibaya na hata kuzikata nywele zake.

translation.en: Read more: Is vagina a dirty word?
translation.sw: Soma zaidi:  Je, Uchi wa mwanamke ni neno chafu?

translation.en: Ugandan feminist Stella Nyanzi's court battle continues
translation.sw: mwanaharakati wa masuala ya wanawake Stella Nyanzi aendelea na mapambano mahakamani

translation.en: Uwitware was later found at a police station in Kampala.
translation.sw: Uwitware baadaye alipatikana katika kituo cha polisi jijini Kampala.

translation.en: However, authorities have not released any updates on the investigation into her kidnapping.
translation.sw: Hata hivyo, utawala haujatoa taarifa zozote hadi leo kuhusu uchunguzi wa kutekwa kwake.

translation.en: Political journalists  especially those who cover opposition politics  often experience threats more than any other kind of journalism.
translation.sw: Waandishi wa habari za kisiasa  hasa wale wanaoangazia siasa za vyama vya upinzani  mara kwa mara wanashuhudia vitisho zaidi ikilinganishwa na wale wanaoangazia masuala mengine.

translation.en: But women journalists have it worse because the government believes they are weaker and easily intimidated, according to Mukose Arnold Anthony, Secretary for Media Safety and Human Rights of the Uganda Journalists Association (UJA), who spoke to Global Voices via WhatsApp on April 3.
translation.sw: Lakini waandishi wa habari wanawake wana hali iliyo mbaya zaidi kwa sababu serikali inaamini wao ni dhaifu na wanatishwa kwa urahisi zaidi, kwa mujibu wa Mukose Arnold Anthony, Katibu wa Usalama wa Vyombo vya Habari na Haki za Binadamu katika Chama cha Waandishi wa Habari wa Uganda (UJA), ambaye alizungumza na Global Voices kupitia WhatsApp mnamo Aprili 3.

translation.en: When it comes to sexual harassment online, female journalists fear to open upalthough a few  disclose  the majority end up dying silently, Anthony said.
translation.sw: Linapokuja suala la unyanyasaji wa kingono mtandaoni, waandishi wa habari wanawake wanaogopa kujiweka wazijapo wachachewanaeleza bayanawengi wao huishia kuumia nalo kimoyomoyo, Anthony alisema.

translation.en: Women journalists may face extra psychological harm, breach of privacy, loss of identity, limitation of mobility, censorship, and loss of property as a result of their work, according to a UNESCO study on freedom of expression in Africa published in 2018.
translation.sw: Hutokea kwa waandishi wa habari wanawake kukumbana na madhara zaidi ya kisaikolojia, ukiukwaji wa faragha yao, kuharibiwa utambulisho, upunguzaji fursa zao za kwenda huku na kule, udhibiti, na upotezaji wa mali kwa sababu ya kazi zao, kwa mujibu wa utafiti wa UNESCO kuhusu uhuru wa kujieleza barani Afrika uliochapishwa mnamo 2018.

translation.en: And, according to a Human Rights Network for Journalists-Uganda 2018 study, 12 percent of women journalists have suffered abuses and violations, including death threats and arrests.
translation.sw: Na, kwa mujibu wa utafiti wa Mtandao wa Haki za Binadamu kwa Wanahabari-Uganda wa 2018, asilimia 12 ya wanahabari wanawake wamekumbana na dhuluma na ukiukwaji, vikiwemo vitisho vya vifo na kukamatwa.

translation.en: Three-quarters of women journalists suffered violations at the hands of state agents such as the police, resident district commissioners and other security operatives.
translation.sw: Robo tatu ya waandishi wa habari wanawake wamekumbana na ukiukwaji haki katika mikono ya maofisa wa serikali kama vile polisi, wakuu wa wilaya na maofisa wengine wa usalama.

translation.en: Attacks and harassment
translation.sw: Mashambulio na unyanyaswaji

translation.en: Ugandan journalist Bahati Remmy has faced attacks and harassment on the job as a female reporter.
translation.sw: Mwanahabari wa Uganda Bahati Remmy amekumbana na mashambulio na unyanyaswaji akiwa katika shughuli za kazi kama ripota mwanamke.

translation.en: Photo via Bahati Remmy Paydesk public account, used with permission.
translation.sw: Picha kupitia akaunti ya Paydesk ya Bahati Remmy, imetumika kwa ruhusa.

translation.en: Bahati Remmy, a Ugandan female journalist who now works in the United States, told Global Voices that she quit reporting news in Uganda because she felt jaded after her horrific ordeal while covering the elections in Uganda in 2016.
translation.sw: Bahati Remmy, mwanahabari mwanamke wa Uganda ambaye kwa sasa anafanya kazi Marekani, aliiambia Global Voices kuwa aliacha kufanya kazi ya uandishi nchini Uganda kwa sababu alihisi kupoteza shauku baada ya tukio la kutisha alipokuwa anaangazia taarifa za uchaguzi nchini Uganda mnamo 2016.

translation.en: Ugandan police arrested Remmy while doing a live broadcast for the privately-owned NBS TV to cover the house arrest of opposition politician Dr. Kizza Besigye in the town of Kasangati.
translation.sw: Polisi wa Uganda walimkamata Remmy wakati akifanya matangazo ya moja kwa moja kupitia runinga ya NBS inayomilikiwa na mtu binafsi ili kuangazia kuzuiliwa nyumbani kwa kiongozi mkuu wa upinzani Dk.Kizza Besigye katika mji wa Kasangati.

translation.en: Remmy told Global Voices:
translation.sw: Remmy aliiambia Global Voices:

translation.en: The police engaged in a running battle not to allow any journalists to cover the story concerning Besigye.
translation.sw: Polisi walizua hali ya taharuki wakati wa kuwazuia wanahabari kuangazia taarifa kumhusu Besigye.

translation.en: Police fondled her breasts in the police van, undressed her at the station and exposed her naked body to a camera, according to Remmy.
translation.sw: Polisi walinipapasa matiti yangu kwenye gari lao, wakanivua nguo kituoni na kuniacha uchi mbele ya kamera, kwa mujibu wa Remmy.

translation.en: She was also followed and harassed by a police officer on Facebook because the Ugandan government thought she had connived with Besigye to taint the countrys image.
translation.sw: Pia alifuatiliwa na kunyanyaswa na ofisa wa polisi kwenye Facebook kwa sababu serikali ya Uganda ilidhani kwamba alikuwa ameshirikiana na Besigye kuichafulia nchi taswira.

translation.en: She told Global Voices that anonymous notes left at her door threatened to kidnap her if she refused to reveal Besigyes exit route from his house.
translation.sw: Aliiambia Global Voices kuwa ujumbe wa maandishi kutoka kwa watu wasiojulikana uliachwa mlangoni pake ukitoa vitisho vya kumteka iwapo angekataa kutoa siri ya njia atakayotumia Besigye kutoka nyumbani kwake.

translation.en: In the aftermath of Remmys arrest, Human Rights Network for Journalists-Uganda took a poll to gauge public opinion about the ordeal.
translation.sw: Baada ya kisa cha ukamatwaji wa Remmy, Mtandao wa Haki za Binadamu za Wanahabari  Uganda uliandaa kura ya maoni kupima hali halisi ya mambo kuhusu kisa hicho.

translation.en: They asked: Uganda police claimed that NBS TV reporter Bahati Remmy disobeyed lawful orders and also obstructed police officers on duty hence her arrest?
translation.sw: Waliuliza: Polisi ya Uganda ilidai kuwa ripota wa runinga ya NBS Bahati Remmy alikiuka maagizo halali na pia aliwazuia polisi kuifanya kazi yao hivyo kuwafanya kumkamata.

translation.en: Do you agree?
translation.sw: Je, unakubaliana na hili?

translation.en: Magambo Emmanuel wrote:
translation.sw: Magambo Emmanuel aliandika:

translation.en: It is a lame excuse and total lie because there is video footage that shows how Bahati was arrested.
translation.sw: Ni sababu dhaifu na uongo mtupu kwa sababu kuna mkanda wa video unaoonyesha jinsi Bahati alivyokamatwa.

translation.en: Police should stop shifting their problems to innocent journalists.
translation.sw: Polisi wanapaswa kuacha kuyaelekeza matatizo yao kwa wanahabari.

translation.en: Davide Lubuurwa wrote:
translation.sw: Davide Lubuurwa aliandika:

translation.en: Whoever tries to let the people know how the state is standing is to be arrested.
translation.sw: Yeyote anayejaribu kuwajuza watu kuhusu hali ya taifa lazima akamatwe.

translation.en: A very big problem is coming to Uganda soon.
translation.sw: Tatizo kubwa linakuja Uganda hivi karibuni.

translation.en: What bothers me most is that whoever tries to say something that is not in support of the current regime is taken to be a rebel so the Ugandan people must wake up.
translation.sw: Kinachoniudhi ni kwamba yeyote anayejaribu kutamka jambo lisilounga mkono utawala uliopo anachukuliwa kana kwamba ni mwasi kwa hivyo ni sharti watu wa Uganda wazinduke.

translation.en: Many women journalists in Uganda have stopped reporting stories that are critical of the government because they fear attacks and harassment by the state.
translation.sw: Wanahabari wengi wanawake nchini Uganda wameacha kazi ya uandishi wa habari hasa zile zinazoikosoa serikali kwa hofu ya kushambuliwa na kudhulumiwa na utawala.

translation.en: Media practitioners have said that government and security agents occasionally call editors and instruct them to not to publish stories that negatively portray the government.
translation.sw: Wataalamu wa habari wameelezea kuwa serikali na vyombo vya usalama huwapigia simu wahariri na kuwaagiza kutochapisha habari zinazoipa serikali mwonekano hasi.

translation.en: These attacks often go unreported  especially for women  which has also made it difficult to understand the full scope of this problem.
translation.sw: Mashambulio haya huwa hayaripotiwi  haswa na wanawake  hali inayosababisha ugumu wa kuelewa kina halisi cha tatizo hili.

translation.en: Remmy dragged the Ugandan government to the Uganda Human Rights Commission, but until today, there has been no update on her case.
translation.sw: Remmy aliiburuta serikali ya Uganda kwenye Tume ya Haki za Binadamu ya Uganda, lakini hadi leo, hakuna lililojiri kuhusu kesi yake.

translation.en: The commission lacks the required independence to rule in favor of those who submit complaints against the government.
translation.sw: Tume inakosa uhuru unaotakiwa kufanya maamuzi kwa upande wa wale wanaowasilisha malalamiko dhidi ya serikali.

translation.en: Its seven members, including its chairperson, are appointed by the president, with the parliaments approval.
translation.sw: Wajumbe wake saba, pamoja na mwenyekiti wake, wanateuliwa na rais, kwa idhini ya Bunge.

translation.en: They are biased, Remmy said, adding: They have a huge backlog and most of the cases they want to hear are cases brought in by the government.
translation.sw: Wana upendeleo, Remmy alisema, huku akiongezea: Wana mrundikano wa kesi, na kesi nyingi wanazotaka kuzisikiliza ni zile zinazowasilishwa na serikali.

translation.en: Many threats faced by women journalists online are closely linked to abuse offline.
translation.sw: Vitisho vingi vinavyowakumba wanahabari wanawake mtandaoni vinahusiana kwa karibu na vile vya dhuluma dhidi yao nje ya mtandao.

translation.en: Remmy believes that the right, plight and dignity of female journalists should be upheld at all times because attacks on women silence the media as a whole.
translation.sw: Remmy anaamini kuwa haki, hali na hadhi ya wanahabari wanawake zinapaswa kuzingatiwa nyakati zote kwa sababu mashambulio dhidi ya wanawake yanakandamiza sekta ya uwanahabari kwa jumla.

translation.en: As Uganda plans to hold presidential and parliamentary elections in 2021, attacks and harassment of women journalists by the state need to stop because it affects access to information, freedom of expression and democracy rights of Ugandan citizens.
translation.sw: Uganda inapojiandaa kufanya uchaguzi wa urais na ubunge mnamo 2021, mashambulio na udhalalishwaji wa waandishi wa habari wanawake na serikali unapaswa kukomeshwa kwa sababu unaathiri ufikiaji wa habari, uhuru wa kujieleza na haki za demokrasia za raia wa Uganda.

translation.en: Press freedom remains an undermined child in the countrys system, Remmy told Global Voices.
translation.sw: Uhuru wa waandishi wa habari unasalia kuwa mtoto anayepuuzwa katika mfumo wa nchi, Remmy aliiambia Global Voices.

translation.en: This article is part of a series called The identity matrix: platform regulation of online threats to expression in Africa.These posts interrogate identity-driven online hate speech or discrimination based on language or geographic origin, misinformation and harassment (particularly against female activists and journalists) prevalent in digital spaces of seven African countries: Algeria, Cameroon, Ethiopia, Nigeria, Sudan, Tunisia and Uganda.
translation.sw: Makala haya ni sehemu ya mfululizo unaoitwa Jedwali la Utambulisho: Jukwaa la kudhibiti vitisho vya mtandaoni dhidi ya uhuru wa kujieleza barani Afrika, Machapisho haya yanahoji kauli za chuki zenye utambulisho au kubagua kwa misingi ya lugha au asili ya kijiografia, habari potovu na udhalilishwaji (haswa dhidi ya wanaharakati wanawake na waandishi wa habari) uliokithiri mtandaoni katika nchi saba za Kiafrika: Algeria, Kamerun, Ethiopia, Nigeria, Sudani, Tunisia na Uganda.

translation.en: The project is funded by the Africa Digital Rights Fund of The Collaboration on International ICT Policy for East and Southern Africa (CIPESA).
translation.sw: Mradi huu umefadhiliwa na Mfuko wa Haki za Kidijitali wa Afrika wa shirika la Ushirikiano wa Sera za kimataifa za TEHAMA kwa ajili ya Mashariki na Kusini mwa Afrika (CIPESA).

translation.en: Tree roots cling to a 15th-century wall on Kilwa Kisiwani Island, Tanzania.
translation.sw: Mizizi ya miti iliyojikita kwenye ukuta wa karne ya 15 uliopo kisiwa cha Kilwa Kisiwani, Tanzania.

translation.en: In 1981, the ruins of the powerful Swahili sultanate on the island were declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
translation.sw: Mnamo mwaka wa 1981, magofu ya sultani hodari wa Kiswahili kisiwani humo yalitangazwa kuwa eneo la UNESCO la urithi wa dunia.
