translation.en: Editors note: This personal essay was written following a Twitter campaign organized by Global Voices sub-Saharan Africa and Rising Voices where each week, a different language activist shared their perspectives on the intersection of digital rights and African Languages  as part of the project, The identity matrix: Platform regulation of online threats to expression in Africa.
translation.sw: Kidokezo cha mhariri: Makala haya ya kibinafsi yaliandikwa kufuatia kampeni ya Twitter iliyoandaliwa na Global Voices Ukanda wa Afrika Kusini mwa Jangwa la Sahara kwa ushirikiano wa Mradi wa Rising Voices pale kila wiki, mwanaharakati tofauti wa lugha alishiriki maoni yake kuhusu muingiliano wa haki za kidijitali na Lugha za Kiafrika kama sehemu ya mradi, Matriki utambulisho: Tishio la ukandamizaji wa uhuru wa kujieleza mtandaoni barani Afrika.

translation.en: According to the United Nations Educational Scientific and Cultural Organisation (UNESCO), linguistic and cultural diversity are of strategic importance for people around the world to strengthen the unity and cohesion of societies.
translation.sw: Kulingana na shirika la Umoja wa Mataifa la Elimu, Sayansi na Utamaduni (UNESCO), utofauti wa lugha na utamaduni una umuhimu kimkakati kwa watu ulimwenguni kote katika juhudi za kuimarisha umoja na mshikamano wa jamii.

translation.en: This linguistic and cultural diversity propelled the UNESCO general conference to proclaim International Mother Language Day (IMLD) in November 1999, to be commemorated annually on February 21 annually.
translation.sw: Utofauti huu wa lugha na utamaduni ulishinikiza kongamano kuu la UNESCO kutangaza Siku ya Kimataifa ya Lugha ya Mama (IMLD) mnamo Novemba 1999, siku inayokumbukuwa mnamo Februari 21 kila mwaka.

translation.en: To bolster IMLD, the United Nations (UN) declared the International Year of Indigenous Languages (IYIL 2019), to draw attention to the endangerment of the worlds indigenous languages.
translation.sw: Kuimarisha IMLD, Umoja wa Mataifa (UN) ulitangaza Mwaka wa Kimataifa wa Lugha za Asili (IYIL 2019), ili kuzingatia hatari ya kuangamia kwa lugha za asili ulimwenguni.

translation.en: Today, there are over 7,100 languages spoken around the world, 28 percent of which are spoken on the African continent alone.
translation.sw: Hivi leo, kuna zaidi ya lugha 7,100 zinazozungumzwa kote duniani,asilimia 28 yazo zikizungumzwa barani Afrika pekee.

translation.en: Despite this, English dominates online spaces in the region.
translation.sw: Licha ya hili, Kiingereza kinaongoza mtandaoni katika eneo hili.

translation.en: Some twenty years ago, 80 percent of the worlds online content was English-centric.
translation.sw: Miaka ishirini iliyopita, asilimia 80 ya maudhui ya dunia mtandaoni yalikuwa yanaegemea Kiingereza.

translation.en: Currently, however, English content online is said to have shrunk to between 51- 55 percent.
translation.sw: Kwa sasa, hata hivyo, maudhui ya Kiingereza yanasemekana kupungua hadi kiwango cha kati ya asilimia 51 hadi 55.

translation.en: The million-dollar question, therefore, is: Could this sharp drop be an indicator that people now favor their native languages online over English, considering that less than 15 percent of the world population speaks English as their first language?
translation.sw: Swala kizushi, kwa hivyo, ni:je, kupungua huku kunaashiria kuwa sasa watu wanapendelea lugha zao za asilia kuliko Kiingereza, ukizingatia kuwa ni chini ya asilimia 15 tu ya idadi ya watu duniani inayozungumza Kiingereza kama lugha yao ya kwanza?

translation.en: Swahili: Coming to birth?
translation.sw: Kiswahili: Ujio wa Uzao?

translation.en: Swahili is recognized as one of the official languages of the African Union (AU), alongside English, Portuguese, French, Spanish and Arabic.
translation.sw: Kiswahili kinatambuliwa kama mojawapo wa lugha rasmi za Umoja wa Afrika (AU), kando na Kiiengereza, Kireno, Kifaransa, Kihispania na Kiarabu.

translation.en: Swahili is also the lingua franca for East Africa Community (EAC) member states.
translation.sw: Kiswahili pia ni lugha ya matumizi mapana ya mataifa wanachama wa Jumuiya ya Afrika mashariki (EAC).

translation.en: Rwanda, an EAC member, saw its lower legislative house approve a law making Swahili an official language in 2017  in addition to Kinyarwanda, French and English.
translation.sw: Rwanda, taifa mwanachama wa EAC, kupitia bunge lake la chini, ilipitisha msuada wa kukifanya Kiswahili kuwa lugha rasmi mnamo 2017  kando na Kinyarwanda, Kifaransa na Kiingereza.

translation.en: Besides being used for administrative purposes, Swahili will be incorporated into Rwandas school curriculum.
translation.sw: Licha ya kutumiwa kwa madhumuni ya utawala, Kiswahili kitajumuishwa kwenye mtaala wa elimu wa nchi hiyo.

translation.en: In Uganda, the government in September 2019 approved the establishment of the National Swahili Council.
translation.sw: Nchini Uganda, mnamo Septemba 2019, serikali iliidhinisha uanzishaji wa Baraza la Kitaifa la Kiswahili.

translation.en: Article 6 (2) of the Constitution of Uganda also spells out that Swahili shall be the second official language in Uganda to be used in such circumstances as Parliament may by law prescribe.
translation.sw: Kifungu cha 6 (2) cha Katiba ya Uganda pia kimeelezea kuwa Kiswahili kitakuwa lugha rasmi ya pili nchini Uganda na kitatumika katika mazingira kadri Bunge litakavyoweza kuagiza kwa sheria.

translation.en: In 2018, South Africa, which boasts 11 official languages, formalized Swahili as an optional subject in its curriculum, starting in 2020.
translation.sw: Mnamo 2018, Afrika Kusini, nchi inayojivunia lugha rasmi 11, ilirasimisha Kiswahili kama somo la hiari katika mtaala wake, kuanzia mwaka wa 2020.

translation.en: In 2019, the Southern Africa Development Community (SADC) adopted Swahili as its fourth official language.
translation.sw: Mnamo mwaka wa 2019, Jumuiya ya Maendeleo Kusini mwa Afrika (SADC) ilipitisha Kiswahili kama lugha rasmi ya nne ya Jumuiya hiyo.

translation.en: Swahili invisibility online
translation.sw: Muonekano finyu wa Kiswahili Mtandaoni

translation.en: Image by Rachel Strohm, September 20, 2019, (CC BY-ND 2.0)
translation.sw: Picha na Rachel Strohm, Septemba 20, 2019, (CC BY-ND 2.0)

translation.en: Despite Swahili being the most widely spoken African language, with approximately 150 million speakers  mostly in East Africa, the Great Lakes region, southern Somalia, and some parts of Southern Africa, its visibility online is dismal.
translation.sw: Licha ya kuwa lugha ya Kiafrika inayozungumzwa sana, na takribani watu milioni 150  haswa katika Afrika Mashariki, kanda ya maziwa makuu, kusini mwa Somalia, na maeneo mengine ya kusini mwa Afrika, muonekano wa Kiswahili mtandaoni ni finyu.

translation.en: John Walubengo, a lecturer at the Multimedia University of Kenya, states in an op-ed with the Nation, a Kenyan daily, that the absence of online linguistic and cultural diversity creates a society with a tunnel-vision view of the world.
translation.sw: John Walubengo, mhadhiri wa Chuo Kikuu cha Multimedia cha Kenya, anachanganua kwenye makala yake katika Nation, jarida la kila siku nchini Kenya, kuwa ukosefu wa lugha na utamaduni mtandaoni unaunda jamii yenye mtazamo mdogo wa dunia.

translation.en: Walubengo predicts that most indigenous cultures end up surrendering their identities to the English way of doing things.
translation.sw: Walubengo anaelezea kuwa tamaduni nyingi za kiasili huishia kusalimisha utambulisho wao kwa hali za Kiingereza za ufanyaji mambo.

translation.en: This sad reality can only be reversed if indigenous civilizations fight to retain their identities both online and offline, he says.
translation.sw: Ukweli huu wa kusikitisha hata hivyo unaweza kubadilishwa tu iwapo jamii asilia zitapigania kuhifadhi utambulisho wao mtandaoni na vile vile nje ya mtandao, anasema.

translation.en: But all is not gloom and doom.
translation.sw: Hata hivyo, yote si ya kutamausha.

translation.en: There are some dedicated organizations at the forefront of promoting and developing Swahili online.
translation.sw: Kuna mashirika kadhaa yaliyojitolea katika mstari wa mbele kuendeleza na kukuza Kiswahili mtandaoni.

translation.en: The Internet Corporation for Assigned Names and Numbers
translation.sw: The Internet Corporation for Assigned Names and Numbers

translation.en: (ICANN), a global multi-stakeholder organization that coordinates Internet Domain Name System (DNS), Internet Protocol (IP) addresses and autonomous system numbers, instituted the Internationalized Domain Names (IDNs) that enable people to use domain names in local languages and scripts.
translation.sw: (ICANN),  shirika la kimataifa lenye wadau wengi linaloratibu Mfumo wa Majina ya Mtandao(DNS), Anwani za Mtandao (IP) na nambari za mfumo huru, lilianzisha Majina ya Kikoa ya Kimataifa (IDNs), yanayowezesha watu kutumia majina ya kikoa katika lugha na maandishi ya kiasili.Kiuhakika, huundwa kwa kutumia herufi kutoka maandishi tofauti, kama vile Kiarabu, Kichina, au Kisiriliki.

translation.en: Ideally, they are formed using characters from different scripts, such as Arabic, Chinese, or Cyrillic.These are then encoded by the Unicode standard and used as allowed by relevant IDN protocols, a set of standards defined by the Internet Architecture Board (IAB), and its subsidiary groups; the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) and the Internet Research Task Force (IRTF).
translation.sw: Herufi hizi kisha husimbwa na kiwango cha Unicode na kutumiwa kama inavyoruhusiwa na vikoa vya IDN, seti ya viwango vilivyoainishwa na Bodi ya Usanifu wa Mtandao (IAB), na vikundi vyake vya kampuni ndogo; Tume ya Kazi ya Uhandisi wa Mtandao (IETF) na Tume ya Utafiti wa Mtandao (IRTF).

translation.en: The Universal Acceptance Steering Group (UASG)
translation.sw: The Universal Acceptance Steering Group (UASG)

translation.en: UASG is a community-based team of industry leaders, supported by ICANN, that prepares online communities for the next billion internet users.
translation.sw: UASG ni jamii ya viongozi wa tasnia, inayohimiliwa na ICANN, ambayo huandaa jamii mtandaoni kwa watumiaji bilioni moja wafuatao wa mtandao.

translation.en: This is achieved through a process known as Universal Acceptance (UA) that ensures that internet applications and systems treat all top-level domains (TLDs) and emails based on those domains in a consistent manner  including those in non-Latin-based languages and those that are more than three characters long.
translation.sw: Huku kunafanikishwa kupitia mchakato unaojulikana kama Ukubalikaji Ulimwenguni (UA), ambao huhakikisha kwamba programu na mifumo ya mtandao inashughulikia vikoa vyote vya viwango cha juu (TLDs) na barua pepe kulingana na vikoa hivyo kwa njia thabiti  pamoja na vile vilivyoko kwenye maandishi yasiyo ya Kilatini na vile ambavyo ni zaidi ya herufi tatu.

translation.en: UA serves digital natives around the world in their local languages and with domain names that better align with their cultural identities.
translation.sw: UA hutumikia wanamtandao ulimwenguni kote katika lugha zao asili na kwa majina ya vikoa ambayo yanatambulisha utamaduni wao.

translation.en: Hence, promoting a multilingual Internet.
translation.sw: Kwa hivyo, kukuza mtandao wa lugha nyingi.

translation.en: ICANNWiki
translation.sw: ICANNWiki

translation.en: This nonprofit organization provides community-developed wiki on ICANN and Internet Governance, has over time partnered with organizations, educational institutions and individuals in Kenya and Tanzania.
translation.sw: Shirika hili lisilo la kifaida linalotoa ukurasa wa wiki ulioendelezwa na jamii kwenye masuala ya ICANN na Utawala wa mtandao, kwa muda mrefu limeshirikiana na mashirika, taasisi za elimu na watu binafsi nchini Kenya na Tanzania.

translation.en: This has enabled East Africans to build, translate and add Wiki resources in their own vision, language and perspective.
translation.sw: Huku kumewezesha Waafrika Mashariki kujenga, kutafsiri na kuongeza rasilimali za Wiki kwa maono yao, lugha na mtazamo.

translation.en: This Swahili initiative  that I have personally been part of  has immensely bridged the information gap on Internet Governance issues by localizing ICANNWiki content to promote local engagement in the target communities.
translation.sw: Mradi huu wa Kiswahili  ambao mie kama mwandishi nimeweza kujihusisha nao rasmi  umeziba pengo la habari zinazohusiana na maswala ya Utawala wa Mtandao kwa kujanibisha maudhui ya ICANNWiki kukuza ushiriki katika jamii zinazolengwa.

translation.en: Localization Lab
translation.sw: Localization Lab

translation.en: Localization Lab is a global community of volunteer collaborators who support the translation and localization of digital safety tutorials and tools like TOR, Signal, OONI, Psiphon.
translation.sw: Localization Lab, ni jamii ya kimataifa yenye washiriki wa kujitolea wanaohimili utafsiri na ujanibishaji wa miongozo ya utumiaji na vifaa vya kidijitali vya usalama kama vile TOR, Signal, OONI, Psiphon.

translation.en: These technologies address security, privacy and anonymity online by ensuring that indigineous language activists have safe spaces for accessing information online.
translation.sw: Teknolojia hizi zinaangazia usalama, faragha, na ufichojina kwa kuhakikisha kuwa wanaharakati wa lugha za kiasilia wana nyugha salama za kufikia taarifa mtandaoni.

translation.en: Localization Lab has translated more than 60 of these safety tools into over 180 different languages and dialects from around the world, among them Swahili.
translation.sw: Localization Lab imetafsiri zaidi ya vifaa 60 kwenye lugha 180 tofauti kote duniani,

translation.en: Kondoa Community Network (KCN)
translation.sw: Kondoa Community Network (KCN)

translation.en: KCN is the first community network to pilot the use of television white space (TVWS), a wireless technology that employs unused parts of the radio spectrum in the 470 to 790 MHz frequency band  to address internet connectivity in rural Tanzania.
translation.sw: KCN mtandao jamii wa kwanza kufanyia majaribio teknolojia ya mawimbi ya Televisheni almaarufu TVWS, teknolojia isiyounganisha na nyaya inayotumia mawimbi yasiyotumika ya redio yaliyopo ndani ya masafa ya mita bendi 470 hadi 790 MHz kutatua changamoto ya uunganishwaji mtandaoni vijijini nchini Tanzania.

translation.en: KCN trains the rural populace to create and host local content thats befitting to their context.
translation.sw: KCN inawafunza wanavijiji kuunda na kuwa wenyeji wa maudhui asilia yenye manufaa na muktadha wao.

translation.en: Matogoro Jabhera, KCN founder and lecturer at the University of Dodoma, Tanzania, told Global Voices in a Skype call, that he believes that local content provides an incentive for more [of the] offline population to get online because they can relate with their local news [] compared to the current situation where most contents are in the English language.
translation.sw: Matogoro Jabhera, mwanzilishi wa KCN na mhadhiri msaidizi katika Chuo Kikuu cha Dodoma, Tanzania, aliliambia shirika la Global Voices kupitia simu ya Skype, kuwa anaamini maudhui asilia yanatoa motisha kwa watu zaidi waliopo nje ya mtandao kujiunga mtandaoni kwa sababu wanaweza wakaelewa taarifa zao asili [] ikilinganishwa na hali ya sasa pale maudhui mengi yapo kwenye lugha ya Kiingereza.

translation.en: The next billion multilingual users on the internet
translation.sw: Watumiaji bilioni wafuatao mtandaoni

translation.en: The world anticipates connecting the next billion users of the internet and 17 million of these users are projected to get connected online using language as their digital identity.
translation.sw: Ulimwengu unatarajia kuwaunganisha watumiaji bilioni wafuatao mtandaoni na milioni 17 ya watumiaji hawa wanakadiriwa kuunganishwa mtandaoni wakitumia lugha kama utambulisho wao wa kidijitali.

translation.en: Therefore, a lack of sufficient local content could have adverse effects as far as digital inclusion.
translation.sw: Kwa hivyo, ukosekanaji wa maudhui asilia huenda ukawa na athari kubwa mno  ukizingatia ujumuishwaji kidijitali.

translation.en: This will outrightly affect digital rights  largely, internet access, right to access information online, and the right to use their own indigenous language to create, share and disseminate information and knowledge through the internet.
translation.sw: Bayana, huku kutaathiri haki za kidijitali  haswa, ufikiaji mtandao, haki ya kufikia maelezo mtandaoni, na haki ya kutumia lugha zao asilia kutengeneza, kushiriki, na kusambaza taarifa na maarifa kupitia mtandao.

translation.en: It is thus vital to put in place formidable action plans that will foster the development of ICT applications and services, as well as the use of local languages, to guarantee digital inclusion for all.
translation.sw: Hivyo ni muhimu kuweka mikakati itakayoendeleza utengenezaji wa programu za TEHAMA na huduma, vile vile utumiaji wa lugha asilia, ili kuhakikisha ujumuishwaji wa kidijitali kwa wote.

translation.en: This, complemented by actions such as localization of digital training and learning materials, and rural ICT literacy programs, is likely to spur a digital revolution, hence promoting digital rights of internet users and bridging the digital divide.
translation.sw: Hatua hii, ikihimiliwa na juhudi zenginezo kama vile ujanibishaji wa vifaa vya kufunzia na kujifunzia, na mipango ya kusoma na kuandika ya TEHAMA vijijini, inaweza kuchochea mapinduzi ya kidijitali, na hivyo basi kukuza haki za kidijitali za watumizi wa mtandao na kuziba pengo la mgawanyiko wa kidijitali.

translation.en: Ultimately, this process will hasten the protection, respect and promotion of  all African and minority languages on the internet as enunciated in the principles of the African Declaration on Internet Rights and Freedom.
translation.sw: Hatimaye, mchakato huu utaharakisha ulindwaji, uheshimiwaji na ukuzaji lugha zote za Kiafrika na lugha zingenezo ndogo mtandaoni kama inavyoafikiwa katika kanuni za Azimio la Afrika la Haki za mtandao na Uhuru.

translation.en: The Identity Matrix is funded by the Africa Digital Rights Fund of The Collaboration on International ICT Policy for East and Southern Africa (CIPESA).

translation.en: Global Voices sub-Saharan Africa in conjunction with Rising Voices will host a Twitter campaign as part of the project, The identity matrix: Platform regulation of online threats to expression in Africa, from April 20 to May 22, 2020.
translation.sw: Global Voices, kupitia waandishi wake wa Ukanda wa Afrika Kusini mwa Jangwa la Sahari kwa ushirikiano na Mradi wa Rising Voices itaendesha kampeni ya mtandao wa twita kama sehemu ya mradi unaofahamika kama, Utambulisho: Jukwaa la kudhibiti vitisho vya mtandaoni dhidi ya uhuru wa kujieleza barani Afrika, kuanzia Aprili 20 mpaka Mei 22, 2020.

translation.en: Read more: The Identity Matrix': A new project for African digital spaces
translation.sw: Soma zaidi: MatrikiUtambulisho': Mrandi mpya wa kukuza haki za kidigitali barani Afrika

translation.en: Building on Writing Toward Freedom: Politics and digital rights in Africa, this five-week social media outreach initiative will involve a curated dialogue on @GVSSAfrica featuring five African language activists who will focus on the intersection of language and digital rights.
translation.sw: Kama mwendelezo wa Uandishi wa Kuelekea kwenye Uhuru: Siasa na haki za kidijitali barani Afrika , kampeni hii ya wiki tano ya mtandao wa kijamii kuhamasisha jamii itashirikisha mjadala ulioandaliwa na @GVSSAfrica ukiwashirikisha wanaharakati wa lugha tano za Kiafrika, ambao wataangazia uwiano wa lugha na haki za kidijitali.

translation.en: Identity Matrix is funded by the Africa Digital Rights Fund of The Collaboration on International ICT Policy for East and Southern Africa (CIPESA).
translation.sw: Mradi huu umefadhiliwa na Mfuko wa Haki za Kidijitali Afrika  unaoendeshwa na Ushirikiano wa Sera za kimataifa za TEHAMA kwa ajili ya Afrika ya Mashariki na Kusini (CIPESA).

translation.en: Global Voices is part of the grantees for the African Digital Rights Fund.
translation.sw: Global Voices ni mmoja wapo wa wanufaika wa ufadhili huo.

translation.en: The activists will tweet in African languages like Bambara, Igbo, Khoekhoe, N|uu, Swahili, Yorùbá, in addition to French and English.
translation.sw: Wanaharakati hao watatwiti kwa lugha za ki-Afrika kama vile ki-Bambara, ki-Igbo, ki-Khoekhoe, ki-N|uu, ki-Swahili, ki-Yorùbá, sambamba na ki-Faransa na ki-Ingereza.

translation.en: They will also share their personal experiences and insights using a language lens on challenges and threats to digital rights.
translation.sw: Pia wataweza kutushirikisha uzoefu na uelewa wao binafsi kwa mtazamo wa lugha kuhusu changamoto zinazotishia haki za kidijitali.

translation.en: The conversations will interrogate how threats to net neutrality marginalize digital content in African languages; the expansion of mis- and disinformation in African languages on various digital platforms and what companies or civil society are doing about it; the effects of a lack of affordable internet connectivity in places where there are large communities of speakers of an African language; the importance of and challenges for the right to access information in digital spaces in African languages.
translation.sw: Mazungumzo hayo yatahoji namna gani tishio la kutoegemea upande wowote mtandaoni linavyoathiri maudhui ya mtandaoni kwenye lugha za Kiafrika; uenezaji wa taarifa potovu katika lugha za Kiafrika kwenye lugha tofauti mtandaoni na kile kinachofanywa na makampuni au mashirika ya kijamii kuhusiana na hili; athari za ukosekanaji wa mtandao wa bei nafuu katika maeneo yaliyo na jamii kubwa za wazungumzaji wa lugha ya Kiafrika; umuhimu wa na changamoto za haki ya kupata taarifa katika lugha za kidijitali a Kiafrika.

translation.en: They will also look at corporate policies, as well as ongoing challenges that may affect how citizens can freely express themselves in their language.
translation.sw: Vile vile, wataangazia suala la sera za mashirika, na pia changamoto zinazoendelea kuwepo zenye uwezo wa kuathiri jinsi raia wanavyoweza kujielezea huru katika lugha yao.

translation.en: Meet the #IdentityMatrix Twitter Hosts
translation.sw: Kutana na waendeshaji wa mjadala huo kwenye mtandao wa Twita

translation.en: The Twitter conversations will be anchored by Denver Toroxa Breda (Khoekhoe/N|uu/English) from South Africa, Adéṣínà Ghani Ayẹni (Yorùbá/English) from Nigeria, Kpénahi Traoré (Bambara/French) from Burkina Faso, Roseblossom Ozurumba (Igbo/English) from Nigeria and Bonface Witaba (Swahili/English) from Kenya.
translation.sw: Mjadala huu wa Twitter utawasilishwa na Denver Toroxa Breda (ki-Khoekhoe/ki-N|uu/Kiingereza) kutoka Afrika Kusiki, Adéṣínà Ghani Ayẹni (ki-Yorùbá/ki-Ingereza) kutoka Nijeria, Kpénahi Traoré (ki-Bambara/ki-Faransa) kutoka Burkina Faso, Roseblossom Ozurumba (ki-Igbo/ki-Ingereza) kutoka Nijeria na Bonface Witaba (ki-Swahili/ki-Ingereza) kutoka Kenya.

translation.en: Some of the hosts previously participated in the @DigiAfricanLang online campaign in commemoration of the International Year of Indigenous Languages 2019.
translation.sw: Baadhi ya washiriki hao walishiriki kampeni ya mtandaoni ya @DigiAfricanLang  kuadhimisha Mwaka wa Kimataifa wa Lugha za Asili 2019.

translation.en: Breda, Khoe languages and cultural Kuwiri or activist, is a writer advocating for the officialization of Khoekhoe and N|uu, two of South Africa's first languages.
translation.sw: Breda,  mzungumzaji wa Kikhoe, mwenye utamaduni wa Kuwiri au mwanaharakati, ni mwandishi anayepigania urasimishaji wa lugha za Kikhoekhoe na kin|uu, lugha mbili za kwanza nchini Afrika Kusini.

translation.en: Khoekhoe is spoken in Namibia, studied at schools, and yet in South Africa where it originated, only 2,000 people speak the language, it's not official, it's not in school.
translation.sw: Kikhoekhoe kinazungumzwa nchini Namibia, kinasomwa mashuleni, lakini Afrika kusini ambako ndio chimbuko lake, ni watu 2,000 tu wanakizungumza, sio lugha inayotambuliwa rasmi, haipo shuleni.

translation.en: N|uu has one fluent speaker, not official and in schools, it's a critically endangered language.
translation.sw: Lugha ya Kin|uu ina mzungumzaji gwiji mmoja tu, sio lugha inayotambuliwa rasmi, na mashuleni, na ni lugha iliyoko katika hatari ya kutoweka.

translation.en: Kpénahi Traoré was born in the Côte d'Ivoire but is from Burkina Faso.
translation.sw: Kpénahi Traoré alizaliwa Côte d'Ivoire lakini asili yake ni Burkina Faso.

translation.en: She is the editor-in-chief of RFI mandenkan, the Bambara language newsroom at Radio France Internationale (RFI).
translation.sw: Yeye ni mhariri mkuu wa RFI mandenkan, chumba cha habari cha lugha ya Kibambara katika shirika la Radio France Internationale (RFI).

translation.en: It has been a great experience for Traoré to work on Bambara language.
translation.sw: Imekuwa ni uzoefu mzuri kwa Traoré kufanya kazi katika lugha ya Kibambara.

translation.en: Prior to that, she thought it was impossible to do journalism in Bambara.
translation.sw: Kabla ya hapo, alidhania kuwa isingewezekana kabisa kufanya uandishi wa habari katika lugha ya Kibambara

translation.en: Samogo is Traoré's mother tongue, even if she grew up with the language called Dioula in Côte d'Ivoire and Burkina Faso.
translation.sw: Kisamogo ndio lugha ya mama ya Traoré, japokuwa alikuwa na lugha iitwayo Kidioula huko Côte d'Ivoire na Burkina Faso.

translation.en: Malians call it Bambara, Guineans say Malinke, some people say Mandingo.
translation.sw: Wamali wanakiita Kibambara, Waguinea wanakiita Kimalinke, wengine wanakiita Kimandingo.

translation.en: Ozurumba is also known as Asampete, which can be loosely translated from Igbo language to mean the pretty one.
translation.sw: Ozurumba pia anajulikana kama Asampete, jina ambalo linaweza kutafsiriwa kutoka kwa lugha ya Kiigbo kumaanisha yule mzuri.

translation.en: Ozurumba is excited about Igbo language and culture and is committed to ensuring that several folks become literate in some or all of speaking, writing and reading.
translation.sw: Ozurumba anafurahishwa na lugha na utamaduni ya Kiigbo na amejitolea kuhakikisha kuwa watu kadhaa wanajifunza kwa kiasi fulani kuzungumza, kuandika na kusoma.

translation.en: Ozurumba is a founding member of the Igbo Wikimedians User Group and will most likely start a conversation about the Wikimedia Foundation without prompting.
translation.sw: Ozurumba ni mwanzilishi wa kundi la kiigbo la watumiaji wa Wikimedia na mara kwa mara huenda akaanzisha mazungumzo kuhusu Wikimedia Foundation bila kushinikizwa.

translation.en: She lives in Abuja, Nigeria, and loves the calm and unhurried feel of the city.
translation.sw: Anaishi jijini Abuja, Naijeria, na anapenda utulivu na hisia ya mwendo wa aste aste wa jiji.

translation.en: Adéṣínà Ayẹni, otherwise known as Ọmọ Yoòbá, is a journalist and cultural advocate who took up the socialization function of the media through the preservation, dissemination and transmission of the Yorùbá cultural heritage both online and offline.
translation.sw: Adéṣínà Ayẹni, ambaye pia anajulikana kama Ọmọ Yoòbá, ni mwandishi wa habari na mwanaharati wa utamaduni ambaye anatumia kazi yake ya uanahabari kuendeleza utunzaji, na usambazaji wa urithi wa utamaduni wa Kiyorùbá mtandaoni na nje ya mtandao.

translation.en: As a voice-over artist, he has produced countless Yorùbá advertisements for Nigeria radio campaigns and TVC.
translation.sw: Kama msanii wa sauti, ametayarisha matangazo mengi ya Kiyorùbá ya kampeni za redio za Naijeria na TVC.

translation.en: He's the founder of Yobamoodua Cultural Heritage, a platform dedicated to the propagation of the Yorùbá language and culture.
translation.sw: Yeye ndiye mwanzilishi wa Urithi wa Utamaduni wa Yobamoodua, jukwaa lililojitolea kueneza lugha na utamaduni wa Kiyorùbá.

translation.en: Ọmọ Yoòbá is also the língua manager for the Global Voices Yorùbá site.
translation.sw: Ọmọ Yoòbá pia ni meneja wa lugha wa tovuti ya Global Voices Yorùbá.

translation.en: He is a Yorùbá language instructor on tribalingua.com where he tutors students from all over the world.
translation.sw: Yeye ni mwalimu wa lugha ya Kiyorùbá katika tribalingua.com ambako anafunza wanafunzi kutoka sehemu mbali mbali duniani.

translation.en: He has also worked with Localization Lab, an international community of volunteer translators and end-users, developers and intermediaries who work together to translate and localize digital security and circumvention tools.
translation.sw: Pia amefanya kazi na Localization Lab, jamii ya kimataifa ya watafsiri wa kujitolea na watumiaji mtandao, watengenezaji programu za kompyuta, na wapatanishaji ambao wanafanya kazi kwa pamoja kutafsiri na kubinafsisha vifaa vya usalama vya kidijitali na ala za kukwepa ufungiwaji au uzimwaji mtandao.

translation.en: Ọmọ Yoòbá has written a book titled: Ẹyà Ara Ẹdá Ọmọ Ènìyàn, a compilation of labeled diagrams of the anatomy and morphology of the human body and herbs that work wonders on each part of the body.
translation.sw: Ọmọ Yoòbá ameandika kitabu kiitwacho: Ẹyà Ara Ẹdá Ọmọ Ènìyàn, mkusanyiko wa michoro yenye majina ya anatomia na muundo wa mwili wa binadamu na mimea ambayo hufanya kazi ya kushangaza kwenye kila sehemu ya mwili.

translation.en: He is a research fellow with the Firebird Foundation for Anthropological Research.
translation.sw: Yeye ni mshiriki wa utafiti katika shirika la Firebird Foundation for Anthropological Research.
