translation.en: The first recorded cases of Ebola occurred in 1976 near the Ebola River in DR of Congo.
translation.sw: Wagonjwa wa kwanza wa Ebola waripotiwa mwaka 1976 karibu na mto Ebola huko Jamhuri ya kidemokrasia ya Congo.

translation.en: According to the Centres for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), since then, the Ebola virus has emerged periodically from its natural reservoir (which remains unknown) to infect people in Africa.
translation.sw: Kwa mujibu wa Kituo cha Kuzuia na Kupambana na Magonjwa  (CDC), tangu wakati huo, kirusi cha Ebola kimekuwa  kikiibuka mara kwa mara kutoka kwenye chanzo asilia (ambacho hadi sasa hakijaweza kufahamika) na kupelekea watu barani Afrika kuugua ugonjwa huu.

translation.en: Ebola virus outbreaks since 1976.
translation.sw: Matukio ya mlipuko wa ugonjwa wa Ebola tangu mwaka 1976.

translation.en: Map from the Centres of Disease Prevention and Control
translation.sw: Picha ya ramani kutoka katika Kituo cha Kupambana na Kuuzua Magojwal

translation.en: Between 2014 and 2016 there were more than 28,600 recorded cases of Ebola within West Africa.
translation.sw: Kati ya mwaka 2014 na  2016 waliripotiwa zaidi ya watu  28,600 walioambukizwa ugonjwa wa Ebola Afrika Magharibi.

translation.en: According to a WHO 2015 report:
translation.sw: Kwa mujibu wa repoti ya WHO ya mwaka 2015:

translation.en: In October 2014, Senegal had one case of Ebola infection and zero death.
translation.sw: Mwaka 2014 Senegali ilikuwa na kisa kimoja cha maambukizi ya Ebola na bila ya kuripotiwa kifo chochote.

translation.en: WHO declared Nigeria's curtailment of the virus as a piece of world-class epidemiological detective work.
translation.sw: WHO ilitangaza kuwa hatua ya Nigeria ya kukabiliana na kirusi cha Ebola kama sehemu ya  ya kazi kubwa ya kukabiliana na ugonjwa hatari unaosambaa kwa haraka.

translation.en: In January 2015, Mali had 8 reported cases and 6 deaths.
translation.sw: Mwezi Januari 2015, Mali iliripotiwa kuwa na wagonjwa 8 wa Ebola na vifo 6.

translation.en: However, the most devastating cases occurred between March and June 2016 in three countries: Sierra Leone: over 14,000 cases and about 4,000 deaths; Liberia: about 10,000 cases and 3,000 deaths; Guinea:  3,800 cases and 2,500 deaths.
translation.sw: Hata hivyo, hali ilikuwa mbaya sana kati ya mwezi Machi na Juni2016 katika nchi tatu: Nchini Sierra Leone: zaidi ya watu 14,000 waliugua ugonjwa wa Ebola pamoja na vifo 4,000; Liberia: takribani watu 10,000 waliugua Ebola na 3,000 kupoteza maisha.Guinea: wangonjwa 3,800 na vifo 2,500.

translation.en: The global narrative on Ebola
translation.sw: Maelezo ya jumla kuhusu ugonjwa wa Ebola Kimataifa

translation.en: Ebola's ravaging of African countries generated global panic and hysteria in 2015 when two patients died in the United States and one each in Spain and Germany.
translation.sw: Ugonjwa wa Ebola ulioleta madhara makubwa katika nchi za Kiafrika ulizua taharuki na hofu mwaka 2015 pale wagonjwa wawili wa ebola waliporipotiwa kufariki nchini Marekani, mmoja Hispania na mwingine Ujerumani.

translation.en: GabyFleur Böl, a researcher at the Federal Institute for Risk Assessment in Berlin, Germany, identified other cases in Spain, Germany, the UK, Italy and Switzerland.
translation.sw: GabyFleur Böl, mtafiti katika Taasisi ya Tathmini ya Majanga ya jijini Berlin, Germany,  aliripoti  taarifa nyingine za wagonjwa wa Ebola katika nchi za Hispania, Ujerumani, Uingereza, Italia na Switzerland.

translation.en: At that time, an Ebola infection was considered a death sentence due to the lack of an effective treatment.
translation.sw: Kwa wakati huo, maambukizi ya Ebola yalichukuliwa kama hukumu ya kifo kutokana na ukosefu wa matibabu yenye tija.

translation.en: As  Böl asserted, the high mortality rate of Ebola and also the sometimesexaggerated media coverage of the epidemic created hysteria around the world.
translation.sw: Kama Böl alivyotangulia kusema, kasi kubwa ya vifo vinavyotokana na ugonjwa wa Ebola na  na pia /a> wakati mwingine taarifa za upotoshaji kupitia vyombo vya habari kuhusu Ebola zilichangia kuibua hofu duniani kote.

translation.en: This position was further corroborated by a 2017 study in which Hal Roberts, Brittany Seymour, Sands Alden Fish II, Emily Robinson and Ethan Zuckerman analyzed over 109,000 stories published in US mainstream/regional media and blogs between July to November 2014, with a focus on Ebola coverage.
translation.sw: Taarifa kama hizi zilichangiwa pia na 2017  utafiti ambao Hal Roberts, Brittany Seymour, Sands Alden Fish II, Emily Robinson na Ethan Zuckerman  walichambua  Zaidi ya makala 109,000 zilizochapishwa kwenye vyombo vikubwa vya habari na blogu nchini Marekani kati ya mwezi Julai na Novemba 2014, kiini cha uchambuzi kikiwa ni habari zilizohusu ugojwa wa Ebola.

translation.en: They discovered that three distinct peaks in Ebola coverage in the United States media and blogs occurred around July 27, September 28, and 15 October 2014:
translation.sw: Waligundua nyakati kuu tatu kuhusu habari za ugonjwa wa Ebola katika vyombo vikubwa vya habari na blogu nchini Marekani zilitokea Julai 27, Septemba 28, na  Octoba 15 mwaka 2014:

translation.en: On July 27, reports broke of the first infections of American doctors in Liberia.
translation.sw: Tarehe 27 Julai, iliripotiwa kwa mara ya kwanza kuwa madaktari kutoka Marekani wanaohudumu nchini Liberia waliambukizwa ugonjwa wa Ebola.

translation.en: On September 30, media widely reported the infection of Thomas Duncan in Texas as the first infection on US soil.
translation.sw: Tarehe 30 On Septemba, vyombo vya habari viliripoti kwa mapana kuhusu Thomas Duncan kuugua ugonjwa wa Ebola huko Texas na ikiwa ndio mara ya kwanza ugonjwa huo kuripotiwa nchini Marekani.

translation.en: On October 12, Ebola coverage intensified with the first infection of a health care worker in the United States.
translation.sw: Mwezi Oktoba tarehe 12, taarifa za mgonjwa wa Ebola ambaye ni ambaye ni mtoa huduma za afya zilisambamba kwa kina nchini Marekani.

translation.en: After October 12, a series of other US infection-related events led to continuous coverage that gradually lessened in intensity over time.
translation.sw: Baada ya tarehe 12 Oktoba,matuko mengine ya mlipo wa Ebola yaliripotiwa mfululizo hali iliyopelekea utipotiwaji wake kufifia siku hadi siku.

translation.en: US media may have covered Ebola so intensively because of the presence of the disease in the US.
translation.sw: Kuna uwezekano kuwa vyombo vya habari vya nchini Marekani vimeripoti sana kuhusu ugonjwa wa Ebola kwa sababu ya matukio ya uwepo wa ugonjwa huu nchini humo.

translation.en: In addition, with a more interconnected army of digital networks, the Ebola epidemic became more amplified in Europe and the US.
translation.sw: Pia, kutokana na urahisi wa upashanaji habari kutpia mitandao ya kijamii, ugonjwa wa Ebola umetokea kujadiliwa sana kwenye vyombo vya habari vya Ulaya na Marekani.

translation.en: However, what remains to be seen is if the discovery of a cure by an African from DR of Congo to this African epidemic will also garner as much coverage as it did in 2017.
translation.sw: Hata hivyo, kinachosubiriwa ni kuona ikiwa taarifa za dawa ya kutibu ugonjwa wa Ebola iliyogunduliwa na Mwafrika kutoka Jamhuri ya Kidemokrasia ya Congo inayotibu gonjwa hili la Kiafrika itapewa nafasi kwenye vyombo vya habari kama ilivyokuwa mwaka 2017.

translation.en: Erick Kabendera during a coaching session with journalists in 2012 in Dar es Salaam.
translation.sw: Erick Kabendera akitoa mafunzo kwa waandishi wa habari mwaka 2012, Dare s salaam.

translation.en: Photo by Pernille Baerendtsen, used with permission.
translation.sw: Picha na Pernille Baerendtsen, imetumika kwa ruhusa

translation.en: On July 29, six plainclothes policemen forcefully removed journalist Erick Kabendera from his home in Dar es Salaam, Tanzania, and took him into police custody.
translation.sw: Tarehe 29 Julai, askari kanzu 6 walimkamata kwa nguvu Erick Kabendera nyumbani kwake jijini Dar es Salaam, Tanzania na kumuweka mahabusu.

translation.en: Police say Kabendera had failed to obey a summons to investigate the status of his Tanzanian citizenship.
translation.sw: Polisi wanasema Kabendera amekaidi agizo la kujisalimisha mwenyewe kwa minajili ya kuchunguzwa juu ya uraia wake kama ni m-Tanzania.

translation.en: Over the last week, police searched Kabenderas home twice, confiscated his passport and other personal documents and interrogated his family.
translation.sw: Kwa wiki nzima iliyopita polisi walipekua nyumba ya kabendera mara mbili, wakanyanganya hati yake ya kusafiria, nyaraka zake nyingine binafsi na kuihoji familia yake.

translation.en: By August 5, authorities switched track, charging Kabendera with money laundering, tax evasion in the amount of $75,000 United States dollars, and criminal racketeering, according to a copy of the charge sheet obtained by the Committee to Protect Journalists.
translation.sw: Ilipofika tarehe 5 Agosti, mamlaka zikabadili hoja, Kabandera akashitakiwa kwa makosa ya utakatishaji wa fedha, kukwepa kulipa kodi kiasi cha Dola za Kimarekani 75,000, pamoja na kujihusisha na mtandao wa kiuhalifu.Makosa haya ni kwa mujibu wa hati ya mashitaka waliyonayo Shirika la Kutetea Waandishi wa Habari (CPJ).

translation.en: Police say Kabendera committed these crimes over a four-year period beginning in 2015.
translation.sw: Polisi wanasema Kabendera ametenda makosa haya kwa muda wa kipindi cha miaka minne sasa tangu mwaka 2015.

translation.en: With these charges, Kabendera may face up to 15 years in prison and can not seek bail.
translation.sw: Kwa mashitaka yanayomkabili Kabendera anaweza kukumbwa na hukumu ya mpaka miaka 15 jela na haruhusiwi kupata dhamana.

translation.en: Tanzania's Magufuli
translation.sw: Magufuli wa Tanzania

translation.en: First they abduct a journalist, when there is an outcry they claim he is not Tanzanian, when that doesn't stick, he is charged with organised crime and tax evasion.
translation.sw: Kwanza wamemteka mwandishi, walipoona kelele zimekuwa nyingi wakadai sio m-Tanzania, nalo limekosa mashiko, sasa anashtakiwa kwa makosa ya mtandao wa kiuhalifu na kukwepa kulipa kodi.

translation.en: People, meet Erick Kabendera, his crime is journalism.
translation.sw: Kutanana na Erick Kabendera, Kosa lake ni kuwa mwandishi wa habari.

translation.en: Press freedom has drastically deteriorated in Magufuli's Tanzania, CPJ reports.
translation.sw: Uhuru wa vyombo vya habari umezorota kwa kiwango kikubwa ndani ya kipindi hiki cha Tanzaniaya Magufuli inaripotiwa na CPJ.

translation.en: CPJ sub-Saharan Africa Representative Muthoki Mumo says:
translation.sw: Muwakilishi wa Taasisi ya Kuwatetea Waandishi wa Habari (CPJ) katika nchi za kusini mwa Sahara, Muthoka Mumo anasema:

translation.en: It seems that for the past week, authorities have been searching for a way to justify their detention of this critical freelance journalist.
translation.sw: Inaonekana kwamba kwa muda wote wa wiki iliyopita mamlaka zimekuwa zikitafuta namna ya kuthibitisha sababu za kumuweka kizuizini, mwandishi- huru huyu na mkosoaji.

translation.en: First, they claimed Erick Kabenderas citizenship was in question, today they have leveled drastically different charges, which call into question their motive for holding him.
translation.sw: Kwanza walidai walidai kwamba uraia wa Erick Kabendera hauleweki, leo hii wameongeza mashtaka mengine tofauti kabisa, ambayo yanafanya tujiuliza sababu ya nia ya wao kumshikilia.

translation.en: As a journalist, Kabendera has been critical of President John Magufulis administration and often speaks out in favor of press freedom.
translation.sw: Kama mwandishi wa habari Kabendera amekuwa akiukosoa utawala wa Rais John Magufuli na mara nyingi amekuwa akisimamia upande wa uhuru wa habari.

translation.en: He has reported on Tanzanias divisive politics for international and local media such as The Guardian, African Arguments and The East African.
translation.sw: Ameripoti kwenye vyombo vya habari vya ndani na vya kimataifa kama vile The Guardian, African Arguments na The East African kuhusu siasa za Tanzania na namna zinavyowagawa watu.

translation.en: Jebra Kambole, Kabenderas lawyer, says authorities also accused Kabendera of sedition for allegedly publishing an article titled John Magufuli is bulldozing Tanzanias freedom, in The Economist, but this charge was later dropped.
translation.sw: JJebra Kambole, ambaye ni wakili wa Kabendera anasema, malamka pia zilimshtumu Kabendera kwa kauli za uchochezi dhidi ya serikali kupitia makala yake iliyochapishwa kwenye gazeti la The Economist, yenye kichwa cha habari kisemacho  John Magufuli anakandamiza uhuru wa habari Tanzania.Hata hivyo mashtaka haya yaliondolewa baadae.

translation.en: Just in: Tanzanian Journalist Erick Kabendera to be charged with sedition over an article published in the Economist titled John Magufuli is bulldozing Tanzanias Freedom.Statement from Jebra Kambole states that Mr Kabendera has been denied bail.
translation.sw: Habari zilizonifikia hivi punde: mwandishi wa habari Erick Kabendera kushatakiwa kwa kauli za uchochezi dhidi ya serikali kutokana na makala iliyochapichwa kwenye gazeti la The economist, isemayo  John Magufuli anakandamiza uhuru wa Habari Tanzania maelezo kutoka kwa Zebra Kambole yanasema kwamba Bwana Kabendera amenyimwa dhamana.

translation.en: Citizenship targeted as tool for repression
translation.sw: Uraia umefanywa kama nyenzo ya kuwanyamazisha watu

translation.en: Kabenderas family says this is not the first time the Tanzanian government has questioned Kabenderas citizenship.
translation.sw: Familia ya kabendera inasema, hii siyo mara ya kwanza serikali kuuliza kuhusu uraia wa kabendera.

translation.en: In 2013, authorities lobbed a similar charge against him but the case was later dismissed, according to The Citizen.
translation.sw: Mwaka 2013 pia serikali ilimfungulia mashtaka yanayofanana na haya lakini kesi ilifutwa baadae, hili ni kwa mujibu wa The Citizen.

translation.en: Kabendera felt at the time that authorities called his citizenship into question as a way to silence him.
translation.sw: Kabendera kwa wakati ule aliona kwamba mamlaka zilitaka kutumia suala la kuchunguza uraia wake kama namna ya kumnyamazisha.

translation.en: Last year, The Citizen also reported on several other cases where the government used the citizenship question as a tool to silence critics in Tanzania.
translation.sw: Mwaka jana pia, gazeti la The Citizen liliripoti kesi kadhaaa ambazo serikali ilitumia suala la kuhoji uraiakama chombo cha kunyamazisha ukosoaji nchini Tanzania.

translation.en: Aidan Eyakuze, executive director of Twaweza, a civil society organization focused on citizen voices, says authorities confiscated his passport and banned him from travel while investigating Eyakuzes citizenship status.
translation.sw: Aidan Eyakuze, mkurugenzi mtendaji wa Twaweza, asasi ya kiraia, waliojikita kwenye sauti za Wananchi , alisema mamlaka zimemnyanganya hati yake ya kusafiria na kukatazwa kusafiri wakati uchunguzi wa uraia wake ukiendelea.

translation.en: Two weeks prior, Twaweza had issued and released results from a survey called Speaking truth to power?
translation.sw: Wiki mbili kabla ya tukio hilo, Twaweza walitoa taarifa ya matokeo ya utafiti ulioitwa Kusema ukweli kwa wenye madaraka?

translation.en: Citizens views on politics in Tanzania.
translation.sw: Maoni ya wananchi kwenye Siasa za Tanzania

translation.en: The Commission for Science and Technology (Costech) claimed the survey was unauthorized and threatened legal action but later dismissed the case, according to the same Citizen article.
translation.sw: Tume ya sayansi na teknolojia (Costech) ilidai kwamba utafiti huo haukuwa na kibali na ikatishia kuchukua hatua za kisheria lakini baadaye kesi ilifutwa, hii ni kwa mujibu wa makala hiyo hiyo ya gazeti la The Citizen.

translation.en: Tanzania has in recent years introduced a series of amendments and laws that target bloggers and media, civil society organizations, arts and cultural organizations and academics and researchers in what is by critical observers perceived as attempts to control Tanzania's narrative and stifle free speech and political dissent.
translation.sw: Katika miaka ya hivi karibuni Tanzania imeleta marekebisho mengi ya sheria zinazowalenga wablogu na vyombo vya habari , mashirika ya kiraia,, mashirika ya sanaa na utamaduni na pamoja na wanataaluma na watafiti hatua inayochukuliwa na wachunguzi wa mambo wanaoikosoa serikali kama jaribio la kudhibiti taarifa zinazosikika kutoka Tanzania na kuminya uhusu wa kujieleza na haki za kisiasa.

translation.en: Read more: Will Tanzanian bloggers pay up or push back against blogger tax'?
translation.sw: Soma zaidi:  Je, WanaBlogu wa Tanzania Wataridhia Kulipa au Watagomea Kodi ya Blogu'?

translation.en: Kabendera, who often mentors aspiring journalists, inspired this tweet from a former student:
translation.sw: Kabendera, ambaye mara nyingi amekuwa akiwafunza na kuwahamasisha waandishi wachanga, amemfanya aliyewahi kuwa mwanafunzi wake kutuma ujumbe huu kutoka mtandao wa twita:

translation.en: I have met Erick Kabendera once in my life, and for a little less than 80 minutes.
translation.sw: Nilikukutana na Erick Kabendera mara moja tu katika maisha yangu, na kwa muda usiozidi dakika 80.

translation.en: He came as a guest Tutor to my class (School of Journalism and Mass Communication- @UniofDar).
translation.sw: Alikuja kama mkufunzi aliyealikwa kuja kutufundisha (shule ya uandishi wa habari na mawasiliano kwa umma- @UniofDar).

translation.en: Despite the brief time he spent with us, I learned a lot from him.
translation.sw: Lakini pamoja na kuwa nasi kwa muda mfupi, nilijifunza mengi kutoka kwake.

translation.en: He truly inspired me!

translation.en: Another netizen notes that Kabendera's arrest and trumped-up charges signal a warning to other citizens:
translation.sw: Mtumiaji mwingine wa mtandaoni aanafikiri kukamatwa kwa Kabendera na kubambikiwa makosa ni alama ya tahadhari kwa wananchi wengine:

translation.en: I don't defend Kabendera because he's a Tanzanian or because he's a journalist.I defend him because I live in Tanzania where Erick lives.
translation.sw: SIMTETEI Kabendera Kwasababu Ni Mtanzania Au Sababu Ni Mwanahabari NAMTETEA Kwasababu Naishi Tanzania Anayoishi Erick.

translation.en: If rights are not granted to him today, and I stay silent, it's possible that tomorrow, rights will be denied to me also.
translation.sw: Haki Isipotendeka Kwake Leo Na Nikanyamaza, Inaweza Kesho Kutotendeka Kwangu VileVile.

translation.en: No one is safe when Injustice reigns.
translation.sw: Hakuna Aliye Salama Udhalimu Unapotawala

translation.en: I and we are (all) Ivan Golunov.
translation.sw: Mimi na sisi (Wote) ni Ivan Golunov.

translation.sw: Bendera iliyotolwa na Meduza, na kutumiwa kwa ruhusa

translation.en: : this Russian expression meaning boiling pointthe point when enough has become enoughis perhaps the best way to convey how an increasing number of Russians feel about the arrest of Ivan Golunov.
translation.sw: : Haya maelezo ya lugha ya Kirusi maana yake ni kiwango cha kuchemka kiwango ambacho kikifika inatosha inakuwa inatosha labda njia nzuri ni kuwasilisha namna idadi ya warusi walioguswa na kukamatwa kwa Ivan Golunov mwandishi mchunguzi maarufu inavyoongezeka.

translation.en: Golunov, a leading investigative journalist, was detained on June 6 in Moscow on what appear to be trumped-up charges of drug dealing and possession.
translation.sw: Alikamatwa tarehe 6 Juni Moscow kwa kile kinachoonekana  mashitaka ya kusingiziwa  ya kujihusisha na kumilki madawa ya kulevya.

translation.en: Golunov was arrested and initially denied access to a lawyer, in violation of Russian law.
translation.sw: Golunov alikamatwa na kukataliwa kuonana na mwanasheria jambo ambalo ni kinyumecha sheria za Urusi.

translation.en: His lawyer confirmed he sustained serious injuries while in custody.
translation.sw: Mwanasheria wake alithibitisha ana maumivu makali akiwa mahabusu .

translation.en: After being taken to hospital, he was discharged and placed under house arrest on June 8.
translation.sw: Baada ya kupelekwa hospitalini aliruhusiwa na kuwekwa kwanye nyumbe maalumu tarehe 8 Juni.

translation.en: The Russian police initially produced photos of a drug lab allegedly found when they searched in Golunovs flat, but the images were later retracted.
translation.sw: Mwanzoni Askari wa Urusi walionesha picha za maabara ya madawa ya kulevya zinazosadikiwa zilipigwa kwenye nyumba ya gorofa ya Golunov lakini baadaye picha hizo ziliondolewa.

translation.en: The pro-Kremlin media outlet Russia Today also confirmed that the pictures were not taken in Golunovs flat.
translation.sw: Pia chombo cha habari cha pro-Kremlin nchini Urusi leo  kimethibitisha kwamba picha zile hazikupigwa kwenye Gorofa za Golunov.

translation.en: The charges being leveled against Golunov could lead to a 10 to 20-year prison sentence.
translation.sw: Mashtaka aliyozushiwa Golunov yanaweza kumpelekea kupewa kifungo cha miaka 10 hadi 20 gerezani.

translation.en: Thirty-six-year-old Golunov works for Meduza, one of the few remaining independent Russian-language online media platforms.
translation.sw: Golunov mwenye maika 36 anafanya kazi  Meduza, moja ya mitandao ya jamii michache ya kuijitegemea inayotumia lugha ya Kirusi iliyobaki Urusi.

translation.en: Meduza is registered in neighboring Latvia, but maintains an office and several journalists in Moscow.
translation.sw: Meduza ilisajiliwa katika nchi jirani ya Latvia, lakini ina ofisi na waandishi wa habari wachache nchini Urusi .

translation.en: Golunov has led and published several investigations pointing at cases of corruption involving high-ranking officials.
translation.sw: Golunov ameongoza kuchapisha uchunguzi wa matukio kadhaa ya rushwa yanayowahusisha viongozi wa ngazi za juu.

translation.en: Since Golunovs arrest, Meduza has released Golunovs articles under a Creative Commons license and has encouraged media outlets and individuals to republish the stories, an initiative fully supported by Global Voices.
translation.sw: Tangu Golunov akamatwe, Meduza imekuwa ikitoa makala za Golunov chini ya leseni ya creative commons na imehamasisha vyombo vya habari na watu binafsi  kuzichapisha tena habari hizo, jambo ambalo limeungwa mkono kwa nguvu na Global Voices.

translation.en: Among his most important reports are ones detailing how Moscows deputy mayor Pyotr Biryukov channeled state contracts to his family, and how Moscow's urban beautification program involved inflated budgets.
translation.sw: Miongoni mwa habari muhimu alizochapisha ni kuhusu makamu Meya Pyotr Biryukov alivyopitisha miradi kwa ajili ya familia yake  na namna mradi wa kuifanya moscow kuwa mji wa kuvutia ulivyokuwa na bajeti iliyozidi makadirio.

translation.en: The story he was working on just before his detention focused on the monopoly of funeral services in Moscow.
translation.sw: Habari aliyokuwa anashughulika nayo kabla hajakamatwa ilikuwa inahusu ukiritimba wa huduma za mazishi katika Moscow.

translation.en: Golunov's arrest has sparked a rare expression of solidarity among not only journalists, activists and lawyers, but also actors, popular singers, and figures from outside the liberal circles of Moscow and Saint Petersburg.
translation.sw: Kukamatwa kwa Golunov kumechochea kauli za mshikamano ambazo zilikuwa nadra miongoni mwa waandishi wa habari, wanaharakati na wanasheria na hata waimbaji maarufu na watu maarufu nje ya Mscow na Petersburg Mtakatifu.

translation.en: On June 10, three leading newspapers agreed to publish editions with identical front pages in support of Golunov.
translation.sw: Tarehe 10 Juni, magazeti matatu makuu yalikubaliana kuchapisha matoleo yanayomuunga mkono Golunov katika  kurasa za mbele.

translation.en: The newspapers were sold out in record time.
translation.sw: Magazeti yaliuzwa na kuweka rekodi mpya.

translation.en: In a rather ironic u-turn, pro-Kremlin media, including Channel One, Russias most-viewed TV channel, are also calling for a fair investigation.
translation.sw: Katika hali isiyo ya kawaida vyombo vya habari vya pro-Kremlin pamoja na Channel One,   ambavyo vina watanzamaji wengi vinaomba kuwepo na uchunguzi ulio wa haki.

translation.en: June 12 marks Russia Day, when public marches and demonstrations approved by local authorities will take place.
translation.sw: Tarehe 12 Juni  itakuwa ni  siku ya Urusi, ambapo matembezi na maandamano  ya umma yaliyoruhusiwa na serikali za mitaa yatafanyika.

translation.en: Under Russian law, public demonstrations require a permit.
translation.sw: Kwa sheria za urusi, maandamano ya umma yanahitaji ruhusa.

translation.en: Golunovs supporters have announced they will hold their own march without obtaining official permission.
translation.sw: Watu wanaomuunga mkono Golunov wametangaza kuwa watakuwa na matembezi yao wenyewe bila ya kupata ruhusa rasmi.

translation.en: Kremlin observers say the Russian government is seeking to lift the charges against the journalist before June 20.
translation.sw: Waangalizi wa Kremlin wanasema serikali ya Urusi inaangalia kuondoa mashtaka dhidi ya mwandishi wa habari huyo  kabla ya tarehe 20 Juni.

translation.en: On that day, President Vladimir Putin, whose ratings have fallen to a historical low in the country, will host the Direct Line, his annual talk show where he takes questions from citizens by telephone and online media.
translation.sw: Siku ambayo Rais  Vladimir Putin ambaye viwango vyake vimeshuka katika historia  nchini, atakuwa anaongea na  simu moja kwa moja  katika kipindi cha kuongea na umma kwa mwaka ambapo anapokea maswali kutoka kwa wananchi kwa simu na mitandao ya kijamii.

translation.en: Kenyan writer Binyavanga Wainaina at the Brooklyn Book Fest, 2009.
translation.sw: Mwandishi Mkenya Binyavanga Wainaina akiwa kwenye sherehe ya Kitabu Brooklyn, mwaka 2009.

translation.en: Wainaina, 48, passed away on Tuesday, May 22, in Nairobi, Kenya.
translation.sw: Wainaina aliyekuwa na miaka 48, alifariki Jumanne tarehe 22 Mei katika Mji wa Nairobi, Kenya.

translation.en: Photo via Nightscream, CC BY 3.0 via Wikimedia Commons.
translation.sw: Picha na Nightscream, CC  3.0 na Wikimedia Commons.

translation.en: Its been a little over 24 hours since Kenyan writer Binyavanga Wainaina left this world, but his presence and impact continues to reverberate around the globe.
translation.sw: Ni masaa 24 tu tangu  Binyavanga Wainaina Mwandish Mkenya kutoweka katika ulimwengu huu, lakini uwepo na athari yake vinaendelea kurindima duniani kote.

translation.en: The outspoken, openly gay writer rebuked convention and challenged the status quo, triggering a literary revolution that would open the door to thousands of aspiring writers ready to change the narratives in and about Africa.
translation.sw: Msema kweli, mwandishi shoga mu-wazi  alilaumu mapatano na kutia changamoto serikali akichokoza kwa uandishi wa kimapinduzi ambao ungefungua mlango kwa maelfu ya waandishi wanaotamani kubadilika katika kuandika na kuelezea namna Afrika ilivyo.

translation.en: The writer, educator and LGBTQ activist, Binyavanga Wainaina, 48, passed on Tuesday, May 22, in Nairobi, Kenya, after a brief illness.
translation.sw: Mwandishi, mwalimu na mwanaharakati wa LGBTQ, Binyavanga Wainaina mwenye umri wa miaka 48, alifariki siku ya Jumanne tarehe 22, Mei, Nairobi, Kenya, baada ya kuugua kwa muda mfupi.

translation.en: Today's got me thinking: what will your life mean when it's all over?
translation.sw: Leo nimefikiria: Maisha yako yatakuwa na maana gani yanapoondoka?

translation.en: Binyavanga's death has got me thinking about who I was about five or so years ago, and also who he was to us as young enthusiastic Africans hungry for a different paradigm of our continent and our selves.
translation.sw: Kifo cha Binyavanga kimenifanya nifikirie kuhusu nilivyokuwa miaka mitano au mingi iliyopita na pia alikuwaje kwetu kama kijana mwenye tashwishi shauku na njaa ya mabadiliko mbalimbali juu ya bara letu na kwetu pia.

translation.en: Fungai Machirori (@fungaijustbeing) May 22, 2019
translation.sw: Fungai Machirori (@fungaijustbeing) May 22, 2019

translation.en: Within minutes, Wainainas friends, followers and admirers flooded social media to swap tributes and memories while arguing which of his prolific writings had the most influence.
translation.sw: Kwa dakika chache, rafiki, wafuasi  na mashabiki wake Wainanina walifurika kwenye mitandao ya kijamii wakibadilishana kumbukumbu na shukrani na kujadili maandiko yake mengi yenye mvuto sana

translation.en: Wainaina is best known for his provocative essay, How to Write About Africa, published in Granta magazine in 2006.
translation.sw: Wainaina anajulikana sana kwa makala zake za kuchokoza , Namna ya kuandika kuhusu Afrika, iliyochapishwa katika gazeti la  mwaka 2006.

translation.en: He's also known for his 2012 memoir, One Day I Will Write About This Place, and the essay, I am a homosexual, mum, published simultaneously in Chimurenga and Africa is a Country in 2014.
translation.sw: Pia, anajulikana kwa kitabu chake cha kumbukumbu ya maisha yake cha mwaka 2012, Siku moja Nitaandika kuhusu sehemu hii, na makala ya  Mama, Mimi ni basha, iliyochapishwa Chimurenga, sambamba na Afrika ni Nchi kilichochapishwa mwaka 2014.

translation.en: The essay caused a powerful stir on Twitter as people tried to parse fact from fiction, and subsequently, Time magazine named Wainaina one of the top 100 most influential people in the world.
translation.sw: Makala hiyo ilichangamsha sana kwenye mtandao wa Twitter kwa sababu watu walijaribu kuonesha ukweli na magazeti walimuita Wainaina kuwa ni  mmoja wa watu 100 mashuhuri wa kushawishi  ulimwenguni

translation.en: In How to Write About Africa, Wainaina called out Western media and the aid industry  both particularly present in Nairobi  for perpetuating negative stereotypes about the continent of Africa, through scathing satire.
translation.sw: Katika makala ya Namna ya kuielezea Afrika, Wainaina aliviita vyombo vya habari vya magharibi na misaada ya viwanda   vyote vilivyopo Nairobi  kuwa vinaendeleza ubaguzi usiofaa juu ya bara la Afrika kwa kutumia dhihaka na kejeli kubwa.

translation.en: Never have a picture of a well-adjusted African on the cover of your book, or in it, unless that African has won the Nobel Prize.
translation.sw: Usije ukajaribu kuweka picha ya mwafrika mzuri juu ya jalada la kitabu au ndani yake isipokuwa huyo mwafrika awe ameshinda tuzo ya Nobel.

translation.en: An AK-47, prominent ribs, naked breasts: use these.
translation.sw: Bunduki aina AK-47, midomo mizuri, matiti wazi:tumia hivi.

translation.en: If you must include an African, make sure you get one in Masai or Zulu or Dogon dress.
translation.sw: Kama utalazimika kujumuisha mwafrika, uhakikishe unampata kutoka Masai au Zulu au nguo ya Dogon.

translation.en: His sarcasm was dripping  a stellar scalpel, writes Nigerian writer Nwachukwu Egbunike.
translation.sw: Kijembe chake kilikuwa Kisu kidogo kikali, anaandika mwandishi Mnaijeria Nwachukwu Egbunike.

translation.en: Widely cited by academics, non-governmental organizations and aid workers, the essay   also published as a small booklet  has had a profound impact on perceptions of Africa and continues to circulate, surprise and provoke.
translation.sw: Makala au kitabu chake kilichonukuliwa sana na wanataaluma, mashirika yasiyo ya kiserikali na wafanyakazi wa kutoa misaada kimekuwa na matokeo makubwa ya uelewa juu ya Afrika na matokeo hayo yanaendelea kuzungunguka, kushangaza na kukasirisha.

translation.en: On its impact, journalist Pernille Bærendtsen writes:
translation.sw: Kuhusu matokeo yake, mwanadishi Pernille Bærendtsen anaandika:

translation.en: For me, this essay has followed me since I received it as a gift in 2008 by a Kenyan friend.
translation.sw: Kwangu mimi, makala imenifuata tangu nilipoletewa kama zawadi mwaka 2008 na rafiki yangu Mkenya.

translation.en: I clearly belonged to the group of people Binyavanga addressed: A development worker employed by a Danish NGO in Tanzania writing about its impact.
translation.sw: Hakika mimi ni mmoja wa watu waliohutubiwa na Binyavanga: Mfanyakazi wa ustawi wa maendeleo aliyeajiriwa nchini Tanzania na shirika la Denmark lilisilo la serikali aliandika kuhusu matokeo ya makala hiyo.

translation.en: This was at a point when the development and aid industry sharpened its rhetoric in favor of fundraising at the cost of unfolding the contrasting diversity on the ground.
translation.sw: Huo ulikuwa wakati maendeleo na misaada ya viwanda vikiongezeka ufanisi wake ili kupata harambee kwa ajili ya badiliko ya gharama yaliyokuwa yanajitokeza.

translation.en: I had plenty of reason to feel embarrassed, but I also had time to plan how to change.
translation.sw: Nilikuwa na sababu nyingi za kujisikia aibu, lakini pia nilikuwa na muda wa kupanga namna ya kubadilika.

translation.en: Binyavanga later explained in the journal Bidoun how this essay randomly came to life with double-effect: By exposing and describing the insecurity of novelists, NGO workers, rock musicians, conservationists, students, and travel writers, who read these guidelines on how  or maybe rather how not to  write about Africa, they then began to ask for his approval.
translation.sw: Baadaye Binyavanga alielezea katika jarida la Bidoun namna makala hii ilivyotokea tu katika maisha na athari mbili: Kwa kuweka wazi na kuelezea hatari juu ya waandishi wa liwaya, wafanyakazi wa mashirika yasiyo ya kiserikali, wanamusiki, wahifadhi, wanafunzi na waandishi wanaosafiri ambao wanasoma haya maelekezo ya namna  au hata namna ya kutoandika kuhusu Afrika, huanza kuomba idhini yake.

translation.en: Wainaina, a son of a Kenyan father and Ugandan mother, continued to challenge stereotypes about Africa with his groundbreaking 2012 memoir, One Day I Will Write About This Place.
translation.sw: Wainaina alikuwa mtoto wa kiume wa baba mkenya na mama mganda, aliendelea kuhoji udanganyifu unaoelezwa juu ya Afrika hasa kupitia jarida la kumbukumbu la maisha yake liliovuma mwaka 2012 lililojulikana kama Siku moja nitaandika kuhusu  mahali hapa.

translation.en: Through rich, searing detail, he transported readers from his childhood in the 70s in Kenya to his student days in South Africa, where he spent many years in exile.
translation.sw: Ikiwa na taarifa kemkem, iliwavutia wasomaji kuanzia utoto wake katika miaka ya 1970 akiwa Kenya na kipindi akiwa mwanafunzi huko Afrika ya Kusini ambapo alikaa miaka mingi akiwa uhamishoni.

translation.en: Critics hailed the book as raw and honest, but Wainaina later admitted that hed left out an important chapter  his love life.
translation.sw: Ukosoaji ulisifia kitabu hicho kama halisi na kweli, lakini baadaye Wainaina alikiri kuwa alikuwa amesahau sura muhimu  upendo wa maisha yake.

translation.en: With I am a homosexual, mum, Wainaina became the first high-profile Kenyan to come out as openly gay on social media, triggering an avalanche of social opinion.
translation.sw: Mama, mimi ni shoga, Wainaina alikuwa mkenya wa kwanza mwenye hadhi ya juu na kuwa mu-wazi kwa kutamka kwenye mitandao ya kijamii, na kuamsha maoni lundo kutoka kwa jamii.

translation.en: Considered the lost chapter from his memoir.
translation.sw: Ikaonekana ni sura iliyopotea katika kumbukumbu ya maisha yake.

translation.en: Wainaina imagines coming out as gay to his dying mother.
translation.sw: Wainaina aliona aseme kuwa yeye ni shoga kwa mama yake alikuwa anakaribia kufa.

translation.en: His essay was timely as a wave of anti-gay crusades and legislation were being proposed in Uganda and later Tanzania, where homosexual acts remain criminalized.
translation.sw: Makala yake ilifika kwa muda muafaka kama kampeni dhidi ya mkutano mkubwa wa kupambana na ushoga na sheria dhidi ya ushoga ilikuwa imependekezwa nchini Uganda na baadae Tanzania ambapo vitendo vya ushoga ni jinai.

translation.en: Read more: Tanzania's stance on homosexuality points to an increasingly repressive political agenda
translation.sw: Soma zaidi: Msimamo wa Tanzania kuhusu ushoga kuzima agenda ya kisiasa

translation.en: However, unlike other writers who went into exile, Wainaina returned home, and as Nanjala Nyabola points out for BBC on Twitter, that was major:
translation.sw: Hata hivyo, tofauti na waandishi wengine waliokuwa uhamishoni,  Wainaina alirudi nyumbani kama Nanjala Nyabola anavyoelezea BBC kupitia Twitter, anasema hiyo ilikuwa muhimu:

translation.en: For those of us who grew up with "the best Kenyan writers" (whatever that means) living in exile, jailed and persecuted, or poor and under appreciated, or censored heavily, he came back and that was major.
translation.sw: Kwa wale miongoni mwetu ambao walikua pamoja na  waandishi maarufu wa kikenya wanaoishi uhamishoni, waliotiwa gerezani, maskini au wasiopongezwa au kukataliwa vibaya mno, yeye alirudi nyumbani na hilo lilikuwa jambo muhimu sana .

translation.en: He was a complex man, but I think for this he deserves endless gratitude.
translation.sw: Alikuwa mtu asiyeleweka lakini kwa hili anastahili shukrani daima.

translation.en: We must free our imaginations
translation.sw: Tunatakiwa kusema fikra zetu

translation.en: While Binyavanga ironically attracted admiration from the diverse international crowd he criticized, at home he felt the pressure of not fitting the set frames.
translation.sw: Wakati Binyavanga kiukweli alipata kupendwa na makundi mbalimbali wa kimataifa, nyumbani alikosoa na alikumbana na shinikizo  la kutostahili katika misingi iliyowekwa.

translation.en: Binyavanga demanded free space and imagination.
translation.sw: Binyavanga alidai nafasi ya uhuru wa kuongea na kutoa fikra.

translation.en: Courageously  within a growing community supportive of LGBTQ  he insisted on bending those frames.
translation.sw: Kwa ujasiri  katika jumuia inayokuwa inayowezeshwa na LGBTQ  alisistiza juu ya kupindisha misingi ile

translation.en: In response to all the noise and pushback, that same year Wainaina produced We Must Free Our Imaginations, a six-part Youtube series detailing his ideas on freedom and the imagination.
translation.sw: Katika kujibu kelele na majibu mengine, mwaka huo huo Wainaina aliandika Tunatakiwa kusema fikra zetu, kwenye Yuotube ukiwa ujumbe wenye sehemu sita zilizofuatana zikibeba fikra zake juu ya uhuru na fikra.

translation.en: I want to live a life of a free imagination, he declared in Part 1.
translation.sw: Ninahitaji kuishi maisha ya uhuru wa fikra, alieleza katika sehemu ya kwanza.

translation.en: I want this generation of young parents to have their kids see Africans writing their own stories  that simple act is the most political act one can have.
translation.sw: Ninaomba kizazi hiki cha wazazi vijana kuwa na vijana wanaona waafrika wakiandika habari zao wenyewe  tendo hilo rahisi ni tendo la kisiasa muhimu ambalo kila mmoja anapaswa kuwa nalo.

translation.en: I want to see a continent where every kind of persons imagination does not have to look for  being allowed.
translation.sw: Nina wiwa kuliona bara ambapo kila aina ya fikra za mtu hazitakiwi mpaka ziruhusiwe.

translation.en: I am a Pan-Africanist, I want to see this continent change.
translation.sw: Mimi ni mwafrika wa waafrika wote, ninahitaji kuona bara hili likibadilika.

translation.en: Wainaina often channeled his desire for change through his literary activism, education and leadership.
translation.sw: Mara kwa mara Wainaina alipitsha shauku lake la madiliko kupitia uandishi wake, elimu na uongozi.

translation.en: In 2002, after winning the prestigious Caine Prize for his essay, Discovering Home, he used the award money to co-found Kwani?
translation.sw: Mwaka 2002, baada ya kushinda tuzo bora ya Caine kwa makala yake ya kugundua nyumbani,  alitumia fedha ya tuzo hiyo kushirikiana  kuanzisha Kwani?

translation.en: a literary magazine promoting new voices and new ideas emerging from across the continent.
translation.sw: Gazeti lenye lengo la kuendeleza sauti  na fikra mpya zinazoibuka barani kote.

translation.en: Kwani?
translation.sw: Kwani?

translation.en: evolved over time into a publishing house and literary network that connected emerging and established writers from Lagos to Nairobi, Mogadishu to Accra.
translation.sw: iliendelea kwa muda likichapishwa na kuwa na mtandao ukiwaunganisha waandishi kutoka Lagos to Nairobi, Mogadishu hadi Accra.

translation.en: Read more:We are working to prevent explosions': Spoken word in East Africa
translation.sw: Soma zaidi:Tunafanya kazi kuzuia milipuko': Neno la kuzungumzwa katika Afrika Mashariki

translation.en: While he unapologetically shook Kenyan social convention  coming out as gay, and later revealing his HIV+ status on Twitter on World AIDS Day in 2016  it often came with backlash, struggle and pain.
translation.sw: Wakati alitikisa bila huruma mikataba ya kijamii Kenya   alivyojitokeza hadharani kuwa ni shoga na baadaye kuweka wazi kuwa ana virusi vya ukimwi kupitia Twitter siku ya UKIMWI duniani mwaka 2016  mara nyingi ilileta maumivu, kushindana na it often came with backlash, struggle and pain.

translation.en: Wainaina was a controversial person who struggled with depression and often wrestled with his complicated role as a public figure.
translation.sw: Wainaina alikuwa mtu  mtata ambaye alipambana akiwa na msongo na mara nyingi alipigana sana kutokana na  kuwa mtu mashuhuri shoga lilionekana ni jukumu lake tata katika jamii kama mtu wa watu.

translation.en: He had his fans but he also faced critics like prominent Kenyan writer Shailja Patel, who accused Wainaina of toxic lesbophobia.
translation.sw: Alikuwa na mashabiki lakini alikumbana na ukosoaji kutoka kwa mwandishi mashuhuri Shailja Patel, ambaye alimshtumu Wainaina kuwa mtu mwenye sumu ya kuwachukia watu wa jinsia moja wenye mahusiano ya kimapenzi.

translation.en: Twitter user Néo Músangi grapples with the fallibility of Wainaina's character in this tweet:
translation.sw: Mtumiaji wa Twitter, Néo Músangi anasimulia mapungufu ys tabia ya Wainaina katika ujumbe wake kupitia Twitter:

translation.en: i do not have sufficient energy to engage now but, i am grieving binya, as the dearest of my friends in all my queerness and feminist-ing.
translation.sw: Sina nguvu za kutosha lakini ninamlilia Binya kama rafiki yangu kipenzi katika ugeni na utetezi wangu.

translation.en: I  am eternally sorry that he hurt others.
translation.sw: Ninasikitika sana kwamba aliumiza wengine.

translation.en: I am sorry that he human-ed in those ways.
translation.sw: Ninasikitika kwamba alikosea kama binadamu.

translation.en: He would hate us sanitising him.
translation.sw: Angetuchukia tukimsafisha.

translation.en: Writer Bwesigye Mwsigire, director of the Writivism Festival in Uganda, also addressed these contradictions in a Facebook tribute:
translation.sw: Mwandishi Bwesigye Mwsigire, mkurugenzi wa Writivism Festival nchini Uganda, pia  alielezea mkanganyiko huu   kupitia Facebook:

translation.en: His style was a transgression.
translation.sw: mtindo wake wa maisha ilikuwa ni tatizo.

translation.en: Beautiful and freeing transgression.
translation.sw: Nzuri na kuachia makosa.

translation.en: [T]he people we obsess over because of their work and ideas are people after all.
translation.sw: Watu tunaoshikilia kwa sababu ya kazi na mawazo yao ni watu tu.

translation.en: They are human.
translation.sw: Ni binadamu.

translation.en: Are we ever ready to love them in their complexity?
translation.sw: Tupo tayari kuwapenda katika changamoto zao Are we ever ready to love them in their complexity?

translation.en: By now, a lot has been said about him.
translation.sw: Kwa sasa, mengi yamezungumzwa juu yake.

translation.en: There's no need to repeat what has been said.
translation.sw: hakuna haja ya kurudia yaliyosemwa.

translation.en: Reminders of harm that he supported have been sounded.
translation.sw: Watu wamekumbusha maumivu aliyo.

translation.en: This doesn't take away the pain one feels about his death.
translation.sw: Hii aiondoi maumivu mtu anayoyasikia kwa kifo chake.

translation.en: There is only one Binyavanga Wainaina.
translation.sw: Kuna Binyavanga Wainaina mmoja tu.

translation.en: He is an ancestor now.
translation.sw: Ni mhenga kwa sasa.

translation.en: Let us celebrate his life.
translation.sw: Tusherehekee maisha yake.

translation.en: A creative genius
translation.sw: Kipaji cha udadisi

translation.en: Kenyan activist Boniface Mwangi wrote on Twitter that after writing a Facebook tribute to Wainaina, hateful, homophobic comments derailed his message:
translation.sw: Mwanaharakati Mkenya Boniface Mwangi atuma ujumbe kupitia Twitter baada ya kutuma ujumbe wa kusifia Wainaina kupitia Facebook; chuki na maoni ya ushoga zilifuata ujumbe wake.

translation.en: Wainaina was a creative genius who must be remembered:
translation.sw: Wainaina alikuwa mtu mwenye kipaji cha udadisi ambaye inapaswa akumbukwe:

translation.en: I did a very short Facebook post on #RIPBinyavanga and the comments https://t.co/yZ3MoWBnD7 are the vilest l have ever read.
translation.sw: Nilituma ujumbe mfupi kupitia Facebook juu ya kifo cha Binyavanga, #RIPBinyavanga kulikuwa na maoni mabaya na aibu sana sijawahi kusoma.

translation.en: Even the thieves who steal our taxes and kill people don't get as much hate.
translation.sw: Hata wezi ambao hutuibia kodi na kuua watu hawapati chuki kubwa kama ile.

translation.en: Truth is, Binya was a creative genius and he will be read and be remembered.
translation.sw: Ukweli ni, Binya alikuwa na akili na kipaji cha udadisi na ataendelea kusomwa na kukumbukwa

translation.en: Ugandan feminist and writer Rosebell Kagumire distills the lessons she learned from Wainainas courage to speak out:
translation.sw: Mganda ambaye ni mtetezi wa haki za akina mama na mwandishi Rosebell Kagumire alitonesha kile alichojifunza kutoka kwa ushupavu wa Wainaina wa kusema wazi:

translation.en: Do not allow the fear.
translation.sw: Msiruhusu woga.

translation.en: Don't limit yourself.
translation.sw: Msijizuie ninyi wenyewe.

translation.en: Do speak that which needs to be said.
translation.sw: Ongeeni kile kinachohitajika kusemwa.

translation.en: Better yet write it down.
translation.sw: Kizurikiandikeni.

translation.en: Live your truth and with your heart.
translation.sw: Ishi ukweli wako na kwa moyo wako.

translation.en: That when you finally finally breathe your last there will be millions of words you brought so much meaning into.#RIPBinyavanga
translation.sw: Pale ambapo utapumua pumzi yako ya mwisho kutakuwa na maneno milioni yenye maana sana uliyoyatoa kwa Binyavanga

translation.en: Through his life and letters, he gave himself and countless others the permission to imagine life as it could be otherwise, and his sudden passing inspired poetic musings:
translation.sw: Kupitia maisha  na maandishi yake alijitoa na kuwafanya wengine idhini ya kuona maisha kivingine, na kifo chake cha ghafla kinaashiria misuri ya mashairi Through his life and letters, he gave himself and countless others the permission to imagine life as it could be otherwise, and his sudden passing inspired poetic musings:

translation.en: One day I will write about your gorgeous hair
translation.sw: Siku moja nitaandika juu ya nywele zako za kupendeza

translation.en: One day I will write about your laughter
translation.sw: Siku moja nitaandika juu ya kicheko chako

translation.en: One day I will write about your ungovernability
translation.sw: Siku moja nitaandika juu ya kutotawalika kwako

translation.en: One day I will write about your delight in imagination
translation.sw: Siku moja nitaandika juu ya uwezo wako wa kufikiri

translation.en: One day I will write about your refusals
translation.sw: Siku moja nitaandika juu ya kukataa kwako

translation.en: Today, I write thank you
translation.sw: Leo naandika asante

translation.en: Kenyan writer Yvonne Adhiambo Owuor, author of Dust, and literary friend to Wainaina, calls out with a final lament:
translation.sw: Mkenya Yvonne Adhiambo Owuor ambaye ni mwandishi wa habari na mwandishi wa Dust, na kwa kweli rafiki wa Wainaina, anahitimisha kwa maombolezo ya mwisho:

translation.en: Who told you could leave?
translation.sw: Nani alikuambia uondoke?

translation.en: Sneak out of your body at night without leaving a new address?
translation.sw: kutoka kwenye mwili wako usiku bila kuacha anuani mpya?

translation.en: Face tilted, eyes piercing, he said, "You have exactly 3 seconds to reorganise this crap."
translation.sw: Uso umeinama, macho yanachoma, alisema, Una sekunde 3 tu za kurekebisha manung'uniko wewe kule.

translation.en: You, there. You! Who told you you could leave?
translation.sw: Wewe nani alikuambia uondoke?

translation.en: Sneak out of your body at night without leaving a new address?
translation.sw: Kutoka mwilini mwako bila kuacha anuani mpya?

translation.en: To whom does one now go in fear and trembling with first draft manuscripts?
translation.sw: Ni kwa nani mtu anaweza kwenda kwa hofu na kutetemeka akiwa maandishi ya kujaribia?

translation.en: Now that he's among the stars, you can join Planet Binya with a full archive of his work.
translation.sw: Sasa yeye ni miongoni mwa watu mashuhuri, unaweza kuungana na sayari ya Binya ukiwa na kumbukumb kubwa ya kazi yake.

translation.en: Front page of newspaper Jornal de Angola on the tender won by the company Telstar.
translation.sw: Ukurasa wa mbele wa gazeti la de Angola kuhusu zabuni iliyoshinda ya kampuni ya Telstar.

translation.en: Taken by Dércio Tsandzana, 19 April 2019 and used with permission
translation.sw: iiliyopigwa na Dércio Tsandzana, tarehe 19 Aprili 2019 na kwa idhini

translation.en: The Angolan president João Lourenço cancelled, on 18 Abril, the public tender for the fourth mobile phone operator in the country, arguing that the winner Telstar did not meet the necessary requirements to deliver the service.
translation.sw: Rais wa Angola João Lourenço tarehe 18 Aprili alifuata zabuni ya serikali kwa ajili ya mwendesha simu za mkononi katika nchi hiyo, akisema kwamba mshindi wa zabuni Telstar hakukidhi vigezo muhimu vinavyohitajika kutoa huduma hiyo.

translation.en: The presidents decision could indicate divisions in the Angolan government.
translation.sw: Maamuzi ya Rais yanaweza kuonesha mgawanyiko katika serikali ya Angola.

translation.en: The company Telstar was created in January 2018 with a capital stock of 200,000 Kwanza (around 600 US dollars), and its shareholders are the general Manuel João Carneiro (90 per cent) and the businessman António Cardoso Mateus (10 per cent), according to the Portuguese newspaper Observador.
translation.sw: Kampuni ya Telstar ilianzishwa Januari 2018 ikiwa na mtaji wa kwanza 200,000 (kama dola za kimarekani 600), na wadau wake wakubwa ni Manuel João Carneiro (asilimia 90) na mfanyabiashara António Cardoso Mateus (asilimia 10), taarifa hii ni kutokana na gazeti la  Portuguese Observador.

translation.en: Manuel João Carneiros rank was awarded by the previous president José Eduardo dos Santos, according to the Angolan online news outlet Club Net.
translation.sw: Kutokana na taarifa mtandao wa Angola, ushindi wa Manuel João Carneiro ulitolewa na Rais aliyemaliza muda wake Eduardo dos Santos.

translation.en: The Observador reported that 27 companies participated in the tendering process opened by the Ministry of Telecommunications and Information Technology, under José Carvalho da Rocha.
translation.sw: Gazeti la Observador lilitaarifu kwamba makampuni 27 yalishiriki katika mchakato wa kuomba zabuni ulifunguliwa na Wizara ya mawasiliano na Teknolojia ya habari chini ya José Carvalho da Rocha.

translation.en: On 25 April, João Lourenço signed an order which establishes new rules for opening the new invitation to tender, according to the newspaper Jornal de Angola.
translation.sw: Kutokana na gazeti la Angola tarehe 25 Aprili, João Lourenço alisaini taratibu ambazo ziliweka sheria mpya kwa ajili ya kufungua mwaliko wa zabuni.

translation.en: After the results of the first tender were made public, many Angolans questioned the integrity of the process.
translation.sw: Baada ya matokeo ya zabuni ya kwanza kuwekwa wazi kwa umma, wananchi wengi wa Angola walihoji uadilifu katika mchakato huo.

translation.en: Some, for example, highlighted that winner Telstar did not even have a website.
translation.sw: Wengine walikwenda mbali kwa kusema kwamba mshindi Telstar hajawahi kuwa na tovuti.

translation.en: Skit Van Darken, an editor and event organizer, said on Facebook:
translation.sw: Haya yalisemwa na Skit Van Darken, mhariri na muongozaji wa vipindi kupitia Facebook:

translation.en: Telstar  Telecommunications, Ltd, formed on 26 January 2018, with capital of 200,000 Kwanzas according to the [newspaper] Diário da República, whose shareholders are the general Manuel João Carneiro (90 per cent of the capital), in retirement, and António Cardoso Mateus (10 per cent).
translation.sw: Telstar  Telecommunications, Ltd, ilianzishwa tarehe 26 Januari 2018, na mtaji wa Kwanza 200,000 kutokana na gazeti la Diário da República, ambalo wadau wake ni  the general Manuel João Carneiro (asilimia 90) na  António Cardoso Mateus (asilimia 10).

translation.en: The majority shareholder has links to the company Mundo Startel, a limited liability company, registered at INACOM, the telecommunications regulator, with a landline licence, although expired.
translation.sw: Mshikadau mkubwa ana uhusiano na kampuni ya Mundo Startel, kampuni yenye dhima inayojitosheleza, iliyosajiliwa INACOM, mdhibiti wa mawasiliano akiwa na leseni ingawa imeshapita muda wake.

translation.en: A company that doesnt even have a website!
translation.sw: kampuni ambayo haina hata tovuti!

translation.en: I DONT EVEN BELIEVE THAT THERE WERE OTHER COMPETITORS
translation.sw: SIAMINI HATA KIDOGO KWAMBA KULIKUWA NA WASHINDANI WENGINE

translation.en: THIS COUNTRY IS A DISGRACE
translation.sw: NCHI HII NI AiBU

translation.en: Meanwhile, Joaquim Lunda, a journalist and frequent social media commentator, praised the presidents action and even thought that the minister in question ran the risk of being fired for these failings:
translation.sw: kwa sasa, Joaquim Lunda, mwandishi wa habari na mtangazaji wa mara kwa mara katika mitandao ya kijamii, alisifia kitendo cha Rais na hata nilifikilia kuwa waziri mhusika alikimbia hatari ya kufukuzwa kwa kushindwa huku:

translation.en: I appreciate, and it is praiseworthy, the decision taken by the president of the republic, João Lourenço, to annul the public tender which awarded the Angolan company Telstar the licence for the fourth telecommunications operator in Angola.
translation.sw: Tafsiri Ninshukuru na ni kitendo cha kupongezwa, maamuzi yaliyochukuliwa na Rais wa Jamhuri, João Lourenço, kufuta zabuni ya serikali ambayo kampuni ya Angola ya Telstar ilishinda leseni ya kuwa mwendeshaji wa mawasiliano katika Angola the licence for the fourth telecommunications operator in Angola.

translation.en: There were many reservations and a lot of points to clarify around the issue.
translation.sw: kulikuwa na watu wengi kutoridhishwa na mambo mengi ya muhimu ya kuweka wazi mazuiyoThere were many reservations and a lot of points to clarify around the issue.

translation.en: One doesnt see the aptitude in a company which was created in 2018 with capital stock of 200 thousand kwanzas to be awarded such an undertaking.
translation.sw: Mtu haoni tija katika kampuni ambayo iliundwa mwaka 2018 na mtaji wa Kwanza elfu 200, kupewa tuzo ya zabuni.

translation.en: I am completely certain that the days of the Minister of Telecommunications and Information Technology, José Carvalho de Rocha, are numbered.
translation.sw: Nina uhakika kabisa kuwa siku za waziri wa mawasiliano na teknolojia ya habari zinahesabika.

translation.en: After the failure of ANGOSAT 1, now also this that we witness today, I doubt if Dread will make it.
translation.sw: Baada ya kushindwa na  ANGOSAT 1, sasa na hiki tunachoshuhudia leo, nina wasiwasi kama Hofu kama itafanya lolote.

translation.en: Lets enjoy the show calmly!!
translation.sw: Tufurahie mchezo huo kimya kimya!!

translation.en: The presidents decision came after the same minister led the project, in 2017, for the satellite Angosat 1, also characterized by problems.
translation.sw: Uamuzi wa Rais ulikuja baada waziri yule yule aliyeongoza mwaka 2017, mradi wa setilaiti Angosat 1,   anaingia kwenye matatizo   tena.

translation.en: For Adriano Sapiñala, a deputy of Angolas biggest opposition party, the case shows disorganization within the government:
translation.sw: Adriano Sapiñala, makamu wa chama kikuu cha upinzani yeye anaona tatizo linaonesha mfarakano katika serikali:

translation.en: JLo [João Lourenço] has to organize his team well because yesterday the minister responsible was saying that the time for complaints had ended and so Telstar would have gone ahead with its next steps given that it was the winner of the fraudulent tender and today JLo comes and annuls the tender!!
translation.sw: JLo [João Lourenço] anapaswa kupanga vizuri timu yake kwa sababu jana waziri mwenye dhaman alikuwa anasema kwamba muda wa malalamiko umeisha na kwa hiyo Telstar ingeendelea na hatua inayofuata kutokana na kwamba ilikuwa mshindi wa zabuni ya ulaghai na leo JLo anajitokeza na kufuta zabuni!

translation.en: You communicate so badly?
translation.sw: Mawasiliano si mazuri?

translation.en: Now either the minister makes his position available (resigning) or then JLo has to fire him because if he cancelled the tender it is because it did not go well and to not affect anybody innocent, they need to establish responsibility!!
translation.sw: Sasa labda waziri aweke msimamo wa (kujihuzuru) au JLo anapaswa kumfukuza kwa sababu kama amefuta zabuni ni kwa sababu mchakato wake haukuwa mzuri na ili isiathiri mtu yeyote safi lazima watu wawajibike!!

translation.en: This story was written by Tamás B. Kovács and translated by Anita Kőműves for the Hungarian investigative journalism non-profit, Atlatszo.
translation.sw: Habari hii iliandikwa na Tamás B. Kovács na kutafsiriwa na Anita Kőműves kwa ajili ya Jarida la Hungary lisilo la kibiashara, Atlatszo.

translation.en: This edited version appears here as part of a partnership with Global Voices.
translation.sw: Nakala hii iliyohaririwa inapatikana hapa kama sehemh ya ushirikiano wake na Global Voices.

translation.en: Hungarian pro-government media outlets have launched new attacks against Blanka Nagy, a high school student who has spoken out against the government at several protests since late 2018.
translation.sw: Vyombo vya habari vinavyoiunga serikali ya Hungary mkono vimeanza mashambulizi mapya dhidi ya Blanka Nagy, mwanafunzi wa shule ya upili ambaye alizungumza vibaya dhidi ya serikali katika maandamano kadhaa tangu mwisho mwa mwaka 2018.

translation.en: Nagy has endured criticism of her intellect and even sexual harassment, with one outlet calling her a whore.
translation.sw: Nagy anavumilia ukosoaji mwingi dhidi yake na pia amedhalilishwa kijinsia na chanzo kimoja cha habari kimemuita kahaba.

translation.en: She has already filed and won defamation cases against three pro-government outlets that claimed she was failing in school: Lokál, Ripost, and Origo.
translation.sw: Tayari ameshafungua kesi ya kudhalilishwa na kushinda kesi dhidi ya vyombo vitatu Lokàl, Ripost na Origo ambayo vinavyoiunga mkono serikali, vilisema kuwa alikuwa akifeli shuleni.

translation.en: However, after Nady won her case against Origo, the outlet launched another attack, publishing her school reports.
translation.sw: Hata hivyo, baada ya Nady kushinda kesi dhidi ya Origo, chanzo hicho kilimshambulia tena kwa kuchapisha ripoti yake ya shule.

translation.en: Nagy told Atlatszo that she is considering suing Origo again over these latest stories.
translation.sw: Nady aliwaambia Atlatszo kuwa alikuwa anafikiria kuwashtaki Origo tena kwa sababu ya habari zao za hivi karibu.

translation.en: Blanka Nagy became well-known in Hungary last winter after she gave a speech at an anti-government rally, in which she criticized prominent politicians using foul language.
translation.sw: Blanka Nagy amekuwa maarufu nchini Hungary katika majira ya baridi yaliyopita baada ya kutoa hotuba katika maandamano ya kuipinga serikali, ambapo alikosoa wanasiasa maarufu, huku akitumia lugha kali.

translation.en: Her harsh words resonated with many social media users and a video of her speech went viral.
translation.sw: Maneno yake makali yalisambazwa na watumiaji wa mitandao ya kijamii kupitia video ya hotuba yake.

translation.en: About two months after her video became a social media sensation, the pro-government media and pundits such as Zsolt Bayer launched a series of attacks against her.
translation.sw: Miezi miwili baada ya video yake kuvuta hisia katika mitandao ya kijamii, vyombo vinavyoiunga serikali mkono na Wanazuoni kama vile Zsolt Bayer walianzisha mfululizo wa mashambulizi dhidi yake.

translation.en: Pro-government outlets claimed that she was failing many of her subjects in school and that she had missed many days of school.
translation.sw: Vyombo hivyo vilisema kuwa alikuwa akifeli masomo yake mengi na pia alikuwa amekosa siku nyingi za masomo.

translation.en: They also called her an untalented wannabe actress and a whore.
translation.sw: Pia walimuita asiye na kipaji anayetaka kuwa maarufu na kahaba.

translation.en: Her attorney filed copies of her academic transcript with the court to prove that she is not failing her classes  and thus the school transcripts became available for attorneys of Origo.
translation.sw: Wakili wake alifikisha nakala ya matokeo yake mahakamani na kuonesha kuwa hakuwa anafeli katika masomo yake na pia nakala hizo za matokeo walipewa mawakili wa Origo.

translation.en: The outlet decided to publish data from her transcripts, claiming that Nagy almost failed history last term and is on the verge of failing in a few other subjects as well.
translation.sw: Chanzo hicho cha habari kiliamua kuchapisha taarifa kutoka katika ripoti ya matokeo ya Nagy na kusema kuwa alikaribia kufeli somo la Historia muhula uliopita na pia yupo katika hati hati ya kufeli masomo mengine pia.

translation.en: When #Hungarys pro-govt media lied about teenage protester Blanka Nagy, she sued for defamation and won.
translation.sw: When #VyomboVinavyoungamkonoserikaliHungary  vyadanganya kuhusu binti mdogo mwandamanaji Blanka Nagy, amewashtaki kwa kumkashfu na akashinda.

translation.en: Ordered to issue corrections, however, they've refused and doubled down.
translation.sw: Wametakiwa waombe radhi na kurekebisha taarifa yao lakini wamekataa na kuendelea kumkashfu.

translation.en: TV2 devoted a whole news segment to mocking her grades, mentioning court documents but not its ruling https://t.co/MyllWb2Jwh
translation.sw: Kituo cha runinga cha TV2 kilitenga muda wote wa taarifa ya habari kukashifu matokeo yake, wakitaja nakala zilizopelekwa mahakamani lakini hawakusema hukumu ilikuwaje https://t.co/MyllWb2Jwh

translation.en: Joost (@almodozo) April 5, 2019
translation.sw: Joost (@almodozo) April 5, 2019

translation.en: My attorney and I are considering suing the outlet that published my school transcript, Nagy told Atlatszo in an interview.
translation.sw: Mimi na Wakili wangu tunafikiria kuwashitaki chanzo cha habari kilichochapisha nakala ya matokeo yangu kutoka shuleni, Nagy aliwaambia Atlatszo katika mahojiano.

translation.en: She says that Origo had no right to publish the transcripts.
translation.sw: Alisema kuwa Origo hawakuwa na haki ya kuchapisha matokeo yake.

translation.en: She and her attorney did not even think that Origo had the right to see the transcripts when they filed them in court.
translation.sw: Yeye na wakili wake wanadhani kuwa Origo hawakuwa na haki hata ya kuyaona matokeo yake walipoyawakilisha mahakamani.

translation.en: And their latest claims are not true either, she said.
translation.sw: Na shutuma zao za hivi karibuni sio za kweli pia, Nady alisema.

translation.en: I am not failing my history class, contrary to what they say.
translation.sw: Sifeli somo langu la Historia, tofauti na walichokisema.

translation.en: I have a much better grade than a 2 (rough equivalent to a C-).
translation.sw: Nina matokeo mazuri  alama zangu ni zaidi ya 2 (ambayo ni sawasawa na daraja C).

translation.en: What they say is simply false.
translation.sw: Wanachosema ni uongo.

translation.en: I would be ashamed if it was true because I have a history teacher among my ancestors, she said.
translation.sw: Ningeaibika kama ingekuwa ni kweli kwa sababu katika familia yangu kulikuwepo na mwalimu wa Historia miongoni mwa babu zangu, alimalizia kusema.

translation.en: I think all this verbal aggression against me is very strange but I am no longer bothered by it.
translation.sw: Nadhani matukano yote haya dhidi yangu ni kitu cha ajabu sana ila sibabaiki tena.

translation.en: It only proves that I somehow scared the highest ranks of governing party Fidesz.
translation.sw: Inaonyesha jinsi kwa namna fulani ninavyowatisha baadhi ya mamlaka za juu za chama tawala cha Fidesz.

translation.en: The fact that Zsolt Bayer himself attacked me and the pro-government media is using false pretexts to try and smear me proves that, she added.
translation.sw: Ukweli ni kwamba kitendo cha Zsolt Bayer mwenyewe kunishambulia na vyombo vya habari vinavyounga serikali mkono kusambaza taarifa za uongo dhidi yangu, vinathibitisha hilo, aliongeza.

translation.en: Blanka Nagy high schooler: Fidesz is a disgusting, treacherous, ugly & infectious plague.
translation.sw: Blanka Nagy mwanafunzi wa shule ya upili: Fidesz anatia kinyaa, mzandiki, mbaya na ni janga.

translation.en: This disgusting band of thieves,this oligarch-government are filling their pockets for their old days, while you will suffer in poverty as a pensioner.
translation.sw: Kikundi hiki kiovu cha majambazi, serikali hii ya wachache, wanaojaza mifuko yao kwa ajili ya maisha yao ya uzeeni wakati ninyi mnataabika kwa Umaskini mkiwa wastaafu.

translation.en: She told the truth.
translation.sw: Alisema ukweli.

translation.en: THIS is Hungary.
translation.sw: HII ndiyo Hungary.

translation.en: Defamation and disinformation are common weapons of Hungarian pro-government media.
translation.sw: Kukashfu na kutoa taarifa za uongo ndizo silaha pekee za vyombo vinavyounga mkono serikali ya Hungary.

translation.en: Some opposition figures have responded by suing these outlets for character assassination.
translation.sw: Baadhi ya mamlaka za upinzani zimejibu kwa kuvishtaki vyombo hivyo vya habari kwa kukashfu.

translation.en: According to data recently obtained by Atlatszo, the most prominent propaganda outlets have lost dozens of cases, and were mandated by the courts to issue corrections to their stories 109 times during 2018.
translation.sw: Kulingana na takwimu za hivi karibuni zilizokusanywa na Atlatszo, vyanzo vikuu vya propaganda vimeshindwa kesi nyingi, na viliamriwa na mahakama kusahihisha taarifa mara 109 kwa mwaka 2018.

translation.en: They can't put their ideas in our heads, so they put bullets #SOSNicaragua reads this protester's sign during a demonstration for political prisoners in Managua.
translation.sw: Hawawezi kutuwekea mawazo yao vichwani mwetu hivyo wanatupiga risasi #SOSNicaragua Ndivyo linavyosomeka bango la mwandamanaji mmoja wakati wa maandamano kwa ajili ya wafungwa wa kisiasa huko Managua.

translation.en: Agosto, 2018.
translation.sw: Agosti, 2018.
